Description:
We are looking for an energetic, self-driven salesperson for our online sales App .
Qualifications:-
- Excellent communication skills
- A good internet connection
- You need to be fast and active

- No Educational Background or Payment Required 
- We Will Pay You 5%-10% commission per Sale 
- Text us " I want to sale" for more information👇🏼

-ስለ ማህበራዊ ሚዲያ ግብይት ጠንቅቆ የሚያዉቅ ወይም ስራዉ የሚጠይቀዉን እዉቀት ለማግኘት ሙሉ አቅሙን የሚሰጥ።

text: Job Title

Market Place Post Specialist

Gender

Female 

Description: We are looking for an energetic market place post specialist to join our product marketing team. You will be responsible for posting our companies product on social market place applications and the day-to-day management of the company’s social market place account. Your passion for social market place as a communications tool will result in the adoption and implementation of social market place best practices across all social market place channels.

Responsibilities:
•Posting social media contents according to the strategies and brand identities of  the company
•Editing  consistent, meaningful content on all social media platforms, including writing and editing social media posts, improving customer engagement, and promoting social media campaigns.
•Managing a high volume of daily social media and social market place  posts.
•Communicating with social media followers and potential costumers , including responding to queries in a timely manner.
•Preparing weekly reports about  the progress and flow of costumers based on the market places accounts analytical tools.
•Suggesting recommendations to adjust the social media marketing strategy for optimal results.
•Staying up to date on best practices and emerging trends in social media.
•Performing other duties when needed.

Requirements:
•Any diploma or certificate with high level of energy and Discipline.
•Able to work at home and the candidates must have their own  personal computer and android phones(more than android 6)
•Excellent written and verbal communication skills
•Must have a basic understanding about social market place apps like FB marketplace, Afrotie, JiJi and other related market place applications.
•Multi-tasking and time-management skills, with the ability to prioritize tasks.
•Ability to work in a fast-paced, high-pressure environment
• women's are highly recommended

Salary:(7000-20,000 Birr)Based of the quantity, performance and efficiency of each promotional posts.

Application Deadline: Apr 22/2023
Applicants are required to send their Application Latter, and other useful  document to the following telegram username.
Telegram:- @

messages.text:
የስራ መደቡ መጠሪያ፡ ሻጭ

ኩባንያ: MLM ..direct saling

የሥራ ዓይነት: የትርፍ ሰዓት

መግለጫ፡- ምርቶቻችንን በመስመር ላይ መሸጥ የሚችል የኢንተርኔት ሻጭ እንፈልጋለን።

ችሎታዎች እና ብቃቶች፡-
- ጥሩ አውታረ መረብ እና ከሰዎች ጋር ግንኙነቶች ያለው 
- ስለ ማህበራዊ ሚዲያ ግብይት ጠንቅቆ የሚያውቅ
- ጥሩ የበይነመረብ ግንኙነት ያለው

ሚናዎች እና ኃላፊነቶች፡
- ገዢዎችን በማሳመን ምርቶቻችንን በመስመር ላይ ይሽጡ
- የሽያጭ ዕቃዎችን በትክክለኛው ጊዜ እና ሰዓት ይለጥፉ
- ከቤትዎ  ሳይወጡም መሥራት ይችላሉ።
በስልክ  ላይ ያናግሩን

ስም 
አድራሻ እና
ስልክ በቴሌግራም የውስጥ መስመር ያስቀምጡ

text: Job Title

Tiktok content creator

Description: ስለ  Digital marketing እንዲሁም video editing በቂ እውቀት ና ለስራው አስፈላጊ እቃዎች ያለው / ያላት 

ከዚህ በፊት ቫይራል የሆኑ የTik Tok ቪዲዮችን ሰርቶ የሚያዉቅ እና የሰራቸዉን ቪዲዮ ማሳየት የሚችል/የምትችል 

እቃዎችን የድርጅቶችን ምርት እና አገልግሎት ማስተዋወቅ የሚችል/የምትችል

በሳምንት ዉስጥ ከ 7 ቪዲዮ በላይ ማቅረብ የምትችል/የሚችል

የቀደሙ ስራዎችን ለመላክ በ @ ይጠቀሙ  ወይም  በስራ ሰዐት ይደዉሉ

text: Job Title

Amharic to English Translator

Quantity

3

Salary

3000 ETB  per month 

Job Description:
We are currently seeking two individuals to fill the position of Amharic to English Translator. The successful candidates will be responsible for translating English language content into Amharic language for a short video. The ideal candidates must be able to provide high-quality and accurate translations.

Responsibilities:

Translate English language content into Amharic language for a short video.
Ensure the accuracy and quality of the translation.
Work closely with the team to ensure that the translation meets the requirements.
Meet the deadline for submission of the translated file.
Requirements:

Fluent in English and Amharic languages.
Strong translation skills with a proven track record.
Must be able to deliver high-quality and accurate translations.
Ability to work under pressure and meet deadlines.
Proficient in MS Word.
Excellent communication skills.
Application Process:
Interested candidates should submit their CV and a translation sample in MS Word format to the Telegram Account provided below. Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted.

Telegram: @ 

We encourage all qualified individuals to apply. We are committed to diversity and equality of opportunity.

text: ኦንላይን እቃ ሻጭ

Monthly

Job

የት/ት ደረጃ፡- የዩኒቨርሲቲ / የኮሌጅ ተማሪ (ብቻ)
የስራ ልምድ፡- አይጠይቅም
የስራ ቀን እና ሰዐት፡- በትርፍ ጊዜ
የስራ ቦታ፡- ባሉበት ሆነዉ ሊሰሩት የሚችሉት

መስፈርቶች፡- 
የዩኒቨርሲቲ መታወቂያ(ኮፒ)

የታደሰ የቀበሌ መታወቂያ (ኮፒ)

ቲክቶክ ላይ ኤሌክትሮኒክስ እና ኮስሞቲክሶችን አስተዋዉቀዉ መሸጥ የሚችሉ

የቲክቶክ አካውንቱ/ቷ ላይ 1000 እና ከዛ በላይ ፎሎወር ያለዉ/ ያላት

ከላይ የተጠቀሱት መስፈርቶች ካሟሉ ይደዉሉልን 

Telegram: @

ያስታዉሱ
ከስራዉ በፊትም ሆነ ስራዉን ከጀመሩ በኋላ ምንም አይነት ክፍያ አንቀበልም!

text: Online Tutor
Hourly

We at Afro Giants plc are currently seeking a highly motivated and passionate online tutor to join our team. The successful candidate will be responsible for teaching students through our online tutoring platform- Ethiomisale (ww) in the following subjects: 

Science: Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry, Biology
Languages: English, Amharic, Afan Oromo, French , Spanish etc
Reinforcement: Primary school, Secondary school, High School, TVET, and  University
Extra-curricular activities: Music, guitar, piano...

Responsibilities:
- Planning and delivering an interactive online tutoring sessions
- Providing regular feedback and support to students and parents 
- Developing and adapting lesson plans according to student requirements 
- Ensuring that the online tutoring platform is being used effectively  
- Assessing and analyzing student progress 
- Collaborating with other online tutors and staff members to enhance the learning experience 

Qualifications:
- Minimum of a degree holder in any subject or related field 
- Excellent communication and interpersonal skills 
- Solid understanding of online teaching methods and platforms  
- Experience in the use of computer, MS office, & use virtual tools

Please submit your resume and cover letter at () or using the following form (ht) for consideration. We offer a flexible schedule along with competitive compensation.

Ethio Misale
Apply Now - Ethio Misale

text: Job Title

High School Tutor

Salary

Per hour 

Job Description

Our startup company, is searching for a skilled and experienced personnel to record videos of the Ethiopian high school courses. In this role, you will be responsible for capturing and recording lectures,  and tutorials to be used in our high school course offerings.

Responsibilities:

- Set up and operate recording equipment to capture high quality video footage of lectures,  and tutorials
- Work closely with instructors to ensure that all course material is accurately captured on video
- Edit and process recorded videos to ensure they meet high-quality standards
- Collaborate with our team to develop new video content for courses or update existing material
- Ensure that all recorded material meets copyright laws and other regulations
- Maintain a high level of organization with regard to video files, notes, etc.

Requirements:

- At least 2 years of experience in video production
- Excellent communication skills and ability to work well with instructors and team members
- Knowledge of Ethiopian high school courses and curriculum
- Applicants with university degrees should provide an image of their last semester grade report. Students who are currently enrolled in university degree programs should submit their high school transcript along with an image of their most recent grade report.

This is a contractual position based in Addis Ababa, Ethiopia. Salary will be commensurate with experience.

Contact @

Job Title፡ ሻጭ

Company: MLM ..direct selling

Job Description፡- ምርቶችን በመስመር ላይ /በአካል መሸጥ የሚችል ሻጭ እንፈልጋለን።

ችሎታዎች እና ብቃቶች፡-
- ጥሩ አውታረ መረብ እና ከሰዎች ጋር ግንኙነቶች ያለው 
- ስለ ማህበራዊ ሚዲያ ግብይት ጠንቅቆ የሚያውቅ
- ጥሩ የመግባባት ችሎታ ያለው

ሚናዎች እና ኃላፊነቶች፡
- ገዢዎችን በማሳመን ምርቶችን በመስመር/በአካል መሸጥ 
- የሽያጭ ምርቶችን በትክክለኛው ጊዜ እና ሰዓት ማስተዋወቅ 
- በየትኛውም ቦታ መሥራት ይችላሉ።
በስልክ ላይ በስራ ሰዓት ያናግሩን

ስም 
አድራሻ 
ስልክ
በቴሌግራም የውስጥ መስመር ያስቀምጡ
@

text: Job Title

Video Editor for Short Form Content like Alex Hormozi(Long term)

Quantity

6

Salary

Monthly 

Job Description

Hello! We are looking for a video editor who uses Premiere Pro, after effect or other professional software who specializes in short form video content. This is the type of content you see on TikTok, Instagram Reels, and YouTube Shorts, that has subtitles.

We have UNLIMITED work.All you need to do is add emojis, subtitle's, gifs, sound effects, etc.

We are seeking someone who is motivated to complete as many videos as possible because we have many videos that need to be edited.

REQUIREMENTS
-you need to know English language 
-you need to be more familiar with adobe premiere pro
-you must follow our rules otherwise don’t apply this job
-time is the most valuable thing in our team, if you have any other works that makes you busy please DON’T APPLY this job 
-before you join our team you must read our video editing standards and some other terms(we will send the document after you apply this job).

If you are interested in this position, please apply to this position with your portfolio videos like Alex Hormozi, and attach "EYOO" to the top of your cover letter so I know you read this job description. 
Thank you

Contact: @

messages.text:
Job Title: Flutter Full Stack Mobile App Developer

Salary: monthly 

We are seeking a talented and experienced Flutter Full Stack Mobile App Developer to join our team. As a Flutter Full Stack Mobile App Developer, you will be responsible for developing innovative and high-quality mobile applications for both iOS and Android platforms.

Responsibilities:

- Develop efficient and high-performing mobile applications using Flutter framework
- Collaborate with cross-functional teams to design, develop and deploy new features
- Work with the product team to gather requirements and define project scope
- Write clean, maintainable and efficient codes
- Debug and fix issues in the application
- Stay up-to-date with the latest trends in mobile application development

Requirements:

- Proven work experience as a Flutter Full Stack Mobile App Developer
- Strong proficiency in Flutter framework and Dart programming language
- Familiarity with front-end technologies like HTML5, CSS, JavaScript is required
- Deep knowledge of RESTful APIs and integration
- Experience with agile development methodologies
- Good understanding of software design patterns and architecture
- Excellent problem-solving skills
- Strong communication skills

If interested, please send your resume along with a cover letter explaining why you believe you’re the right fit for this position.

Contact: @

Gender፡ አይለይም

አመልካቾች ለሃይከል ፍሪላንሲንግ ሲያመለክቱ የትምህርት ማስረጃ ፤ የስራ ልምድ (ካለ) እና
መያያዝ ይኖርብዎታል ፡፡

ያደርግዎትና ወደስራ ያስገባዎታል ፡፡

በማርኬቲንግ ፤ ዲጂታል ማርኬቲንግ፤ በኮምፒውተር ሳይንስ እና ተዛማጅ ክህሎቶች የመጀመሪያ ዲግሪ እና ከዚህ በላይ 

Work experience፡ ዜሮ አመት እና ከዚያ በላይ ፤ ልምድ ላላቸው ቅድሚያ ይሰጣል ፡፡

Gender፡ አይለይም

Application deadline ፡ ቅዳሜ ግንቦት 12 ፤ 2015 ዓ.ም
አመልካቾች ለሃይከል ፍሪላንሲንግ ሲያመለክቱ የትምህርት ማስረጃ ፤ የስራ ልምድ (ካለ) እና
ከአንድ ገፅ በላይ መብለጥ የለበትም ፡፡ በሃገር ውስጥ እና በኢትዮጵያ ያሉ የሃይከል ደንበኞች እርስዎን ሲፈልጉ ሃይከል ደውሎ በመጥራት
የትምህርት ማስረጃ እና ተያያዝ ዶክመነቶችን በቴሌግራም አድራሻ

text: Job Title

Digital Marketer.

Salary

4000 ETB Monthly 

Job Description

We Are Looking for a competitive, visionary, creative, hard working, self-motivated digital marketer that fits with our company goals.

1. Develop a Digital Marketing Strategy: 
Can develop a comprehensive digital marketing strategy that aligns with the business goals and objectives. This includes identifying the target audience, selecting the appropriate digital channels, and setting measurable goals.

2. Conduct Market Research:   Must Be able to conduct market research to understand the target audience, their needs, and preferences. This includes analyzing customer data, conducting surveys.

3. Create Content: 
Can Think Of high-quality content that resonates with the target audience. This includes our blog posts, social media, promotional videos, infographics, and other types of content.

4. Manage Social Media Accounts: 
Can Properly manage social media accounts, engage with the target audience and build brand awareness. This includes creating and scheduling social media posts, responding to comments and messages, and monitoring social media analytics.

5. Run Paid Advertising Campaigns:  
This includes creating and managing Instagram, Facebook, Tiktok Ads, and other types of paid advertising campaigns.

6. Analyze and Report Results: This includes tracking key performance indicators (KPIs), such as website traffic, conversion rates, and social media engagement, and making data-driven decisions to improve campaign performance.


CAUTION: If you can't fulfill the above criteria do not apply!

*if you don't Have some sort of certification that clearly states you have learned the Subject well, do not apply.

Contact: @

text: Graphic Designer

Monthly

Job

We are looking for a talented Graphic Designer to work on our project part-time. Our ideal candidate is a creative Designer professional, preferably with experience working on a technology company and hands-on experience in the creative process, marketing, graphic design, and brand development. It is critical for this position to be aware of branding and marketing trends. Finally, you should be able to collaborate with Marketing and the project team to create design. 

Responsibilities
Oversee all design projects, from conception to delivery
Design original pieces, including illustrations and infographics
Refine images, fonts and layouts using graphic design software
Apply typography techniques
Business Analysis to understand the company’s unique identity
Development of a style guide including logo usage guidelines,
color palette, typography, and imagery guidelines
Print Materials: Business cards, letterheads, envelopes, brochures, flyers, posters, and banners design
Digital Assets: Website graphics, social media graphics, email
templates, and digital ads
Presentations: Slide decks, pitch decks, and sales presentations
UI/UX Responsive Design for Web,Mobile and Tablets
Generate ideas to portray concepts and advertise products/services
Increase user friendliness in digital products
Maintain brand consistency throughout all our marketing projects
Liaise with marketing and design teams to ensure deadlines are met
Stay up-to-date with industry developments and tools
Write and design unique and well-crafted copy that meet clients’ needs as well as our own
Collaborate with account executives to obtain knowledge of the clients’ requirements
Lead brainstorming/creative sessions to generate ideas

Requirements and skills
Proven work experience as a Senior Designer,  Graphic Designer or similar role
Excellent working knowledge of software such as Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign etc.
Hand-on experience in creative process, marketing, graphic design and brand development
Portfolio of completed design projects
Proficient in design software 
Strong aesthetic skills with the ability to combine various colors, fonts and layouts
Attention to visual details
Ability to meet deadlines and collaborate with a team

We are seeking applicants with a young, open-minded, multi-talented, and self-driven mindset who can grow with us. 

If you meet the aforementioned qualifications, kindly send your resume to

text: FrontEnd Developer Next.js & Tailwind

: 10,000 Birr

Job

We are seeking a talented and experienced Fullstack / Front End Developer . This position is focused on developing a Marketplace Platform, and we are looking for a skilled individual who has a strong background in frontend development.

Responsibilities:

Develop responsive and user-friendly frontend components using Next.js.
Implement state management solutions using Redux-Toolkit.

Integrate APIs and backend services to ensure seamless data flow between the frontend and backend systems.

Write clean, modular, and maintainable code while adhering to coding best practices and standards.
Conduct thorough testing of the frontend components to identify and resolve any bugs or issues.

Optimize the performance of the application to ensure smooth user experience.

Requirements:

-> Solid experience in frontend development, with a focus on React/Next.js, TailwindCss, Firebase
Proficiency in JavaScript.

-> Strong understanding of React/Next.js and its core principles.

-> Experience with state management libraries Redux .

-> Knowledge of RESTful APIs and asynchronous request handling.
Understanding of version control systems

-> Ability to write clean, efficient,  and maintainable code.
Strong problem-solving and debugging skills.
Excellent communication and collaboration abilities.

To apply for this position, please provide the following:

A resume highlighting your relevant experience and skills.
github account 

Links Live previous projects  demonstrating your expertise in the Next.js 

Please only apply if you have past experience with Next.js and can showcase your previous projects.

text: Job Title

Data collector

Quantity of applicants needed

200

Salary

One time 

Job Description

200 data collectors are needed to collect data for the Refugee and Host Integration through the Safety Net (RHISN) public works and livelihoods initiative for refugees and their hosting communities. The Gambella host and refugee villages of Pugnido, Bambasi, Benishangul-Gumuz, Asayita, Alemwach, and Dabat in Amhara are implementing RHISN.

RESPONSIBILITY
1. Attain the training and pretest. 
2.Internalize methods of data collection, and questionnaires. 
3. Conduct quality interview as per the guideline. 
4. Properly utilize equipments and questionnaires for data collection. 
5. Properly manage completed questionnaires. 
6. Ensure privacy and confidentiality of study subjects. 
7. Attain daily review meetings organized by the field supervisor. 
8.Comply with instructions by the supervisor.

MINIMUM QUALIFICATIONS 
- Degree or above in Social Science ,Health, Statistics or other  fields with at least 2 years research experience including electronical data collection.  
-  Native speakers of at least one of the following local languages are required: Newere, Agniwak, Arabic , Fugni, Afar, and Tigirgna. 
- Excellent interpersonal skills and good team spirit;  
- Ability to follow deadlines, accuracy and attention to detail. 
- It is required to have prior data collection experience in the Pugnido, Bambasi, Asayita, and Alemwach areas.

Contact: @

Job Title: Graphic Designer

Salary:  Negotiable

Job Description:
I’m looking to hire a professional graphic designer who will be responsible for designing a logo with full brand guidelines as well as digital and printed publications designs such as flyers, banners, brochures, posts for our social media accounts and more. 

The ideal candidate is someone who is creative, modern and thinks outside the box. Someone who will listen attentively to our needs and is open to trying new and unique ideas. 
- Skills of Adobe Photoshop, Illustrator and Indesign is a must
- Ability of Logo design, Illustration, Multi page layout design (like megazine and calendar) 

This will be a remote job so meeting deadlines is something we take EXTREMELY SERIOUSLY. The candidate needs to have a good working laptop and internet connection. You will need to respond actively and communicate multiple times a day with us so if you are someone with a full time job, this job is not for you. 
We might need to meet up once a week depending on the work. 

To apply: please send  YOUR PREVIOUS at least 3 WORK/DESIGNS via telegram 

* Should include the following 

1. Full name and phone number 
3. Living area
4. Experience(If any)
5. Portfolio/ Design gallery(If any)

Contact: @

: Django Developer

Company: Tobia Freelance

: $5/hr

Job Description:
We are seeking a talented Django developer to join our team. The ideal candidate will have experience with Django and a passion for building high-quality web applications. As a Django developer, you will be responsible for developing and maintaining web applications, collaborating with cross-functional teams, and ensuring the best possible user experience.

Responsibilities:
- Develop and maintain web applications using Django
- Collaborate with cross-functional teams to identify and solve complex problems
- Ensure the best possible user experience by implementing responsive design and user-friendly interfaces
- Write clean, maintainable, and efficient code
- Participate in code reviews and ensure code quality
- Stay up-to-date with emerging trends and technologies in web development

Requirements:
- Experience with Django REST framework
- Strong understanding of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
- Experience with front-end frameworks such as React or Angular is a plus
- Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills
- Strong communication and collaboration skills
- Ability to work independently and as part of a team

If you are a talented Django developer with a passion for building high-quality web applications, we want to hear from you! Please fill out the form below to apply.

https://form

text: Job Title

Video translator from English to Amharic for YouTube channel

Job Description

ለYouTube ቻናላችን የሚሰጡትን 15 እስከ 20 ደቂቃ የሚሆኑ ቪዲዮ ከenglish ወደ አማርኛ በትረካ መልኩ የሚተሮጉም።

የማመልከቻ መስፈርት
- በደንብ የኢንግሊዘኛ እና የአማርኛ ቋንቋ መናገር እና መፃፍ የሚችል
- የenglish ትርጉሙን ተረድቶ በራሱ አገላለፅ እንደጋዜጠኛ ቱባ በሆኑ የአማርኛ ቃላቶች ቀምሞ በትረካ መልኩ መተርጎም የሚችል
- ቢያንስ በቀን 1 ቪዲዮ ትርጉም መስራት የሚችል
- የራሱ Computer ያለውና በms word ትርጉሙን ፅፎ መላክ የሚችል 
- ስራውን በአግባቡና በጊዜ መላክ የሚችል
- የስነ-ፅሁፍ ወይም የጋዜጠኝነት ሞያ ያለው/ ያላት ቢሆን ይመረጣል

ከላይ የተዘረዘረውን የምታሟሉ ብቻ  ለማሳያ የሚሆን ከዚህ ቀደም የሰራችሁትን ስራ በ @ 2015 መላክ ትችላላችሁ።

ማሳሰቢያ:- እባካችሁ ከላይ የተቀመጡትን መስፈርት የማታሟሉ ከሆነ እና በ ms word type ማድረግ የማትችሉ ከሆነ አታመልክቱ

Contact: @

Job Description:
We are looking for a skilled Flutter UI Developer to join our team on a contract basis. As a Flutter UI Developer, you will be responsible for developing and implementing user interface components using Flutter framework. text:
Job Title: Senior Project Manager

Company: Tobia Freelance

Salary: 40,000 ETB

Job Description:
We are a software company looking for a highly skilled Senior Project Manager to join our team. As a Senior Project Manager, you will be responsible for overseeing the planning, implementation, and tracking of multiple software projects from start to finish. You will work closely with our clients to ensure that their projects are completed on time, within budget, and to their satisfaction.

Responsibilities:
- Develop and manage project plans, timelines, and budgets for software projects
- Coordinate with clients to define project requirements and scope
- Assign tasks and responsibilities to team members
- Monitor project progress and make adjustments as needed
- Ensure that project deliverables meet quality standards
- Communicate project status and issues to stakeholders
- Manage project risks and issues
- Conduct project evaluations and assessments

Requirements:
- Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a relevant field
- Proven experience as a Senior Project Manager in software development
- Strong leadership and communication skills
- Excellent problem-solving and decision-making abilities
- Ability to manage multiple software projects simultaneously
- Experience working with remote teams
- Proficiency in project management software and tools

If you are a highly motivated and experienced Senior Project Manager looking for a challenging and rewarding opportunity in the software industry, we encourage you to apply for this position.https://

text:
Job Title: Game Developer

Company: MAVERICK HABESHA

Job Description: I want to hire HTML5 based game developer to build and integrate games to my website

Requirements:
1. Skills and Experience: Looking for a developer with strong proficiency in HTML5, JavaScript, and CSS, as these are the core technologies used for creating web-based games. Additionally, knowledge of game development frameworks and libraries, such as Phaser, CreateJS, or PixiJS, is advantageous.

2. Portfolio: I need developer's portfolio to assess their previous work in creating HTML5 games. Look for examples that demonstrate their ability to create visually appealing and engaging games with smooth gameplay.

3. Integration Capabilities: Has experience in integrating HTML5 games into websites. They should be familiar with working within existing website frameworks or content management systems (CMS) to seamlessly incorporate the games into your web pages.

4. Responsive Design: understands the importance of responsive design, ensuring that the games function well and adapt to different screen sizes and devices. This is crucial for providing an optimal user experience across desktop, mobile, and tablet devices.

5. Collaboration and Communication: Effective communication and collaboration are vital for a successful partnership. I need a developer who is responsive, listens to your requirements, and provides regular updates on the progress of the game development and integration process.

6. Testing and Quality Assurance: The developer should have a strong commitment to testing and quality assurance to ensure that the games function properly, are bug-free, and provide an enjoyable experience for users.

Contact: @

Job Title: Senior Flutter Developer (Remote) Part-Time 

Salary:

Net)

Job Description:
We are seeking an experienced Senior Flutter Developer to join our team. As a Senior Flutter Developer, you will be responsible for developing and maintaining high-quality mobile applications using the Flutter framework. The ideal candidate will have at least 3 years of experience in Flutter development and be able to commit up to 30 hours per week.

Responsibilities:
    ✅Develop and maintain high-quality mobile applications using the Flutter framework
    ✅Collaborate with cross-functional teams to design, develop, and test new features
    ✅Ensure code quality, maintainability, and scalability of the application
    ✅Optimize application performance for maximum speed and scalability
    ✅Participate in code reviews, identify and fix bugs, and troubleshoot issues as needed
    ✅Stay up-to-date with the latest trends and technologies in mobile development                                                    
Requirements:
    ✅At least 3 years of experience in Flutter development
    ✅May have another part time Job but NOT FULL TIME 
    ✅Strong knowledge of Dart programming language
    ✅Experience working with RESTful APIs, third-party libraries, and web services
    ✅Good understanding of Agile development methodologies
    ✅Excellent problem-solving skills and ability to work independently
    ✅Strong communication skills and ability to work collaboratively in a team environment
    ✅A portfolio of mobile applications developed with Flutter

This is a remote part-time position, and the candidate must be able to commit up to 30 hours per week. If you meet the requirements and are interested in this opportunity, fill in the form and we'll get back to you shortly.

Job Title: Django and Vue.js Developer

Company: Tobia Freelancer

Job Description:
We are seeking a skilled and experienced Django and Vue.js Developer to join our team. As a Django and Vue.js Developer, you will be responsible for developing and maintaining web applications using the Django framework and Vue.js library. You will work closely with our development team to deliver high-quality, scalable, and efficient solutions.

Responsibilities:
- Develop and maintain web applications using the Django framework and Vue.js library.
- Collaborate with the development team to design and implement new features and functionalities.
- Write clean, efficient, and maintainable code.
- Conduct thorough testing and debugging of applications.
- Optimize applications for maximum speed and scalability.
- Stay up-to-date with the latest trends and best practices in Django and Vue.js development.

Requirements:
- Proven experience as a Django and Vue.js Developer or similar role.
- Strong proficiency in Django and Vue.js.
- Solid understanding of web development principles and best practices.
- Experience with front-end technologies such as HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
- Familiarity with version control systems (e.g., Git).

To apply, please fill out our application form

text:
Job Title: WordPress Developer with Portfolio

Salary: 10,000. Payment terms and schedule will be discussed during the interview process.

Job Description:
We are seeking a talented and experienced WordPress Developer to join our team. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in WordPress development, with a proven portfolio showcasing their expertise. As a WordPress Developer, you will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining WordPress websites for our clients. 

Responsibilities:
- Collaborate with clients and project managers to understand website requirements and objectives.
- Design and develop custom WordPress themes and plugins based on client specifications.
- Customize existing WordPress themes to meet client needs.
- Ensure websites are optimized for speed, performance, and responsiveness.
- Troubleshoot and resolve any issues or bugs that arise during the development process.
- Perform regular website maintenance, including updates and backups.
- Conduct thorough testing to ensure websites are error-free and meet client expectations.
- Stay up-to-date with the latest WordPress trends and technologies.

Requirements:
- Proven work experience as a WordPress Developer, with a strong portfolio showcasing your previous projects.
- In-depth knowledge of WordPress, including theme and plugin development.
- Proficiency in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and PHP.
- Experience with responsive design and mobile optimization.
- Familiarity with SEO best practices.
- Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
- Excellent communication and collaboration abilities.
- Ability to work independently and meet project deadlines.

Note: Please include a link to your portfolio when applying for this position.

If you are a skilled WordPress Developer looking for an exciting opportunity to showcase your talent and work on diverse projects, we would love to hear from you. Apply now and join our dynamic team!

Apply at:

.com

text:
Job Title: Sports Betting Specialist / Sportsbook Manager

Job Description:
We are seeking a highly skilled and experienced Sports Betting Specialist / Sportsbook Manager to oversee and manage the sports betting operations of our online casino, Maverick Habesha. The ideal candidate will have a deep understanding of sports betting, odds setting, risk management, and customer engagement in the context of online sportsbooks. As the Sportsbook Manager, you will be responsible for optimizing the sports betting offerings, ensuring competitive odds, and maximizing revenue while maintaining a balanced risk profile. Your expertise will play a critical role in enhancing the overall betting experience for our customers and driving the success of our sportsbook section.

Responsibilities:
- Develop and manage sports betting offerings, including setting odds and lines for various sports events and markets.
- Monitor and analyze betting trends, odds movements, and customer behavior to identify opportunities for optimization.
- Implement risk management strategies to ensure a balanced book and minimize potential losses.
- Collaborate with the marketing team to create promotions and campaigns to attract new customers and retain existing ones.
- Stay updated with industry trends, sports events, and regulatory changes to maintain compliance and offer the best possible betting experience.
- Monitor competitor activities and adjust our offerings accordingly to stay competitive in the market.
- Handle customer inquiries, resolve issues, and provide exceptional customer service to enhance customer satisfaction and loyalty.
- Analyze betting data and generate reports to assess the performance of the sportsbook and identify areas for improvement.

Requirements:
- Bachelor's degree in Business, Finance, Marketing, or a related field (preferred but not mandatory).
- Proven experience in sports betting and online sportsbooks, with a strong understanding of odds setting and risk management.
- In-depth knowledge of various sports and their betting markets.
- Proficiency in using sports betting platforms and software.
- Excellent analytical and data interpretation skills.
- Strong attention to detail and ability to handle large amounts of data accurately.
- Ability to work in a fast-paced and dynamic environment.
- Strong communication and interpersonal skills.
- Ability to work independently and as part of a team.

Contact: @

Job Title: Graphic Designer

Salary: 3,000 ETB one time payment will be delivered when finished the given task to design logo and branding of our website and social media pages

Job Description:
We are looking for a talented and creative graphic designer to join our team and help us brand our fact-checking company. The ideal candidate must have a strong understanding of typography, color theory, and design principles. They will also be able to create high-quality designs that meet our brand standards.

Responsibilities:
Create and maintain our company's visual identity, including our website, fonts, colors, and logo.
Design marketing materials, such as brochures, flyers, and social media graphics.
Collaborate with other departments to ensure that our brand is consistent across all channels.

Qualifications:
-Bachelor's degree in graphic design or a related field.
-1 years of experience in graphic design.
-Strong understanding of typography, color theory, and design principles.
-Ability to work independently and as part of a team.
-Proficiency in Adobe Creative Suite.

Job Title: Software sales

Company: Abyssinia software

Salary: Negotiable + commission+bonus

Description: 
Dream Abyssinia Software PLC, a leading provider of different software solutions, is seeking highly motivated and results-driven Sales Representatives to join our dynamic sales team. As a Sales Representative, you will have the opportunity to sell our innovative software products and earn attractive commissions. 

Responsibilities: 
- Prospect, identify and generate new leads through various channels, including cold calling, networking, and online research. - Conduct product presentations and demonstrations to potential clients, showcasing the benefits and features of our software solutions. 
- Meet or exceed sales targets and contribute to the overall growth of the company. 

Requirements: 
- Proven track record in sales, preferably in software or technology-related industries. - Excellent communication and interpersonal skills. 
- Ability to work independently and remotely, while maintaining high levels of motivation and discipline. 
- Strong negotiation and closing skills. 
- Self-motivated and target-oriented mindset.  
Sales Representatives will earn a competitive commission of 10% on each successful sale. This commission structure provides uncapped earning potential, allowing you to directly influence your income based on your performance.

Contact: @

text:
📢 Exciting News!

We are thrilled to announce two major updates to our bot! 🎉 Our dedicated developer (
) has been hard at work, and we are delighted to introduce two game-changing features that will enhance your experience on our platform.

text.text: Seamless Admin-User Interaction & Amharic Language Support

text:
1️⃣ Seamless Admin-User Interaction
We understand the importance of smooth communication and collaboration between admins and users on our platform. That's why we have introduced a powerful new feature that will make your interaction with our support team even better. With our direct messaging feature, you can now have real-time conversations with admins, getting instant support, efficient issue resolution, and personalized assistance.

2️⃣ Amharic Language Support
We believe that language should never be a barrier to accessing remote job opportunities. That's why we are excited to bring Amharic language support to our platform. With our user-friendly interface and job listings in Amharic, we are making our platform more inclusive and accessible for job seekers and employers in Ethiopia. Now, you can explore remote job opportunities and communicate in Amharic, ensuring equal access for all. Standing on your feedbacks, We will add some other local languages too.

We are committed to fostering a diverse and inclusive remote work community, and these additions are significant steps towards achieving that goal. We believe that everyone should have equal access to remote job opportunities, regardless of their language or location.

Thank you for being a part of our growing community! We are excited to continue serving you and helping you thrive in the remote work landscape.

Stay tuned for more updates and enhancements as we strive to make our platform even better for you. If you have any questions or feedback, please don't hesitate to reach out to us.

Meet our Creative developer(Salih) for your similar projects at
Happy job hunting and remote working in Amharic!

We are committed to fostering a diverse and inclusive remote work community, and these additions are significant steps towards achieving that goal. We believe that everyone should have equal access to remote job opportunities, regardless of their language or location.

Thank you for being a part of our growing community! We are excited to continue serving you and helping you thrive in the remote work landscape.

Stay tuned for more updates and enhancements as we strive to make our platform even better for you. If you have any questions or feedback, please don't hesitate to reach out to us.

Meet our Creative developer(Salih) for your similar projects at
Happy job hunting and remote working in Amharic!

-------------Closed/Hired-------------

Job Title: Lead Generation Specialist 

Salary: 13,000-15,000 

Description:
 Looking for a UI and UX designer

Responsibilities:

Design high-quality, intuitive interfaces for our digital platforms using Figma.
Implement your designs by developing UI components using CSS, HTML, Angular, and Bootstrap.
Use your knowledge of UX principles and methods to evaluate user requirements and suggest optimal designs based on these.
Create non-functional prototypes that visualize and demonstrate user interface design and interactions.
Collaborate with stakeholders and cross-functional teams to understand business objectives, user goals, and develop design solutions that meet them.
Provide valuable UX feedback and recommendations to improve the usability and overall customer experience.
Document design processes, user flows, and design decisions.
Participate in user testing and design reviews to identify areas for improvement.

Qualifications:

A minimum of 3-5 years of experience as a UI/UX Designer, preferably in the tech industry.
Proficiency in Figma, CSS, HTML, Angular, and Bootstrap is essential.
Experience in developing front-end UI components.
Demonstrated knowledge of UX principles, strategies, and best practices.
Ability to create non-functional prototypes.
Exceptional communication skills with the ability to articulate design decisions and processes to both business and technical stakeholders.
Proven track record of delivering user-centered design solutions that meet business objectives.
Degree in Computer Science, Design, or a related field, or equivalent work experience.
A strong portfolio showcasing your design skills, creativity, and depth of thought.

Job Title: Sales and marketing 

Company: Synergy 

Salary: On company comp plan 

Description:
 We are seeking a highly motivated and results-driven Sales and Marketing Professional to join our referral business team. The ideal candidate will have a proven track record of developing and implementing successful sales and marketing strategies to achieve business goals and objectives.

Responsibilities:

- Develop and implement sales and marketing strategies to achieve business goals and objectives.
- Conduct market research to identify potential customers and market trends.
- Build and maintain relationships with clients, partners, and stakeholders.
- Create and manage marketing campaigns across various channels such as social media, email, and advertising.
- Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure alignment of sales and marketing efforts.
- Generate leads and convert them into sales through effective communication and negotiation skills.
- Analyze sales data to track performance and identify areas for improvement.
- Stay up-to-date with industry trends, best practices, and emerging technologies. 

Requirements:

- Strong communication, negotiation, and interpersonal skills.
- Ability to work independently as well as in a team environment.
- Experience with CRM software, digital marketing tools, and analytics platforms.
- Knowledge of referral marketing is a plus.

Job Title: Full-stack Python Developer for Fitness and Nutrition AI 

Company: Ethio Fitness and Nutriton 

Salary: 40,000 

Description:
 We are seeking a skilled full-stack Python developer to build an AI for fitness and nutrition. The AI will be designed to provide personalized recommendations for exercise routines, meal plans, and recipes based on the user's goals, preferences, and dietary restrictions. 

Requirements:
 - Strong experience with Python and full-stack web development.
- Familiarity with React for building user interfaces.
- Experience working with SQL or NoSQL databases.
- Knowledge of NLP libraries such as NLTK or spaCy.
- Experience building and training models using machine learning libraries such as Scikit-learn or TensorFlow.
- Strong problem-solving and analytical skills.
- Excellent communication and collaboration skills.
- This is a full-time position with competitive salary and benefits. We offer a dynamic and collaborative work environment with opportunities for growth and professional development. 

Role & Responsibilities:
 - Develop AI algorithms to analyze user data and provide personalized recommendations for exercise routines, meal plans, and recipes.
- Work with datasets to train and improve the accuracy of the AI, including data on food nutrition, ingredient substitutions, and recipe development.
- Collaborate with UI/UX designers to create a user-friendly interface for the AI.
- Build a scalable and secure web-based application using Python frameworks such as Django or Flask.
- Develop and maintain the database architecture and queries using SQL or NoSQL databases.
- Use NLP libraries such as NLTK or spaCy for processing and analyzing text data.
- Use machine learning libraries such as Scikit-learn or TensorFlow for building and training models.
- Stay up-to-date with the latest developments in AI, nutrition science, and fitness technology.

-------------Closed/Hired-------------

Job Title: Front End Developer 

Company: Ideal Software Solutions 

Description:
 We are looking for a talented and experienced front end developer to join our team at Ideal Software Solutions. As a front end developer, you will be responsible for the design and development of our web applications. You will work closely with our product team to create user-friendly interfaces that meet the needs of our customers. You will also work with our back end team to integrate the front end with our existing systems.

Responsibilities:

Design and develop user-friendly web applications
Work with the product team to gather requirements and create wireframes
Implement front end code using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
Integrate front end code with back end systems
Test and debug front end code
Stay up-to-date on the latest front end technologies.                                                                                         
                                                                                               Qualifications:

3+ years of experience as a front end developer
Strong understanding of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
Experience with React, Angular, or Vue.js
Experience with back end technologies such as Java or Node.js
Experience with Agile development methodologies
Proficient in using version control systems such as Git
Excellent problem-solving and debugging skills
Excellent communication and teamwork skills
About the company:

Ideal Software Solutions is an international software development company that strongly believes in curiosity, equality, and creativity. We love to build digital products in close collaboration with our clients (global entrepreneurs) in order to have a positive impact on the world with tech business. We highly value an open mind, collaboration, and ownership in our team. So, if you take pleasure in trying to solve big business problems with technology, then join our team of activists, creatives, and tech geeks!

To apply:

Please fill out this google form:
We look forward to hearing from you!

-------------Closed/Hired-------------

Job Title: Dropshipping Website Marketing Specialists 

Company: Drop Habesha 

Salary: 50 Birr / 1 Referr 

Description:
 We are seeking a highly motivated and skilled individual to join our team as a Dropshipping Website Marketing Specialist. As our business, Drop Habesha, aims to become the go-to platform for dropshipping in Ethiopia, your role will be crucial in driving the growth and success of our website.

Responsibilities:

• Develop and implement effective marketing strategies to promote Drop Habesha as the preferred platform for dropshipping in Ethiopia.

• Identify and target potential dropshippers through various marketing channels, including social media, online forums, and industry-specific platforms.

• Engage with potential dropshippers, providing them with information about the benefits of using Drop Habesha and how to get started.

• Utilize persuasive communication skills to convince potential dropshippers to sign up for our website and pay the monthly fee.

• Track and analyze the effectiveness of marketing campaigns, making adjustments as necessary to optimize results.

• Collaborate with the sales and customer support teams to ensure a seamless onboarding experience for new dropshippers.

Stay updated on industry trends and competitor activities to identify new marketing opportunities and maintain a competitive edge.

Requirements:

• Fluent in Amharic, both written and verbal communication skills.

• Proven experience in digital marketing, preferably in the e-commerce or dropshipping industry.

• Strong knowledge of various  marketing channels, including social media platforms, online advertising, and content marketing.

• Excellent interpersonal skills and ability to build relationships with potential dropshippers.
Results-oriented mindset with a track record of meeting or exceeding targets.

• Familiarity with dropshipping concepts and practices is highly desirable.

• Self-motivated and able to work independently, as well as collaboratively within a team.

• Basic knowledge of website analytics tools for campaign tracking and analysis.

Compensation:

• Referral commission: 50 birr for each successful dropshipper referral who signs up and pays the monthly fee.

If you are passionate about digital marketing, have a knack for convincing others, and want to contribute to the growth of Ethiopia's dropshipping industry, we would love to hear from you.

Please submit your resume and a cover letter detailing your relevant experience to us.

-------------Closed/Hired-------------

Job Title: UI/UX Designer 

Company: Zare innovations 

Salary: 15k-20k 

Description:
 We are looking for a highly skilled and experienced Senior UI/UX Designer to join our remote team. The ideal candidate will be responsible for designing engaging user interfaces and delivering user-centered design solutions for our digital platforms. This role requires a deep understanding of UI/UX best practices, an ability to translate business needs into user-friendly solutions, and the technical capability to implement these designs into functional components. You will work closely with both business stakeholders and technical teams, so excellent communication skills are a must. 

Requirements:
 A minimum of 3-5 years of experience as a UI/UX Designer, preferably in the tech industry.
Proficiency in Figma, CSS, HTML, Angular, and Bootstrap is essential.
Experience in developing front-end UI components.
Demonstrated knowledge of UX principles, strategies, and best practices.
Ability to create non-functional prototypes.
Exceptional communication skills with the ability to articulate design decisions and processes to both business and technical stakeholders.
Proven track record of delivering user-centered design solutions that meet business objectives.
Degree in Computer Science, Design, or a related field, or equivalent work experience.
A strong portfolio showcasing your design skills, creativity, and depth of thought. 

Role & Responsibilities:
 Design high-quality, intuitive interfaces for our digital platforms using Figma.
Implement your designs by developing UI components using CSS, HTML, Angular, and Bootstrap.
Use your knowledge of UX principles and methods to evaluate user requirements and suggest optimal designs based on these.
Create non-functional prototypes that visualize and demonstrate user interface design and interactions.
Collaborate with stakeholders and cross-functional teams to understand business objectives, user goals, and develop design solutions that meet them.
Provide valuable UX feedback and recommendations to improve the usability and overall customer experience.
Document design processes, user flows, and design decisions.
Participate in user testing and design reviews to identify areas for improvement.

text:
Job Title: Software Development Project Manager 

Salary: From 100,000 ETB per month and depends on experiences 

Description:
 We are looking for a talented software development project manager to join our team. The ideal candidate must have a strong understanding of software testing and experiences of them. 

Role & Responsibilities:
- Planning out the blueprints for software projects, including defining the scope, allocating resources, setting deadlines, laying out communication strategies, and indicating tests and maintenance.
- Participating in and supervising each stage of the project.
- Ensuring each project stays on schedule and adheres to the deadlines.
- Determining and overseeing consistent testing, evaluation, and troubleshooting of all products in all stages of completion.
- Tracking milestones, deliverables, and change requests.
- Serving as a liaison to communicate information regarding changes, milestones reached, and other pertinent information.
- Delivering completed software products to clients and performing regular checks on the products' performance. 

Requirements:
 -Bachelor's degree in computer science or related fields. 
-Over 5 years of experience in software project management 
- Proven experience in project management and software development.
- Good working knowledge of project estimation techniques.
- Excellent technical knowledge.

If you're interested please submit your information here.

text:
Job Title: Remote Sales Person 

Company: Arada Sales Network 

Salary: Per performance 

Description:
 ድርጅታችን አራዳ ሴልስ ( Arada Sales ) በሽያጭ ሰራተኛ ዘርፍ የሚከተሉትን መስፈርቶች የሚያሟሉ ሰራተኞችን መቅጠር ይፈልጋል;

-ጥሩ የግንኙነት ክህሎት ያለውና በቀላሉ ደንበኞችን ማሳመን የሚችል/የምትችል

-መልካም የስራ ስነምግባር ያለው/ያላት

-ቶሎ የመማር ችሎታ እና በራስ መተማመን ያለው/ያላት

-ስለ ሴልስ ስራ በቂ ዕውቀትና ከፍተኛ ፍላጎት ያለው/ያላት

-ስማርት ስልክ ያለው/ያላት

-ሽያጭ ስራ ላይ ከዚህ በፊት ልምድ ያላቸው ይበረታታሉ::

እንዴት ማመልከት እንደሚቻል
ከዚህ በላይ ያለውን መስፈርት የሚያሟሉ አመልካቾች

ተጠቅመው ሙሉ ስም ስልክ ቁጥርና የመኖሪያ አድራሻ በመጥቀስና አስፈላጊውን መረጃ በማያያዝ ማመልከት ትችላላችሁ::
Share/Join:

messages.text:
-------------Closed/Hired-------------

Job Title: Social Media Content Creator (Instagram & TikTok) 

Salary: 5,000 PER MONTH 

Description:
 As a Social Media Content Creator, your role will involve mastering the art of crafting engaging content for Instagram and TikTok. Your expertise in understanding trending topics, creating viral content, and using strategic hashtags will play a vital role in expanding our online reach. Your content will be key to showcasing our brand's identity and engaging our growing community. 

Requirements:
 Proven experience in content creation for Instagram and TikTok.
Strong ability to create videos that resonate and have the potential to go viral.
Proficiency in using hashtags effectively to reach the target audience.
Creative mindset and up-to-date knowledge of social media trends.
Excellent communication skills and attention to detail. 

Role & Responsibilities:
 Content Creation: Produce engaging and captivating content for Instagram and TikTok that aligns with Maverick Habesha's brand identity. Create videos that stand out and have the potential to go viral, capturing the attention of our target audience.

Trending Awareness: Stay updated with the latest trends on Instagram and TikTok. Translate these trends into creative content ideas that resonate with our gaming community.

Hashtag Strategy: Utilize strategic hashtags to enhance the discoverability of our content. Understand how to effectively use hashtags to reach a broader audience and increase engagement.

Audience Engagement: Foster a sense of community by engaging with our followers, responding to comments, and encouraging interaction on our social media posts.

Content Planning: Collaborate with the marketing team to develop content calendars and schedules that ensure consistent and relevant posting across platforms.

Visual Excellence: Maintain the highest standards of visual quality in all content, ensuring that it is aligned with Maverick Habesha's aesthetics and values.

Analytics Insight: Monitor and analyze the performance of your content using available analytics tools. Use insights to refine your content strategy and improve engagement rates.

Language Proficiency: Be capable of understanding English, as our content often requires communication in English.

text:
Job Title: Student Recruiter for Our Online Course 

Company: Alpine 

Salary: 100ETB/Enrolled student 

Description:
 We are seeking dedicated and motivated individuals to join our team as Forex Trading Course Student Recruiters. As a recruiter, you will play a crucial role in identifying and engaging potential students interested in enrolling in our forex trading course. Your efforts will contribute to the growth and success of our educational program.

Key Responsibilities:

- Identify and target potential students who have expressed interest in financial markets, trading, and investing.

- Utilize various sourcing methods, including online platforms, social media, networking events, and partnerships, to reach out to potential candidates.

- Initiate and maintain communication with prospective students through emails, calls, and meetings to explain the benefits of our forex trading course.

- Understand potential students' backgrounds, goals, and preferences to tailor your approach and address their specific needs.

- Maintain a database of leads and interactions for tracking purposes, ensuring timely follow-ups and updates.

- Attend trade shows, seminars, and workshops to promote the forex trading course and attract potential students.

- Participate in team meetings to share insights, best practices, and challenges faced during the recruitment process.

Qualifications:
- Strong passion for financial markets, trading, and investing, with a basic understanding of forex trading concepts.

- Excellent communication and interpersonal skills to effectively engage and build relationships with potential students.

- Self-motivated and proactive individual with the ability to work independently and as part of a team.

Join us in making a difference by helping aspiring traders embark on their journey to success in the forex market!
Share/Join:

Job Title: JavaScript Developer Needed for Screenshot and Screen Record Detection in Web 

Company: Ozone Technology 

Salary: 2,000 ETB 

Description:
 Ozone Technology is seeking a skilled and experienced JavaScript developer to assist us in creating a solution for screenshot and screen record detection in web applications in cross-platform compatibility across major operating systems (Windows, Linux, Mac OS) and browsers 

Role & Responsibilities:

Job Title: UI/UX Designer 

Company: Zare innovations 

Salary: 13,000-15,000 

Description:
 Looking for a UI and UX designer

Responsibilities:

Design high-quality, intuitive interfaces for our digital platforms using Figma.
Implement your designs by developing UI components using CSS, HTML, Angular, and Bootstrap.
Use your knowledge of UX principles and methods to evaluate user requirements and suggest optimal designs based on these.
Create non-functional prototypes that visualize and demonstrate user interface design and interactions.
Collaborate with stakeholders and cross-functional teams to understand business objectives, user goals, and develop design solutions that meet them.
Provide valuable UX feedback and recommendations to improve the usability and overall customer experience.
Document design processes, user flows, and design decisions.
Participate in user testing and design reviews to identify areas for improvement.

Qualifications:

A minimum of 3-5 years of experience as a UI/UX Designer, preferably in the tech industry.
Proficiency in Figma, CSS, HTML, Angular, and Bootstrap is essential.
Experience in developing front-end UI components.
Demonstrated knowledge of UX principles, strategies, and best practices.
Ability to create non-functional prototypes.
Exceptional communication skills with the ability to articulate design decisions and processes to both business and technical stakeholders.
Proven track record of delivering user-centered design solutions that meet business objectives.
Degree in Computer Science, Design, or a related field, or equivalent work experience.
A strong portfolio showcasing your design skills, creativity, and depth of thought.

English proficiency is a must 

Requirements:
 Excellent communication skill

text:
Job Title: Sales 

Company: Pixelperfect web solution 

Salary: Commission 

Description:
 We are a rapidly growing web development company that is seeking motivated and dynamic individuals to join our team as employees. As we expand our range of services and increase our client base, we strongly believe in the power of enthusiastic employees who are committed to promoting our business and driving its success.

In this role, you will be responsible for actively seeking out and engaging potential clients who could benefit from our web development services. With your exceptional interpersonal skills, you will build strong relationships and represent our company in a professional and persuasive manner. In addition to identifying new opportunities, you will also work closely with our existing clients, ensuring their satisfaction and addressing any concerns they may have.

To reflect our commitment to your success, we offer a salary structure based on commission and clients. This unique compensation system provides you with the ability to significantly influence your earnings, as your efforts in attracting and retaining clients will directly impact your income. As you demonstrate your skills, dedication, and results, you will have the opportunity for continuous growth and advancement within our organization.

To thrive in this role, you should possess extensive knowledge of web development and possess excellent communication and negotiation skills. Your ability to understand client requirements, propose appropriate solutions, and effectively close deals will be crucial to your success and the growth of our business.

By becoming a part of our team, you will join a forward-thinking company that embraces innovation and prioritizes customer satisfaction. While we value individual achievements and self-motivation, we also foster a collaborative and supportive work environment where colleagues celebrate each other's successes and work together towards common goals.

If you are excited about the web development industry and are eager to be a part of a team that rewards your efforts, we invite you to apply for this position. Join us and help shape the future of our business as we continue to grow and provide exceptional web development solutions to our clients. 

Requirements:
 People with easy access to social media 

Role & Responsibilities:
 Getting clients

Share/Join:

Job Title: Project Coordinators 

Company: Project ONE 

Salary: Internship (Unpaid) 

Description:
 Department and job description 
1. Administration Department:

   - Description: The Administration Department is responsible for overseeing the overall project and ensuring smooth operations. They handle various administrative tasks and provide support to other departments.
   - Roles:
     - Project Manager: Oversees the project, sets goals, and ensures effective coordination among departments.
     - Administrative Assistant: Assists with administrative tasks, manages schedules, maintains records, and provides general support to the team.

2. Membership Department:

   - Description: The Membership Department focuses on recruiting and engaging project members. They aim to grow and maintain a strong community of individuals dedicated to the project's mission.
   - Roles:
     - Membership Coordinator: Manages member recruitment efforts, maintains member database, and facilitates member engagement activities.
     - Events Coordinator: Organizes events, workshops, and activities to engage project members and foster a sense of community.

3. Student Selection Department:

   - Description: The Student Selection Department is responsible for evaluating student applications and selecting deserving candidates for the project's opportunities.
   - Roles:
     - Application Reviewer: Reviews student applications, assesses eligibility, and evaluates qualifications based on pre-defined criteria.
     - Interview Coordinator: Organizes and schedules interviews with shortlisted candidates, and ensures a smooth interview process.

4. Financial Department:

   - Description: The Financial Department manages the financial aspects of the project, including budgeting, fundraising, and financial aid disbursement.
   - Roles:
     - Financial Manager: Oversees the project's finances, develops and maintains budgets, and ensures financial sustainability.
     - Fundraising Coordinator: Develops fundraising strategies, identifies funding opportunities, and manages relationships with donors and sponsors.

5. Mentorship Department:

   - Description: The Mentorship Department focuses on matching students with mentors and providing support for mentor-student relationships.
   - Roles:
     - Mentorship Coordinator: Manages the mentorship program, matches students with suitable mentors, and provides ongoing support to mentor-student pairs.
     - Mentor Training Facilitator: Develops and conducts training sessions for mentors, equipping them with the necessary skills and resources.

Apply via the below google form if you think you can qualify and work as one of the jobs listed above.

Requirements:
 Knowledge about college application process/scholarship is a plus.
Share/Join:

   - Description: The Membership Department focuses on recruiting and engaging project members. They aim to grow and maintain a strong community of individuals dedicated to the project's mission.
   - Roles:
     - Membership Coordinator: Manages member recruitment efforts, maintains member database, and facilitates member engagement activities.
     - Events Coordinator: Organizes events, workshops, and activities to engage project members and foster a sense of community.

3. Student Selection Department:

   - Description: The Student Selection Department is responsible for evaluating student applications and selecting deserving candidates for the project's opportunities.
   - Roles:
     - Application Reviewer: Reviews student applications, assesses eligibility, and evaluates qualifications based on pre-defined criteria.
     - Interview Coordinator: Organizes and schedules interviews with shortlisted candidates, and ensures a smooth interview process.

4. Financial Department:

   - Description: The Financial Department manages the financial aspects of the project, including budgeting, fundraising, and financial aid disbursement.
   - Roles:
     - Financial Manager: Oversees the project's finances, develops and maintains budgets, and ensures financial sustainability.
     - Fundraising Coordinator: Develops fundraising strategies, identifies funding opportunities, and manages relationships with donors and sponsors.

5. Mentorship Department:

   - Description: The Mentorship Department focuses on matching students with mentors and providing support for mentor-student relationships.
   - Roles:
     - Mentorship Coordinator: Manages the mentorship program, matches students with suitable mentors, and provides ongoing support to mentor-student pairs.
     - Mentor Training Facilitator: Develops and conducts training sessions for mentors, equipping them with the necessary skills and resources.

Apply via the below google form if you think you can qualify and work as one of the jobs listed above.

Requirements:
 Knowledge about college application process/scholarship is a plus.

text:
Job Title: .NET Software Engineer 

Company: Zare Innovations 

Salary: 13,000-15,000 

Description:
 We are seeking experienced .NET/C# Developers to join our development team. You will be responsible for the conversion of our existing Java-based remote device management tool into a .NET framework. 

Requirements:
 -Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or related field
-Minimum of 3-5 years professional experience in .NET/C# development
-Strong understanding of object-oriented programming principles
-Proficiency in

MVC, Web APIs, and WPF
-Experience with Entity Framework
-Prior experience with Java programming is a plus
-Familiarity with version control systems (Git, SVN)
Strong debugging and problem-solving skills
-Excellent communication skills
-Ability to work independently as well as in a team environment 

Role & Responsibilities:
 -Convert existing Java-based remote device management tool to .NET/C#
-Collaborate with project managers, developers, and quality assurance teams to define requirements and specifications
-Develop high-quality code that is efficient, re-usable, and easy to maintain
-Optimize application for maximum speed and scalability
-Provide technical support and expertise throughout the development life cycle
-Conduct unit and integration testing
-Debug and troubleshoot issues as they arise
-Document code and architectural decisions
-Participate in code reviews

Share/Join:

 We are looking for an excellent graphic designer for a company branding project. As a designer you will be responsible for creating eye-catching graphics, illustrations, and layouts that will help us convey our message, captivate our audience, and elevate our brand presence.

- Work on multiple projects simultaneously, meeting deadlines and maintaining high-quality design standards.
- Stay updated on industry trends and incorporate innovative design elements into projects.

Salary: Commission 

Description:
 As an Online Marketing Assistant, you will play a crucial role in developing and implementing effective marketing strategies to enhance our online presence and drive brand awareness. We are looking for a dynamic and creative individual who is passionate about digital marketing and possesses strong analytical skills. 

Requirements:
 Key Responsibilities:
1. Develop and execute online marketing campaigns across various platforms, including social media, email marketing, search engine optimization (SEO), and content marketing.
2. Conduct market research to identify target audiences and create tailored marketing strategies to reach them effectively.
3. Monitor and analyze website traffic, conversion rates, and other key performance indicators to optimize marketing efforts and improve ROI.

Job Title: Football Content Creator 

Company: Ethiopian Today Sport 

Salary: 500-1000 

Description:
 We are seeking a passionate and creative Football Content Creator to join our team. As a Football Content Creator, you will be responsible for producing engaging and captivating content for our YouTube channel that resonates with our target audience. Your primary goal will be to identify topics that appeal to football enthusiasts, create compelling stories, and inspire conversions. 

Requirements:
 1. Passion for Football: In-depth knowledge and passion for football, including an understanding of different leagues, teams, players, and tactics. Stay updated with the latest news and developments in the football world.

2. Creative Storytelling: Proven ability to create compelling narratives that resonate emotionally with viewers. Strong storytelling skills and the ability to craft engaging content that inspires conversions.

3. Video Production Skills: Familiarity with video production techniques, including scripting, and editing. 

4. Excellent Communication Skills: Strong written and verbal communication skills to effectively engage with viewers and collaborate with team members.

5. Time Management: Ability to work under tight deadlines while maintaining high-quality standards for content creation. 

Role & Responsibilities:
 Responsibilities:
1. Research and Identify Topics: Conduct thorough research to identify trending topics, current events, and popular discussions within the football community. Stay up-to-date with the latest news, matches, player transfers, and other relevant information.

2. Create Engaging Content: Develop innovative ideas for videos that will captivate our target audience. Produce high-quality content that includes match analysis, player profiles, tactical breakdowns, top 10 lists, behind-the-scenes footage, interviews, and other creative formats.

3. Craft Compelling Stories: Use your storytelling skills to create narratives that resonate emotionally with viewers. Develop content that evokes passion, excitement, inspiration or any other desired emotional response from the audience.

4. Video Production: Collaborate with the production team to ensure smooth execution of video edit. Assist in scripting videos and provide creative input during the editing process to enhance the overall quality of the content.

5. Optimize for Conversions: Understand our target audience's preferences and behaviors on YouTube. Optimize video titles, descriptions, tags, thumbnails, and other metadata elements to increase visibility and drive engagement with our content.

6. Engage with Viewers: Monitor comments on YouTube videos regularly and respond to viewer inquiries or feedback promptly in a professional manner. Foster a sense of community by actively engaging with viewers through comments or live chats during premieres or live streams.

7. Collaborate with Team Members: Work closely with other members of the marketing team such as social media managers or graphic designers to align content strategies across different platforms effectively.

Job Title: Football Voice Over Artist 

Company: Ethiopian Today Sport 

Salary: 500-1000 

Description:
 We are seeking a talented and passionate Football Voice Over Artist to join our team. As the Football Voice Over Artist, you will be responsible for creating captivating voice overs for our YouTube channel that resonate with our target audience. Your primary goal will be to create compelling stories imbued with emotional hooks that inspire conversions and engage football enthusiasts worldwide. 

Requirements:
 1. Voice Over Creation: Utilize your energetic and deep voice to create engaging voice overs for our football-related content on YouTube. This includes narrating match highlights, analyzing game strategies, providing commentary on player performances, and delivering captivating storytelling.

2. Audience Connection: Understand our target audience's preferences, interests, and emotions related to football. Craft voice overs that connect with their passion for the sport, evoke excitement, and inspire them to engage with our content.

3. Storytelling Expertise: Develop a keen understanding of the narrative structure required for effective storytelling in football-related videos. Use your creativity to bring out the drama, intensity, and emotions associated with key moments in matches or players' journeys.

4. Script Adaptation: Collaborate closely with our content creators to adapt scripts into compelling voice over narratives that align with our brand's tone and style guidelines.

5. Audio Production: Ensure high-quality audio recordings by utilizing professional-grade recording equipment and software tools. Edit and enhance recordings as necessary to deliver polished final products.

6. Research & Analysis: Stay up-to-date with the latest trends in football commentary, voice over techniques, and emerging storytelling formats within the digital space. Continuously analyze audience feedback and engagement metrics to refine your approach. 

Role & Responsibilities:
 1. Proven Experience: Previous experience as a Voice Over Artist or similar role is highly desirable, especially within the sports or entertainment industry.

2. Passion for Football: A deep understanding of football rules, strategies, players, teams, and competitions is essential to effectively connect with our target audience.

3. Energetic and Deep Voice: Possess a captivating voice with the ability to convey excitement, intensity, and emotions associated with football. Your voice should resonate with our target audience and inspire them to engage with our content.

4. Storytelling Skills: Strong storytelling abilities, with the capacity to create narratives that captivate viewers and inspire them to take action.

2. Audience Connection: Understand our target audience's preferences, interests, and emotions related to football. Craft voice overs that connect with their passion for the sport, evoke excitement, and inspire them to engage with our content.

3. Storytelling Expertise: Develop a keen understanding of the narrative structure required for effective storytelling in football-related videos. Use your creativity to bring out the drama, intensity, and emotions associated with key moments in matches or players' journeys.

4. Script Adaptation: Collaborate closely with our content creators to adapt scripts into compelling voice over narratives that align with our brand's tone and style guidelines.

5. Audio Production: Ensure high-quality audio recordings by utilizing professional-grade recording equipment and software tools. Edit and enhance recordings as necessary to deliver polished final products.

6. Research & Analysis: Stay up-to-date with the latest trends in football commentary, voice over techniques, and emerging storytelling formats within the digital space. Continuously analyze audience feedback and engagement metrics to refine your approach. 

Role & Responsibilities:
 1. Proven Experience: Previous experience as a Voice Over Artist or similar role is highly desirable, especially within the sports or entertainment industry.

2. Passion for Football: A deep understanding of football rules, strategies, players, teams, and competitions is essential to effectively connect with our target audience.

3. Energetic and Deep Voice: Possess a captivating voice with the ability to convey excitement, intensity, and emotions associated with football. Your voice should resonate with our target audience and inspire them to engage with our content.

4. Storytelling Skills: Strong storytelling abilities, with the capacity to create narratives that captivate viewers and inspire them to take action.

messages.text:
-------------Closed/Hired-------------

Job Title: Football News Translator (English to Amharic) 

Company: ETHIOPIAN TODAY 

Salary: Monthly 

Description:
 We are seeking a talented and passionate individual to join our team as a Football Translator, responsible for creating translations from English to Amharic for our YouTube channel. The ideal candidate will have a deep understanding of football and possess exceptional creative writing skills to produce content that resonates with our target audience. 

Requirements:
 1. Native-level fluency in both English and Amharic languages is essential.
2. Proven experience in translation or creative writing, preferably in a sports-related field such as football.
3. Strong knowledge of football terminology, rules, players, teams, leagues, and international competitions.
4. Exceptional creative writing skills with the ability to craft engaging stories that evoke emotions in viewers.
5. Excellent attention to detail with a focus on accuracy in translations while maintaining the intended meaning of the original content.
6. Familiarity trends and best practices is preferred but not mandatory. 

Role & Responsibilities:
 Responsibilities:
1. Translate English football-related content into Amharic, ensuring accuracy and maintaining the essence of the original message.
2. Create compelling stories that captivate the audience, incorporating emotional hooks to engage viewers.
3. Adapt the translated content to suit the cultural nuances and preferences of the Amharic-speaking audience.
4. Collaborate with the content creation team to brainstorm ideas and develop innovative concepts for football-related videos.
5. Conduct thorough research on current football trends, players, teams, and events to stay up-to-date with the latest developments in the sport.
6. Proofread and edit translated scripts or subtitles for grammar, punctuation, and clarity.
7. Continuously improve translation quality by seeking feedback from viewers and implementing necessary adjustments.
