text:
Job Title: Programmatic Advertiser 

Company: MERI TECHNOLOGIES 

Salary: Monthly 

Description:
 We are looking for a Programmatic Advertiser to join our team. The Programmatic Advertiser will be responsible for building and optimizing programmatic campaigns with the goal of driving maximum ROI for our clients. This role is highly analytical and requires a deep understanding of the programmatic landscape and its associated technologies. The ideal candidate is strategic, data-driven, and passionate about learning and growing in the digital advertising space.

Responsibilities:

• Develop and execute programmatic campaigns, utilizing various ad exchanges and demand-side platforms

• Analyze campaign performance and optimize to meet client objectives

• Manage budget pacing and pacing reports

• Monitor trends in the programmatic landscape to stay ahead of the competition

• Create and maintain detailed campaign reports

• Work closely with other departments to ensure proper implementation of campaigns

• Identify opportunities for growth and improvement in campaigns

Qualifications:

• Knowledge of programmatic platforms.

• Experience with bid optimization and budget pacing

• Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills

• Strong organizational and communication skills

• Ability to work in a fast-paced, team-oriented environment
Share/Join:

text:
Job Title: Somali to English Subtitle Creator 

Salary: Per minute 

Description:
 We are seeking a skilled and detail-oriented Somali to English Subtitle Creator to join our team. As a Subtitle Creator, you will be responsible for accurately translating and creating English subtitles for Somali-language content. Your primary task will be to create SRT files that synchronize with the audio or video content, ensuring an optimal viewing experience for our audience. This role requires fluency in both Somali and English, as well as excellent attention to detail and the ability to work efficiently under tight deadlines.

Responsibilities:
- Translate Somali audio or video content into accurate and grammatically correct English subtitles.
- Create SRT files that synchronize with the audio or video content, ensuring proper timing and formatting.
- Proofread and edit subtitles to ensure accuracy, consistency, and readability.
- Meet project deadlines and manage multiple projects simultaneously.
- Maintain confidentiality and handle sensitive information with professionalism.

Requirements:
- Fluency in both Somali and English, with excellent written and verbal communication skills in both languages.
- Proven experience in creating subtitles or translating content from Somali to English.
- Proficient in using subtitle creation software and tools.
- Strong attention to detail and ability to maintain accuracy while working under tight deadlines.

Preferred Qualifications:
- Previous experience in subtitling for film, television, or online video content.
- Familiarity with subtitling software 

Note: Please provide samples of previous subtitle work or any relevant certifications along with your application.
Share/Join:

text:
Job Title: ሽያጭ እና አስተዋዋቂ / Sales & Promoter 

Company: Dagim Dessalegn commission works 

Description:
 ድርጅታችን አዲስ ለለቀቀው ፕላትፎርም የሚሆን በሁሉም ንግድ ቦታዎች እየተዘዋወሩ እንዲሁም በየትኛውም ሶሺያል ሚዲያ ላይ ምርታቸውን እና አገልጎታቸውን የሚያቀርቡ ግለሰቦችንም ሆነ ድርጅቶችን እያነጋገሩ መረጃዎችን መሰብሰብ በተጨማሪም የፕላትፎርሙን አገልግሎቶች ተጠቃሚ እንዲሆኑ የሚመዘግቡ ባለሙያዎች ይፈልጋል ።

- በማህበራዊ ሚዲያ አጠቃቀም እና የማስተዋወቅ ስራ በቂ እውቀት እና ከተቻለ ልምድ ያለው ባለሙያ ።

- በአጠቃላይ ቴክኖሎጂ በተለይም በማህበራዊ ሚዲያ እና በቴሌግራም ቦት አጠቃቀም እውቀት ያለው እና ለሌሎች ማሳወቅ እና ማስረዳት የሚችል።

የእርስዎ ስራ በቴሌግራም ቦት የምንሰጣቸውን አገልግሎቶች ለሚመለከታቸው ደንበኞች በተለያዩ የኦንላይን ማስተዋወቂያ ሂደቶች እና በአካል በመገኘት ማዳረስ ይሆናል።

ደንበኞችን ማምጣትና መመዝገብ ፣ በማህበራዊ ሚዲያ ማስተዋወቅ ፣ ለደንበኞች የምንሰጣቸውን አገልግሎቶች ማብራራትና አገልግሎታችንን እንዲጠቀሙ ማሳመን ዋናው ሃላፊነታችሁ ይሆናል ።.

- ደፋር, ግፊትን መቋቋምና ኃላፊነትን መውሰድ የሚችል 
- ፆታ : ሁለቱም M/F
- ኮሚሽን በእያንዳንዱ ምዝገባ

- ለመመዝገብ
- ለበለጠ መረጃ

Requirements:
 አሪፍ የሚባል ስልክ እና ፈጣን አንሊሚተድ ኢንተርኔት ተጠቃሚ
Share/Join:

- በማህበራዊ ሚዲያ አጠቃቀም እና የማስተዋወቅ ስራ በቂ እውቀት እና ከተቻለ ልምድ ያለው ባለሙያ ።

- በአጠቃላይ ቴክኖሎጂ በተለይም በማህበራዊ ሚዲያ እና በቴሌግራም ቦት አጠቃቀም እውቀት ያለው እና ለሌሎች ማሳወቅ እና ማስረዳት የሚችል።

የእርስዎ ስራ በቴሌግራም ቦት የምንሰጣቸውን አገልግሎቶች ለሚመለከታቸው ደንበኞች በተለያዩ የኦንላይን ማስተዋወቂያ ሂደቶች እና በአካል በመገኘት ማዳረስ ይሆናል።

ደንበኞችን ማምጣትና መመዝገብ ፣ በማህበራዊ ሚዲያ ማስተዋወቅ ፣ ለደንበኞች የምንሰጣቸውን አገልግሎቶች ማብራራትና አገልግሎታችንን እንዲጠቀሙ ማሳመን ዋናው ሃላፊነታችሁ ይሆናል ።.

- ደፋር, ግፊትን መቋቋምና ኃላፊነትን መውሰድ የሚችል 
- ፆታ : ሁለቱም M/F
- ኮሚሽን በእያንዳንዱ ምዝገባ

- ለመመዝገብ

Requirements:
 አሪፍ የሚባል ስልክ እና ፈጣን አንሊሚተድ ኢንተርኔት ተጠቃሚ
Share/Join:

Job Title: SIDAMA TRANSLATOR 

Salary: Negotiable 

Description:
 We are looking for a talented and experienced English to Sidama translator to join our team. The ideal candidate will have a deep understanding of both languages, as well as a strong command of grammar and syntax. They will also be able to translate complex and technical texts accurately and fluently. 

Role & Responsibilities:
 The primary responsibility of the translator will be to translate a variety of documents from English to Sidama and vice versa. This may include marketing materials, legal documents, technical manuals, and educational resources. The translator will also be required to proofread and edit their translations to ensure that they are of the highest quality.
In addition to their translation skills, the ideal candidate will also be able to work independently and as part of a team. They will be able to meet deadlines and work under pressure. They will also be able to communicate effectively with clients and other team members.

text:
Job Title: Social media manager 

Company:

Salary: 5, 000 ETB 

Description:
 We are seeking a dynamic and creative Social Media Manager and Content Creator to join our team. In this role, you will be responsible for developing and implementing social media strategies, creating engaging content, and managing our online presence to drive brand awareness, engagement, and growth.

Key Responsibilities:

Social Media Management:

1. Strategy Development: Develop and execute a comprehensive social media strategy that aligns with our brand goals and target audience.

2. Content Planning: Create a content calendar and schedule posts across various social media platforms (e.g., Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, Pinterest TikTok...).

3. Content Creation: Produce high-quality and visually appealing content, including text, images, videos, and graphics.

4. Audience Engagement: Engage with our social media community by responding to comments, messages, and fostering discussions.

5. Analytics: Monitor and analyze social media performance metrics and adjust strategies to optimize engagement and reach.

6. Paid Advertising: Manage social media advertising campaigns to boost visibility and reach specific target demographics.

Content Creation:

1. Content Ideation: Brainstorm and generate creative content ideas aligned with our brand identity.

2. Content Production: Create compelling written, visual, and multimedia content, including blog posts, videos, infographics, and more.

3. Research: Stay updated on industry trends and competitors' content to ensure our content remains relevant and competitive.

4. SEO Optimization: Optimize content for search engines to improve visibility and rankings.

Qualifications:

Social Media Manager:

- Proven experience as a social media manager, including the management of social media platforms and the use of social media management tools.
- Excellent knowledge of social media trends, best practices, and analytics.
- Strong communication and interpersonal skills.
- Proficiency in graphic design and content creation tools (e.g., Adobe Creative Suite, Canva...).
- Familiarity with advertising on social media platforms.

Content Creator:

- Proven experience in content creation, preferably in a similar industry.
- Exceptional writing and editing skills.
- Proficiency in creating and editing visual content.
- Understanding of SEO and content optimization.
- Ability to work with various content creation and editing software/tools.

How to Apply:

Please submit your resume, portfolio (if applicable), and a cover letter detailing your relevant experience and why you're a good fit for our team to
or
(telegram)

messages.text:
Job Title: Application Developer with GIS and Taxi App Experience 

Salary: Monthly 

Description:
 We are seeking talented and experienced application developers with a strong background in GIS and taxi app development. As a part of our team, you will play a key role in designing, developing, and maintaining our state-of-the-art app, which leverages GIS technology to provide an exceptional user experience.

Key Responsibilities:

- Collaborate with cross-functional teams to understand project requirements and translate them into scalable, high-performance software solutions.
- Design and develop features and functionalities for our app using your expertise in GIS and mobile application development.
- Optimize app performance and ensure responsiveness across various devices and platforms.
- Troubleshoot and resolve complex technical issues.
Stay up-to-date with emerging technologies and industry trends to continuously improve our products.

Qualifications:

- Strong English communication skills to effectively convey technical concepts and ideas when collaborating with foreign teams.
- Minimum 2 years of proven experience in GIS application development and taxi app development.
- Proficiency in GIS tools and technologies such as ArcGIS, Mapbox, or similar.
- Strong programming skills in languages like Java, Kotlin, Swift, or JavaScript.
- Experience with mobile app development for iOS and Android platforms.
Knowledge of database systems and cloud services (e.g., AWS, Azure, Google Cloud).
- Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
- Ability to work independently and as part of a collaborative team.
Strong communication skills to effectively convey technical concepts and ideas.

What We Offer:

- Competitive salary
- Opportunity to work on innovative projects at the intersection of GIS and transportation.
- Collaborative and supportive work environment.
- Professional growth and development opportunities.
- Chance to make a real impact on the transportation industry.

If you are a highly motivated and experienced application developer with a passion for GIS and Taxi Apps, we invite you to join our team and contribute to the future of transportation

messages.text:
Attention All

Dear users, we are excited to announce that we are taking steps to further enhance the security of our platform, Ethio Remote Jobs. As part of our commitment to providing a safe and secure environment for both employers and employees, we have implemented a new security measure.

When using our bot, you will now be asked to provide your phone number for security purposes. This additional layer of verification is aimed at protecting against fake accounts and unauthorized access by robots. We value the importance of maintaining a secure conversation between employers and employees, and this measure will help us achieve that.

While providing your email is not mandatory, we encourage you to do so to further strengthen the security of your account. Rest assured that your personal information will be kept secure and will not be shared with external parties.

To align with these security enhancements, we are in the process of updating our terms of service and policies. We will provide you with detailed information about these changes soon. We kindly request your cooperation during this transition to ensure the continued security of our platform and our users.

We appreciate your trust and support in Ethio Remote Jobs. Together, let's strengthen our security and create a reliable and secure environment for remote job opportunities.

Thank you.

Salary: Commission + ጥቅማጥቅም 

Description:
 ተጨማሪ ወይም ዋና ገቢ ማግኘት ይፈልጋሉ መልሶ አዎ እንደሚሆን አንጠራጠርም አሁኑኑ ይመዝገቡ። ለመጀመር የሚያስፈልጎን ነገር እኝ እናዘጋጃለን ከእርሶ የሚጠበቀው ኢንተርኔት እና ስልኮን በመጠቀም ምርቶቻችንን ያስተዋውቁ ከሚሸጡት እያንዳንድ እቃ ጠቀም ያለ ኮሚሽን ያግኙ። 

-ጊዜ የማይወስድ ባሉበት ሆነው የሚሰሩት 

ከኝጋ መስራት የምትፈልጉ በ

 energetic friendly committed to work

Description:
 We are looking for a highly motivated and experienced English to Oromo and vice versa translator to join our team. The ideal candidate will have a strong understanding of both languages and cultures, as well as the ability to produce accurate and high-quality translations in a timely manner 

Requirements:
 -Native in Oromo
-At least 3 years of experience in English to Oromo and vice versa translation
-Excellent writing and editing skills
-Ability to work independently and as part of a team
-Strong attention to detail and accuracy
-Proficiency in using CAT tools is a plus 

Role & Responsibilities:
 -Translate a variety of documents from English to Oromo and vice versa
-Proofread and edit translations for accuracy and consistency
-Stay up-to-date on the latest translation technologies and best practices

messages.text:
-------------Closed/Hired-------------

Job Title: BACKEND DEVELOPER 

Salary: 7,000 ETB 

Description:
 We are seeking a highly skilled Backend Developer to join our team and play a crucial role in enhancing and maintaining our existing gaming website. In this role, you will be responsible for working on the website's API, implementing updates, adding new features, and handling integrations. Please note that this is not a ground-up development position; instead, you will be working on an already existing website to improve its functionality and user experience. 

Requirements:
 - Proven experience as a Backend Developer or similar role.
- Strong proficiency in backend technologies such as Node.js, Python, or PHP.
- Experience with database management systems, including MySQL or PostgreSQL.
- Familiarity with API development and integration.
- Knowledge of version control systems, such as Git.
- Problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
- Excellent communication and teamwork abilities.
- Ability to work on an existing codebase and adapt to different programming 

Role & Responsibilities:
 1. Collaborate with the current development team to understand the existing codebase, database structure, and APIs.

2. Implement updates and enhancements to the website, ensuring its smooth operation and improved performance.

3. Work on API development, ensuring seamless communication between different components of the website and external services.

4. Integrate new features and functionalities into the website, focusing on user engagement and experience.

5. Troubleshoot and debug issues as they arise, providing efficient solutions to maintain website uptime.

6. Optimize code and database queries for improved speed and efficiency.

7. Collaborate with the frontend and game developers to ensure a seamless user experience across the entire platform.

text:
Job Title: Social media Promoter 

Description:
 As a social media promoter you will play a crucial role in developing and implementing effective marketing strategies to enhance our online presence and drive brand awareness. We are looking for a dynamic and creative individual who is passionate about digital marketing and possesses strong analytical skill 

Requirements:
 using social media platforms and having access to smart phone and internet in order to find customers and promote our company 

Role & Responsibilities:
 1. Develop and execute online marketing campaigns across various platforms, including social media, email marketing, search engine optimization (SEO), and content marketing.
2. Conduct market research to identify target audiences and create tailored marketing strategies to reach them effectively.
3. Monitor and analyze website traffic, conversion rates, and other key performance indicators to optimize marketing efforts and improve ROI.
4. Manage and grow our social media presence by crafting compelling posts, engaging with our followers, and leveraging social media analytics to drive engagement.if you meet the requirements contact us for more info

Company: Unity Market 

Salary: Commission 

Requirements:
 •Able to work at home and the candidates must have their own  smart phone & internet access 
•Must have a basic understanding about social market place apps like FB marketplace, Afrotie, JiJi and other related market place applications.
•Multi-tasking and time-management skills, with the ability to prioritize tasks.
•Ability to work in a fast-paced, high-pressure environment
• women's are highly encouraged

•Communicating with social media followers and potential costumers , including responding to queries in a timely manner.
•Preparing weekly reports about  the progress and flow of costumers based on the market places accounts analytical tools.
•Suggesting recommendations to adjust the social media marketing strategy for optimal results.

-------------Closed/Hired-------------

Job Title: Full stack software engineer 

Company: Private Company 

Salary: Negotiation 

Description:
 We are looking for a talented and experienced Full Stack Software Engineer to join our team. As a Full Stack Software Engineer, you will be responsible for developing and maintaining high-quality software applications. You will work closely with our product team to design, develop, and deploy new features and enhancements.

Responsibilities:
- Develop and maintain high-quality software applications using modern programming languages and frameworks.
- Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features.
- Write clean, maintainable, and efficient code.
- Troubleshoot and debug applications to resolve issues.
- Ensure the technical feasibility of UI/UX designs.

Requirements:
- Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field.
- Proven experience as a Full Stack Software Engineer or similar role.
- Strong programming skills in multiple languages such as JavaScript, Python, etc.
- Experience with front-end frameworks such as React, Angular, or Vue.js is helpful
- Experience with back-end frameworks such as Node.js
- Familiarity with databases (e.g., MySQL, MongoDB).
- Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
- Ability to work under pressure and deliver high-quality results.

How to Apply:
Send your CV and a scanned copy of your Computer science or related degree.

messages.text:
-------------Closed/Hired-------------

Job Title: Business Partner for Collaborative Project 

Salary: revenue share/split 

Description:
 We are seeking a dynamic and motivated individual to join our team as a Business Partner. In this role, you will have the opportunity to combine your skills and expertise with ours to work collaboratively on a project. As the project achieves success, we will explore revenue-sharing opportunities. This is an exciting opportunity for someone who is passionate about entrepreneurship, eager to contribute their ideas, and ready to be a part of a thriving business venture. 

Requirements:
 1. Proven experience in a relevant field (e.g., entrepreneurship, business development, marketing, etc.).
2. Strong business acumen and strategic thinking abilities.
3. Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
4. Ability to work well in a team environment and collaborate effectively with diverse individuals.
5. Demonstrated track record of generating revenue or contributing to the financial success of a project.
6. Creative and innovative mindset, with a passion for problem-solving.
7. Strong analytical skills and the ability to translate data into actionable insights.
8. Self-motivated and results-oriented, with a drive to achieve targets and exceed expectations.
9. Flexibility and adaptability to evolve with a rapidly changing business landscape.
10. Proven ability to work independently and take ownership of assigned tasks. 

Role & Responsibilities:
 1. Collaborate with the existing team to develop and execute a comprehensive business plan.
2. Contribute innovative ideas and strategies to enhance the project's growth and revenue potential.
3. Participate in regular meetings to discuss progress, challenges, and opportunities for improvement.
4. Assist in market research and analysis to identify target customers and refine business strategies.
5. Help establish and maintain strategic partnerships with key stakeholders and potential clients.
6. Contribute to the development and implementation of marketing and promotional campaigns.
7. Monitor industry trends and competitor activities to stay ahead in the market.
8. Actively participate in decision-making processes and provide valuable input on key business decisions.

-------------Closed/Hired-------------

Job Title: E wallet integration developer 

Description:
 Job Description:
We are seeking a skilled E-Wallet/Payment Gateway Integration Specialist to join our team and integrate e-wallet and payment gateway functionality into our gambling website. As an gambling website E-Wallet/Payment Gateway Integration Specialist, you will be responsible for seamlessly integrating and configuring the chosen e-wallet and payment gateway solutions to facilitate smooth and secure payment transactions on our platform. You will collaborate with cross-functional teams, including developers, designers, and project managers, to ensure a seamless user experience and efficient payment processing. 

Role & Responsibilities:
 - Research and select the most suitable e-wallet and payment gateway solutions for our website.
- Coordinate with the chosen e-wallet and payment gateway providers to set up the necessary accounts and obtain API credentials.
- Collaborate with the development team to integrate the e-wallet and payment gateway APIs into our website's backend systems.
- Configure the e-wallet and payment gateway settings, including currency selection, transaction limits, and security parameters.
- Test and troubleshoot the e-wallet and payment gateway integration to ensure proper functionality across different scenarios.

Job Title: : Game Developer 

Salary: 7,000 ETB 

Description:
 you will be responsible for designing, developing, and integrating exciting, high-quality games into our platform. These games will seamlessly connect with e-wallets and payment processors, allowing for instant bets, real-time updates of user balances, and secure processing of transactions. Your role will be critical in delivering a smooth and immersive gaming experience, ensuring that user bets and losses are accurately recorded and managed within the platform. 

Role & Responsibilities:
 Collaborate with our development team to design and create captivating games, including but not limited to roulette, card games, and high-score-based games.
Integrate e-wallets and payment processors to facilitate instant deposits, withdrawals, and payouts within the games.
Develop game functionalities that provide real-time updates of user balances, ensuring an accurate reflection of their financial status.
Implement systems to record and manage user bets and losses, with a seamless flow of funds to and from the platform's e-wallet.
Ensure the security and integrity of payment transactions within the games, adhering to industry standards and best practices.
Collaborate with payment processing specialists to troubleshoot and resolve any payment-related issues.
Optimize game performance and responsiveness, providing an exceptional gaming experience to users.
Stay updated on emerging technologies and trends in the gaming and payment integration landscape.

Description:
 As a Gambling Games Developer/Provider, your pivotal role involves crafting and integrating captivating games into our platform. These games should seamlessly merge with our website's backend, enabling smooth and instant betting experiences with real-time balance updates.

 Game Integration: Develop and provide top-quality gambling games that seamlessly integrate with our website's backend. These games should seamlessly communicate with our platform, ensuring a hassle-free user experience.

By fulfilling these responsibilities, you'll play a crucial role in delivering an exceptional gaming environment. Join us in shaping the future of online gambling, where integration, instant betting, and real-time balance updates are at the forefront of our user experience.

messages.text:
Attention Employers!

If you receive a message that says "username not found" when clicking on an applicant's name, please do not worry! This simply means that the applicant does not have a Telegram username linked to their account. However, this does not mean that they are inactive or cannot be contacted. You can still communicate with them through the messaging feature "Talk to user" within our platform's bot. 

Additionally, we encourage users to create a username to enhance their experience and personalize their interactions with our platform. 

Thank you for your understanding.

ከእርሶ የሚጠበቀው ኢንተርኔት እና  ስልኮን በመጠቀም ምርቶቻችንን ያስተዋውቁ ከሚሸጡት እያንዳንድ እቃ ጠቀም ያለ ኮሚሽን ያግኙ።
ከኝጋ መስራት የምትፈልጉ በ

inbox ላይ

ላይ ይደውሉልን።

Job Title: English to Amharic (Urgent) 

Description:
 We are currently seeking a highly skilled English to Amharic Translator to join our team. The ideal candidate will have extensive experience in translation, specifically from English to Amharic, and possess a deep understanding of both languages. The successful candidate must be proficient in using Computer-Assisted Translation (CAT) tools to enhance efficiency and accuracy in their work. Additionally, the candidate must have access to a personal computer and stable internet connection to facilitate seamless communication and timely delivery of translations. We are looking for a dedicated individual who is always available to take on translation assignments promptly and deliver high-quality work within specified deadlines.

Requirements:
- Fluency in English and Amharic languages, with excellent written and verbal communication skills.
- Proven experience in translation, preferably with a focus on English to Amharic translations.
- Proficiency in using CAT tools such as SDL Trados Studio, MemoQ, or similar software.
- Access to a personal computer and a stable internet connection.
- Strong attention to detail and ability to maintain consistency in terminology and style.
- Ability to work independently, manage time effectively, and meet tight deadlines.
- Availability to take on translation assignments promptly and deliver high-quality work consistently.

Rate is Negotiable

messages.text:
-------------Closed/Hired-------------

Job Title: Fullstack Developer 

Salary: Negotiation 

Description:
 We are seeking a skilled and experienced Fullstack Developer to join our team and play a pivotal role in the development and maintenance of our website/platform. The ideal candidate will possess a strong background in web development, particularly in integrating payment gateways, digital wallets, referral systems, and third-party APIs. You will work closely with our cross-functional team to enhance the user experience and ensure seamless functionality. 

Requirements:
 1. Integration of Payment Systems: Integrate Chapa and digital wallet/e-wallet systems to facilitate secure and efficient payment processing on the platform.

2. Referral System: Design and implement a referral system that allows users to track referrals through unique referral links, rewarding them accordingly.

3. Flask and Python Development: Utilize Flask and Python to develop and maintain the website's backend infrastructure.

4. User Communication: Implement mechanisms to send  referral links and notifications through SMS or email to enhance user engagement.

5. Digital Currency Handling: Develop solutions to store and manage digital currencies securely within the platform.

6.Payment Gateways and Chapa Integration: Proficiency in working with various payment gateways and the ability to seamlessly integrate Chapa within our system to ensure smooth payment transactions and compliance with industry standards.

7. Third-Party APIs: Integrate third-party software APIs to enhance the platform's functionality and user experience.

8. Withdrawal Funnel: Create a user-friendly and efficient withdrawal funnel that seamlessly integrates with the e-wallet system, ensuring a smooth and hassle-free experience for users. 

Role & Responsibilities:
 - Proficiency in web development technologies, including HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and related frameworks.
- Strong experience with Python and Flask for backend development.
- Knowledge of payment gateways and digital wallet integration (e.g., Chapa).
- Familiarity with referral system implementation and tracking.
- Ability to send access codes and referral links through SMS or email.
- Experience in handling and storing digital currencies securely.
- Understanding of payment processors and financial transactions.
- Expertise in integrating third-party software APIs.

text:
Job Title: Video and photo editor 

Company: Ashed Media 

Description:
 We are seeking a skilled Video and Photo Editor to join our production company on a remote basis. As a remote editor, you will work independently, collaborating with our team to edit and enhance video and photo content. The ideal candidate is highly creative, detail-oriented, and possesses strong technical skills in video and photo editing software. This is an excellent opportunity for a self-motivated individual who wants to contribute to exciting projects from the comfort of their own workspace.

Responsibilities:
1. Edit and enhance video footage and photographs according to project requirements and creative vision.
2. Collaborate closely with the production team to understand project objectives and deliver high-quality editing results.
3. Organize and maintain a digital library of video and photo assets for easy access and retrieval.
4. Ensure all edited content meets technical specifications and quality standards for various platforms (web, social media, broadcast, etc.).
5. Apply color correction, audio enhancement, visual effects, and other post-production techniques to enhance the overall quality of the content.
6. Stay updated with the latest trends and techniques in video and photo editing to continuously improve skills and contribute innovative ideas.
7. Communicate effectively with the team, providing regular updates on project progress and addressing any concerns or issues that may arise.
8. Manage multiple projects simultaneously, prioritize tasks, and meet deadlines efficiently.


Requirements:
1. Strong proficiency in video and photo editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Lightroom, etc.).
2. Demonstrated experience in editing video and photo content, with a portfolio or examples showcasing previous work.
3. Proficient in color correction, audio editing, visual effects, and other post-production techniques.
4. Excellent understanding of video and photo composition, lighting, and storytelling principles.
5. Ability to work independently and efficiently manage time and deadlines.
6. Strong communication and collaboration skills to effectively work with remote teams and clients.
7. Attention to detail and a keen eye for visual aesthetics.
8. Reliable internet connection and personal laptop/desktop computer capable of handling video and photo editing software.
9. Familiarity with different video and photo formats, codecs, and compression techniques.

 In this role, you will be responsible for developing and executing sales and marketing campaigns for our dealership. You will work closely with our sales team to generate leads, nurture prospects, and close deals. You will also be responsible for creating and managing our social media presence, developing email marketing campaigns, and designing and distributing print and digital marketing materials.

text: Introducing

, Your road to settled remote success🚀

Dear valued users and community members, We are excited to announce the rebranding of our remote jobs platform from "Ethio Remote Jobs" to Maroset. With this new name, we are taking a bold step forward in our mission to provide a seamless and secure experience for job seekers and employers in the remote job market.

Maroset, derived from our powerful slogan "Making all road obstacles settled," embodies our commitment to providing you with a seamless and empowering remote job search experience. We understand that the remote job market can be overwhelming and uncertain, and our platform is here to make your journey smoother and more successful.

But Maroset is more than just a name change. It represents our dedication to innovation, exceptional customer service, and continuous improvement. What sets Maroset apart is our focus on stability and security. 

Stay tuned for updates, new features, and exclusive opportunities as we unveil the full potential of Maroset. 

Welcome to Maroset where all obstacles are settled, and your remote success begins!

Together, let's make your road to remote jobs market settled with Maroset.

-------------Closed/Hired-------------

Job Title: Somali to English Video Transcription Specialist(URGENT) 

Salary: Negotiable 

Description:
 We are currently seeking a highly skilled and experienced Somali to English Video Transcription Specialist to join our team. As a transcription specialist, your role will be to accurately transcribe audio and video content from Somali to English. You will be responsible for capturing the spoken words and translating them into written form, ensuring that the transcriptions are of the highest quality and adhere to our company's standards.

The ideal candidate for this position will have a strong command of both the Somali and English languages, with the ability to understand and accurately capture the content and context of the videos. Proficiency in using transcription software and tools is essential, as you will be working with large volumes of video content. Attention to detail, reliability, and the ability to work under tight deadlines are also crucial skills for this role. If you are a meticulous and skilled transcriptionist with a passion for accuracy and delivering high-quality work, we would love to hear from you.

text:
Job Title: Education Consultancy Intern (unpaid) 

Company: Edu Academics 

Description:
 Are you passionate about helping students pursue their dreams of studying abroad? Do you have a solid understanding of the education consultancy process, from applications to visa procedures? If so, we have an exciting opportunity for you!

Position Overview:
As an Education Consultancy Intern, you will play a pivotal role in assisting students through every step of their journey to study abroad. Your responsibilities will encompass a wide range of tasks related to the application and visa process, ensuring that students receive the guidance and support they need to succeed. This is an unpaid internship, ideal for candidates with prior experience or a strong understanding of the education consultancy field. 

Requirements:
 Prior experience in education consultancy or a solid understanding of the application and visa process.
Strong organizational skills with the ability to manage multiple tasks.
Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
Attention to detail and a commitment to accuracy.
Self-motivated with a passion for assisting students in achieving their educational goals.

How to Apply:
If you are enthusiastic about helping students realize their dreams of studying abroad and possess the qualifications and skills required for this role, we encourage you to apply. Please submit your resume along with a cover letter highlighting your relevant experience and explaining your interest in this internship.

Note: This is an unpaid internship position. The successful candidate will have the opportunity to gain valuable experience and references in the education consultancy field. 

Role & Responsibilities:
 Student Guidance: Provide comprehensive guidance to students regarding course selection, application procedures, and visa requirements.

Application Management: Assist students in completing university applications, including personal statements, recommendation letters, and other necessary documents.

Visa Support: Guide students through the visa application process, ensuring that they meet all requirements and deadlines.

Documentation: Maintain accurate and organized student records, including application documents, visa applications, and correspondence.

Research: Stay updated on international education trends, scholarship opportunities, and changes in visa regulations.

Communication: Maintain clear and prompt communication with students, educational institutions, and visa authorities.

Problem Solving: Address any issues or challenges that students may encounter during the application and visa process.

Approved by

text:
Dear Employers, We understand that unpaid internships can be a great opportunity for both the employer and the intern. However, we want to ensure that the intern is receiving valuable experience and benefits from the internship, even if there is no financial compensation.
When posting an unpaid internship opportunity on our platform, please specify the non-financial benefits and compensations that the intern will receive. This could include;

- Hands-on experience in a specific field or industry
- Opportunities to network with professionals in the industry
- The chance to develop new skills and knowledge
- Access to training and development programs
- Potential paid interns/jobs
- Certification 
- A reference or recommendation letter upon completion of the internship

It is important to us that interns are not being taken advantage of or exploited through unpaid internships. If there are no non-financial benefits and compensations offered, we are sorry but WE CANNOT APPROVE SUCH JOBS.
We're updating our terms of service and policies regarding this issue and we'll announce soon.

Thank you for your understanding and commitment to providing valuable opportunities for interns.

Job Title: Sales Person 

Company: Liqa Technologies

Description:
 We are looking for an experienced software sales person who can manage our software sales process from start to finish. You will be responsible for approaching potential customers, generating leads, conducting product demonstrations, persuading and closing deals. You should have a solid knowledge of software and possess excellent marketing skills. You should also be able to communicate effectively, creatively and artistically with various stakeholders.

- Ability to work independently and as part of a team.
- Passionate about software and innovation.

text:
Attention dear valued users

We are thrilled to have been serving our community for nearly a year now, providing a free platform for remote job opportunities. However, we have recently received reports of online sales job positions that have caused some concerns among our users.

To ensure the safety and security of our community, we have implemented rigorous verification systems as you know. But to further strengthen our users' safety, we have decided to charge a nominal fee of ETB100 per each online sales, online promotions, and digital marketing job position posted on our platform. Please note that all other job postings will continue to be FREE as usual. This fee is not aimed to generate a revenue, but solely aimed at protecting our users from potential scams and fraudulent job postings.

We hope you can appreciate our commitment to providing a safe and secure platform for remote job opportunities. This update reflects our unwavering commitment to creating a trusted and transparent platform for remote job seekers and employers alike.

Your safety is our utmost priority, and we will continually strive to provide you with the best possible experience on Maroset.

Thank you for your continued support and trust in our platform.

Any questions regarding this update, contact us here
The Maroset Team.

messages.text:
Maroset ባለሞያዎች ባሉበት ሆነው በኦንላይን ዘርፈ ብዙ የስራ ዕድሎች ላይ ተቀጥረው መስራት የሚችሉበት እንዲሁም ቀጣሪዎች ወይም አሰሪዎች በኦንላይን ብቁ ባለሞያዎችን ቀጥረው ማሰራት የሚችሉበት ምቹ መድረክ ነው።

✨በዚህ ፕላትፎርም ሁሉም ስራዎች የሚሰሩት በኦንላይን ባሉበት ሆነው ነው።

Job Title: Client Acquisition Specialist 

Company: Upsurge Tech 

Salary: Per sale is negotiable based on your experience and track record 

Description:
 We are seeking a Client Acquisition Specialist to join our dynamic software development company. In this role, you will be responsible for identifying and bringing in new clients who require our software development services. You will play a crucial role in expanding our client base and ensuring the continued growth of our business. The ideal candidate will possess excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
Knowledge on software development is a bonus. 

Role & Responsibilities:
 - Identify and research potential clients and industries that could benefit from our software development services.
- Generate leads through various channels, including online research, networking events, referrals, and cold outreach.
- Engage with potential clients through phone calls, emails, and in-person meetings to introduce our company's services and capabilities.

Approved by

messages.text:
-------------Closed/Hired-------------

Job Title: Content Creator/Manager (VIDEO EDITOR) 

Salary: 10,000 ETB 

Description:
 We are seeking a Content Creator/Manager and video editor. The ideal candidate is proficient in various aspects of content creation and social media management. They should be skilled in video editing, audio enhancement, cutting silences, color grading, transitions, basic motion graphics, overlay effects (light leaks/glitches), accurate sound design, and possess a deep understanding of our video editing style and branding and can use AI voiceover or personal voiceover on the videos. The candidate is also required to have prior editing experience. 

Requirements:
 Proficiency in video editing software such as Adobe Premiere, After Effects, CapCut, Davinci Resolve, Final Cut Pro, etc.
Strong skills in audio enhancement, color grading, transitions, and motion graphics.
Familiarity with overlay effects (light leaks/glitches) and sound design.
An understanding of YouTube pacing and audience engagement.
Knowledge of our branding and video editing style. 

Role & Responsibilities:
 Strategy Development: Develop and execute a comprehensive social media strategy that aligns with our brand goals and target audience.

Content Planning: Create a content calendar and schedule posts across various social media platforms (e.g., Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, Pinterest, TikTok...).

Content Creation: Produce high-quality and visually appealing content, including text, images, videos, and graphics.

Audience Engagement: Engage with our social media community by responding to comments, messages, and fostering discussions.

Analytics: Monitor and analyze social media performance metrics and adjust strategies to optimize engagement and reach.                        

Content Ideation: Brainstorm and generate creative content ideas aligned with our brand identity.

Content Production: Create compelling written, visual, and multimedia content, including blog posts, videos, infographics, and more.

Research: Stay updated on industry trends and competitors' content to ensure our content remains relevant and competitive.

SEO Optimization: Optimize content for search engines to improve visibility and rankings.

-------------Closed/Hired-------------

Job Title: ReactNative developer 

Salary: 10,000-15,000 

Description:
 Key Responsibilities:

1.Develop and maintain high-quality React Native applications for both iOS and Android.
2.Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and bring innovative mobile solutions to life.
3.Implement modern and reusable UI components and libraries.
4.Integrate third-party APIs and cloud services, with a focus on Azure services.
5.Ensure that code follows latest coding standards and achieve maximum performance on mobile devices.
6.Implement Continuous Integration and Continuous Deployment (CI/CD) using Azure DevOps.
7.Handle application testing, bug fixing, and improving application performance.
8.Stay up-to-date with the latest industry trends, technologies, and best practices in mobile application development and cloud services.
Requirements:

1.Proven experience as a React Native developer, with a portfolio of released applications on the App Store and Google Play.
2.Solid understanding of the React Native framework and its core principles.
3.Proficient in writing maintainable and modular JavaScript code.
4.Experience with popular React state management libraries (such as Redux or MobX).
Familiarity with native build tools, like Xcode and Android Studio.
5.Hands-on experience with Azure cloud services such as Azure Functions, Azure App Service, and Azure Cosmos DB.
6.Experience with Azure DevOps for CI/CD is a strong plus.
Ability to work in a fast-paced, agile development environment..Excellent communication skills, both verbal and written.
10.Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field. 

Requirements:
 PLEASE DON'T APPLY IF YOU DON'T HAVE THE ALL SKILLS  MENTIONED AS THERE WILL BE WRITTEN EXAM PLUS ONE ON ONE INTERVIEW , SO PLEASE DON'T WASTE OUR TIME IF YOU DON'T HAVE THE NECCESARY SKILLS

messages.text:
-------------Closed/Hired-------------

Job Title: Social Media Manager 

Company: ጉብል ሚዲያ 

Salary: 1600 

Description:
 As a Social Media Manager, your primary responsibility will be to create and curate engaging content for various social media platforms such as Facebook, YouTube, TikTok, and Instagram. You will be responsible for creating clip videos that highlight different trends or news from these platforms and optimizing them for maximum reach and engagement. Additionally, you will also be responsible for posting informative and engaging text-based news content on our Facebook page. Here are the key responsibilities and qualifications for this role: 

Requirements:
 - Proven experience as a Social Media Manager or similar role.
- Strong knowledge and understanding of various social media platforms, trends, and best practices.
- Proficiency in video editing software or tools to create clip videos.
- Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
- Creative mindset with the ability to think outside the box and generate engaging content ideas.
- Familiarity with SEO principles and strategies to optimize social media posts for higher visibility.
- Strong organizational and time management skills to handle multiple tasks and meet deadlines.
- Analytical skills to track and measure the performance of social media content.
- Ability to work independently and as part of a team. 

Role & Responsibilities:
 - Create compelling clip videos that showcase trending topics or news from YouTube, TikTok, Instagram, and other relevant platforms.
- Edit and optimize the clip videos to ensure high-quality content that appeals to our target audience.
- Develop and implement a content strategy that aligns with our brand identity and objectives.
- Stay up-to-date with current trends and news across various social media platforms.
- Research and identify relevant topics and news articles to share on our Facebook page.
- Write and publish engaging text-based posts to accompany the clip videos and news articles.
- Monitor and analyze the performance of social media content using analytics tools.
- Engage with our social media community by responding to comments, messages, and inquiries in a timely and professional manner.
- Collaborate with other team members, such as graphic designers or copywriters, to create cohesive and impactful social media campaigns.

text:
Job Title: NUER TRANSLATOR 

Salary: Negotiable 

Description:
 We are currently seeking a highly skilled English to Nuer Translator to join our team. The ideal candidate will have extensive experience in translation, specifically from English to Nuer, and possess a deep understanding of both languages. The successful candidate must be proficient in using Computer-Assisted Translation (CAT) tools to enhance efficiency and accuracy in their work. Additionally, the candidate must have access to a personal computer and stable internet connection to facilitate seamless communication and timely delivery of translations. We are looking for a dedicated individual who is always available to take on translation assignments promptly and deliver high-quality work within specified deadlines. 

Requirements:
 - Fluency in English and Nuer languages, with excellent written and verbal communication skills.
- Proven experience in translation, preferably with a focus on English to Nuer translations.
- Proficiency in using CAT tools such as SDL Trados Studio, MemoQ, or similar software.
- Access to a personal computer and a stable internet connection.
- Strong attention to detail and ability to maintain consistency in terminology and style.
- Ability to work independently, manage time effectively, and meet tight deadlines.
- Availability to take on translation assignments promptly and deliver high-quality work consistently.

Rate is Negotiable
Approved by

Job Title: Full Stack Developer 

Salary: 15,000 - 25,000 ETB (based on your experience) 

Description:
 We are seeking a highly skilled and experienced Senior Full Stack Developer.
As a Senior Full Stack Developer, you will be responsible for designing and developing complex web applications using MERN.  

Requirements:
 -Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field
-At least 2 years of experience in software development, with a focus on full stack development using MERN.
-Strong understanding of Object-Oriented Programming (OOP) principles and design patterns
-Experience with version control systems such as Git
-Excellent communication skills and ability to work collaboratively with cross-functional teams -Good understanding of user experience design and development on Android 
-Experience with third-party libraries and APIs
-Analytical skills with a good problem-solving attitude  

Role & Responsibilities:
 -Design, develop and deploy scalable and efficient applications using MERN.
-Collaborate with cross-functional teams to identify and implement innovative solutions
-Write clean, maintainable, and well-documented code
-Optimize applications for performance and scalability
-Participate in code review and provide constructive feedback to team members
-Stay up-to-date with emerging trends and technologies in software development  

If you are a passionate and skilled Full Stack Developer with expertise in
MonogDB, NodeJs, React, and Express.js we encourage you to apply.

Apply using this Google form:

messages.text:
-------------Closed/Hired-------------

Job Title: Front-End Developer 

Company: Zare Innovations 

Salary: 15000 

Description:
 We are looking for a skilled Angular Front-End Developer with a minimum of three years of hands-on experience in designing and developing dynamic web applications. The ideal candidate will have strong expertise in Angular and its ecosystem, as well as a good understanding of .NET C# for integration purposes.

Key Responsibilities:

1. Angular Development:

* Develop high-quality, responsive web applications using Angular.
* Eye for detail and ability to replicate Figma UI into code
* Optimize applications for maximum speed and scalability.
* Maintain a comprehensive understanding of the latest trends and best practices in Angular.

2. Integration with Backend:

* Integrate front-end applications with .NET C# services/APIs.
* Coordinate with back-end developers to define and integrate RESTful APIs.

3. Code & Quality Management:

* Ensure code quality by writing unit and integration tests.
* Adhere to best coding standards and practices.
* Participate in peer code reviews.

4. Collaboration & Communication:

* Collaborate with UX/UI designers to implement design into the application.
* Communicate effectively with project managers, designers, and developers to deliver optimal solutions.
* Provide technical support to project stakeholders.

Qualifications & Experience:

1. A minimum of 3 years of professional experience in Angular development.
2. Strong proficiency in JavaScript/TypeScript.
3. Experience with common Angular workflows (like NgRx and RxJS).
4. Familiarity with .NET C# and its ecosystem would be a significant advantage.
5. Knowledge of CSS preprocessors like SASS or LESS.
6. Experience with responsive and adaptive design.
7. Familiarity with RESTful API integration.
8. Good understanding of Git and version control techniques.

Desirable Skills:

1. Knowledge of other front-end frameworks/libraries like React or Vue.js.
2. Experience with .NET Core and Entity Framework.
3. Familiarity with Azure or other cloud platforms.
4. Knowledge of state management solutions in Angular.

Personal Attributes:

1. Strong problem-solving skills.
2. Good communication and team collaboration skills.
3. A passion for continuous learning and staying updated with the latest in technology.
4. Attention to detail and a commitment to producing high-quality work.

Job Title: Software developer 

Salary: 15,000 ETB 

Description:
 We are in search of an experienced and highly skilled software developer to join our team. In this role, you will work closely with our development team to design, develop, and maintain complex software solutions. Your expertise in creating and working with APIs, building user-friendly interfaces, and collaborating with cross-functional teams will be invaluable. If you're a passionate and creative developer with a commitment to delivering high-quality software, we encourage you to apply. 

Requirements:
 Proficiency in developing/creating and managing databases for APIs.
- Strong experience in developing and working with APIs.- Demonstrated ability to design and develop user-friendly software interfaces.
- Excellent collaboration and communication skills to work effectively in cross-functional teams.- Proven track record of delivering high-quality software solutions on time.
.- Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
- A desire to contribute to cutting-edge software projects in a collaborative and dynamic environment. 

Role & Responsibilities:
 Focus on utilizing your expertise to create and manage the database for a specific API.
- Collaborate with a dedicated and cross-functional development team, which will handle other aspects of the project.- Design, develop, and maintain the API components you are responsible for, ensuring their functionality and performance.
- Work closely with the team to integrate your API components into the overall software solution.-

- Work closely with the team to integrate your API components into the overall software solution.-

text:
Job Title: Experienced Online Trainer for Peachtree Accounting and IFRS 

Salary: Negotiable 

Description:
 We are currently seeking an experienced and knowledgeable Online Trainer to join our team. This is an excellent opportunity for individuals passionate about teaching and sharing their expertise in Peachtree Accounting and IFRS. 

Requirements:
 - Bachelor's or Master's degree in Accounting and Finance.
- Minimum of one year of experience as an Online Trainer or similar role in the field of finance and accounting.
- Proven expertise in Peachtree Accounting software and International Financial Reporting Standards (IFRS).
- Strong communication and presentation skills, with the ability to explain complex concepts in a clear and understandable manner.
- Excellent organizational and time management skills.
- Reliable internet connection and appropriate equipment for delivering online training sessions. 

Role & Responsibilities:
 - Develop and deliver high-quality online training sessions on Peachtree Accounting and IFRS.
- Create engaging course content, including presentations, videos, and interactive materials.
- Provide guidance and support to learners, answering their questions and clarifying concepts.
- Assess and evaluate learners' progress, providing constructive feedback.
- Stay updated with the latest industry trends and developments in Peachtree Accounting and IFRS.

Previous Portfolios:
- Please provide previous portfolios or examples of your work in the field of Peachtree Accounting and IFRS. This could include course materials, videos, or any other relevant content that showcases your expertise.

How to Apply:
If you meet the qualifications and have the required experience, we would love to hear from you. Please send your resume, along with a brief cover letter highlighting your relevant experience and previous portfolios.

Note: 
1. If you don't fulfill the above criteria, please don't contact us

Approved by

text:
-------------Closed/Hired-------------

Job Title: Internship Graphics Designer 

Company: ZERGAW CLOUD 

Description:
 The Intern Graphics Designer/Video Editor is responsible for creating and executing graphic design projects for a variety of marketing materials, including websites, brochures, flyers, and social media posts. The ideal candidate should possess a strong understanding of design principles and software applications, along with the ability to work both independently and as part of a team.

Responsibilities

  * Create and execute graphic design projects for a variety of marketing materials;
  * Work on Video and motion graphics for various media outlets;
  * Work with clients to gather requirements and create design concepts;
  * Use Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator, After effects, Premier pro etc.) to create designs;
  * Collaborate with other marketing team members to ensure that designs are consistent with the company's branding;
  * Meet deadlines and budget requirements;
  * Stay up-to-date on the latest design trends and technologies.

Flexible candidates with additional experience in (or an interest to learn)
social media content management are highly encouraged.

Required Skills and Qualifications  

  * Certificate, diploma or degree in a field covering graphics design 
  *  Minimum of 1 year of professional experience in graphic design  
  * Strong understanding of design principles and software applications
  * Excellent communication and collaboration skills
  * Ability to work independently and as part of a team
  * Attention to detail and a keen eye for design
  *  Graphic design certification is a plus
  *  Working knowledge of Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Illustrator, After Effects, and Premiere Pro is mandatory;
  * Good interpersonal, time management, multi-tasking, and work prioritization skills;
  * Proficiency in MS Office (Microsoft Word, Excel, Outlook, and PowerPoint).

Preferred Skills  
  * Good knowledge of various digital marketing and analytics tools, ERP/CRM systems, and content management systems;
  * Professional certifications and prior experience in content development for media post
  * Proven skills in task prioritization and organization.

To apply:

To submit your application, kindly follow the link above. We kindly request that interested candidates complete this online form by November 15, 2023. Your prompt response will be greatly appreciated.

messages.text:
-------------Closed/Hired-------------

Job Title: Flutter developer 

Salary: 50,000 ETB 

Description:
 Looking for four very experienced flutter developers to build an iOS and Android mobile app. If you do not have experience for both, please do not apply. Must be able to download apps you have built via PlayStore and App Store, and view code base. If selected to interview, there will be 3 different rounds. Your compensation will start at 50,000ETB net a month. 

Requirements:
 • Flutter Development: 2+ years (Required) 
• Mobile App Development: 2+ years (Required) 

Role & Responsibilities:
 • Have two or more iOS/Android apps developed with Flutter
• 5+ years in mobile software development
• Experience with third-party libraries and APIs
• Experience with automated testing and building
• Experience with Git, or another version control tools
• Ability to write readable code, create extensive documentation for existing code, and refactor the previously written code into readable state
• Have published one or more mobile apps in both Google Play and App Store
• Working knowledge of the general mobile landscape, architectures, trends, and emerging technologies
• Solid understanding of the full mobile development life cycle, including automated testing and building
• Flutter Development: 2 year (Required)
• Mobile App Development: 2 years (Required)
• Java/Kotlin/Swift experience
• Experience with optimizing applications for Material Design

text:
Job Title: Remote Graphic Design and Social Media Internship at a US based Startup 

Company: Evoli Tech 

Salary: 10,000 ETB 

Description:
 Overview:
Join our vibrant startup team as an intern where you will take on a dual role encompassing both Social Media Marketing and Graphic Design. This position is ideal for a highly creative, digitally savvy individual who is keen on gaining extensive hands-on experience in both fields.

Responsibilities:

Social Media Marketing:

- Develop and implement a content calendar for our social media platforms.
- Engage with audiences through timely responses and community management.
- Analyze and report on social media performance metrics.
- Stay updated with the latest social media trends and suggest innovative strategies.

Graphic Design:

- Design visually appealing graphics for social media, website, and marketing collateral.
- Assist in maintaining brand consistency across all visual designs.
- Participate in brainstorming sessions for campaign ideation.
- Be creative, that is what we want, maintain a clean, minimalist standards of the startup brand but be creative.
- We don't only want you to post about company, but also about the industry we are in to attract users.

Qualifications:

- Proficiency in graphic design tools such as Adobe Creative Suite.
- Strong understanding of social media platforms and their respective audiences.
- Excellent creative, communication, and organizational skills.
- Ability to multitask and adapt in a fast-paced startup environment.

Compensation and Duration:

This is a 3-month internship with a stipend provided at the end of the internship period. 10,000 ETB with a possibility of earning a bonus upto 100% depending on performance report.

Graphic Design:

- We don't only want you to post about company, but also about the industry we are in to attract users.

Qualifications:

- Proficiency in graphic design tools such as Adobe Creative Suite.
- Strong understanding of social media platforms and their respective audiences.
- Excellent creative, communication, and organizational skills.
- Ability to multitask and adapt in a fast-paced startup environment.

text:
Job Title: Marketing Manager 

Company: Afroel Technologies 

Description:
 We are seeking an experienced and highly skilled software marketing manager to join our dynamic team. The ideal candidate will have a proven track record of success in developing and implementing strategic marketing plans for software products. 

Key responsibilities include:

- Developing and executing comprehensive marketing strategies to drive product awareness, engagement, and sales
- Collaborating with cross-functional teams to create compelling marketing campaigns and materials
- Analyzing market trends and customer insights to identify opportunities for product positioning and differentiation
- Managing the entire product marketing lifecycle, from conception to launch and beyond
- Tracking and analyzing the performance of marketing initiatives to optimize results and ROI
- Building and maintaining strong relationships with key stakeholders, including customers, partners, and industry influencers
- Leading a team of marketing professionals to achieve departmental goals and objectives

The successful candidate will possess:

- A bachelor's degree im computer science , information technology or a related field; advanced degree prefered 
- 7+ years of experience in software product marketing, with a focus on B2B and enterprise solutions
- Proven ability to develop and execute successful go-to-market strategies for complex software products
- Strong analytical skills and the ability to translate data into actionable insights
- Excellent communication, presentation, and leadership skills
- A strategic mindset with a results-driven approach
- Experience managing a team in a fast-paced and dynamic environment

This is an exciting opportunity to make a significant impact in a rapidly growing industry. If you are a strategic thinker with a passion for technology and a drive for excellence, we want to hear from you. Join us in shaping the future of software marketing.
Approved by

Dear valued community, At Maroset, we take pride in our commitment to ensuring that only genuine and trustworthy job listings are approved.

Our team of dedicated admins works tirelessly to verify the authenticity of each job posting by requesting evidence from the employers such as phone numbers, business addresses, social media presence, websites, Emails and other relevant information. This process allows us to filter out any fraudulent or misleading job listings, ensuring that you have access to only the best remote job opportunities.

We request our valued Employers to cooperate our commitment towards verifying the legitimacy of job vacancies on our platform

text:
Warning 
Dear Maroset Community, on average on daily basis we rejects 7-10 job listings for lack of evidences for their legitimacy. Now, we've implemented a strict policy against employers who fail to meet our enhanced verification measures for posting  job vacancies. This means that any employers who are unable to provide the required evidences for job posting verification, in addition to the rejection of their job post, will FACE IMMEDIATE BLOCKING OR BANNING  from our platform.

Why are we taking this step? 🤔
The trust and safety of our job-seeking community is our top priority. By enforcing this policy, we aim to protect our users from potential fraudulent or misleading job postings, ensuring a secure and transparent environment for remote job opportunities.

What does this mean for employers?
We strongly urge all employers to adhere to our verification requirements and provide the necessary evidences to authenticate their job postings. Failure to comply may result in the removal of job postings and immediate blocking from our platform.

The Maroset Team

Job Title: Virtual Assistant 

Company: Zare Innovations 

Description:
 We are seeking a detail-oriented and analytical Virtual Assistant to provide exceptional support in CRM management, raw data analysis, and inbox management. You will play a crucial role in maintaining the integrity of our operations and ensuring that all tasks are handled with precision and care.

Key Responsibilities:

- Expert management of executive calendars, scheduling calls, and coordinating meetings to ensure no detail is overlooked.
- Offer support in CRM maintenance and customization for our team; in-depth training will be provided to ensure a high level of proficiency.
- Analyze raw data, extract key insights, and suggest actionable strategies to improve our business processes.
- Manage the inbox with a focus on efficiency, ensuring that all communications are tagged and sorted, and responses are timely and organized.
- Provide reliable support in preventing any task from falling through the cracks, maintaining a seamless flow of operations.
- Communicate effectively with team members and departments, offering assistance and feedback proactively when overwhelmed or in need of support.

Requirements:

- Demonstrable experience in analyzing raw data and providing insightful conclusions.
- Previous inbox management experience, with a strong ability to organize, tag, and prioritize emails.
- Exceptional organizational skills and an aptitude for hyper-efficiency.
- Strong command of the English language, with exceptional verbal and written communication skills.
- Ability to maintain a high level of performance under tight deadlines and dynamic work conditions.
- Experience with project management tools such as Monday & Asana.

What We Offer:

- A role that offers both the challenge and the opportunity to make a significant impact within a dynamic team environment.
- Remote work flexibility, allowing for a work-life balance without compromising on professional development.
- A clear path for growth, with resources and training to aid in your development.

text.text: Calling All International Companies and Private Employers!

text:
We are thrilled to share a groundbreaking update with you! Maroset, the premier remote jobs platform operating exclusively in Ethiopia for Ethiopians, is now opening its doors to international companies and employers. This means that international companies and private clients seeking to hire talented and qualified remote experts and professionals from Ethiopia can now leverage our platform to find the perfect matches for their organizations.

How Does It Work?
To ensure the seamless integration of international opportunities on our platform, we have established a unique process. Instead of international companies posting directly on our platform, they are encouraged to make initial contact with Maroset. Our dedicated team will then facilitate the process of connecting these companies with the rich pool of skilled Ethiopian professionals available on our platform.

International companies and employers who are interested in leveraging the talent pool available on Maroset are welcome to reach out to us for further discussions.

Job Title: EXPERIENCED PHOTOSHOP SPECIALIST 

Company: N/A 

Salary: 20,000 a month 

Description:
 LOOKING FOR AN EXPERT EXPERIENCED PHOTOSHOP SPECIALIST. 

DO NOT APPLY IF YOU DO NOT HAVE A MINIMUM OF 5 YEARS EXPERIENCE. YOU WILL BE BLOCKED. AND RECEIVE NO RESPONSE. 

THERE WILL BE 3 ROUNDS ON INTERVIWS 

Requirements:
 You Have
• At least 3-5 years of experience in retouching and color correction.
• Exceptional and demonstrable knowledge of Photoshop and the Adobe Creative Suite.
• A strong technical ability with Adobe pen tool, select and mask, and can quickly remove images from a background cleanly and correctly, and with active clipping paths.
• Knowledge of color profiles, working in both CMYK for print, and RGB for online.
• Understanding of all aspects and variables of image prep for press and digital usage.
• A keen sense of the adjustments an image needs to print well on newsprint (i.e. decreasing red hue from faces, opening shadows, sharpening)
• Knowledge of how to use and build editable adjustment layers within a PSD
• A rich portfolio reflecting work experience with images from various mediums.
• Strong communication skills
• Experience with Agfa Arkitex Intellitune software is beneficial, but not required.

To apply, please submit a resume, and url link to your work. 

Role & Responsibilities:
 •
You will need to work quickly and handle a large volume of photos with a focus on detail
•
Provide ready to publish images under tight deadlines
•
Flexibility and readiness to accept changes and modifications to previously completed requests
•
Deliver images that reflect the high journalistic standards of the Wall Street Journal
•
Match requested crop guides and file sizes with accuracy
•
Keep a consistent quality across all platforms/publications
•
Communicate issues and problems in a timely manner to appropriate parties
•
Establish and maintaining good working relationships

• A keen sense of the adjustments an image needs to print well on newsprint (i.e. decreasing red hue from faces, opening shadows, sharpening)
• Knowledge of how to use and build editable adjustment layers within a PSD
• A rich portfolio reflecting work experience with images from various mediums.
• Strong communication skills
• Experience with Agfa Arkitex Intellitune software is beneficial, but not required.

To apply, please submit a resume, and url link to your work. 

Role & Responsibilities:
 •
You will need to work quickly and handle a large volume of photos with a focus on detail
•
Provide ready to publish images under tight deadlines
•
Flexibility and readiness to accept changes and modifications to previously completed requests
•
Deliver images that reflect the high journalistic standards of the Wall Street Journal
•
Match requested crop guides and file sizes with accuracy
•
Keep a consistent quality across all platforms/publications
•
Communicate issues and problems in a timely manner to appropriate parties
•
Establish and maintaining good working relationships

-------------Closed/Hired-------------

Job Title: SENIOR SOLUTIONS ARCHITECT & BACKEND ENGINEER 

Salary: 200,000ETB a month plus bonuses based on performance and contribution 

Description:
 DO NOT APPLY IF YOU DO NOT HAVE AT LEAST 5+ YEARS OF BACKEND EXPERIENCE!!

YOU WILL BE BLOCKED AND NOT ALLOWED TO APPLY IN THE FUTURE!!


Capable of moving fast while prioritizing code quality and maintainability

Fast-learner: you are proactive and able to pick up new things quickly

Experience architecting applications from scratch

You take extreme pride in building the best 

Requirements:
 5+ years of backend development
Strong expertise in Typescript and Golang (willing to learn rust)

Proficiency in both SQL and NoSQL databases, understanding of ACID properties, and knowledge of distributed database architectures

Proficient in RESTful API and GraphQL development, with a deep understanding of OpenAPI/Swagger documentation

Proven experience working on large projects with long-term impact on a single system or team

Experience leading the development of distributed systems and micro-service architecture

Ability to handle unexpected challenges, perhaps even those that fall outside strict backend development

Must be open to learning new technologies, methodologies, and moving between different tasks

Must be able to articulate complex technical issues to non-technical stakeholders 

Role & Responsibilities:
 Architect, develop and maintain the server-side logic, databases, APIs, and other backend processes to meet application requirements

Develop a high-trust high-quality engineering culture
Collaborate closely with our CTO and CEO to directly impact product roadmap

Collaborate with frontend developers to ensure seamless integration of user-facing elements.

Engage in the entire application lifecycle, focusing on coding, debugging, and deploying with an emphasis on high quality, scalable code.

Develop and maintain our database layer, APIs, and other web services

Hire, Teach, and Mentor junior engineers

Experience in high-security or financial applications

Knowledge of Front End Development and Devops

Experience interacting with blockchains

-------------Closed/Hired-------------

Job Title: Motion Graphics Designer Intern 

Company: Addis Capital Communications 

Description:
 We are looking for an energetic Motion Graphics Designer intern for a 3-month Internship program. The program aims to provide new graduates and students with an opportunity to kick start their career path and gain valuable experience, with the potential to secure a permanent position. As part of the creative team, you create video content and various design assets for use across a variety of media, including social media and mobile platforms. You work with a team of creative professionals and support our company goals and media initiatives, so a collaborative mindset is essential. Our ideal candidate is an expert in a variety of Adobe products, including Adobe Photoshop and Adobe After Effects Design. You should also be an expert in other common design software. 

Requirements:
 • Superb knowledge of Adobe Suite and common motion graphics design software
• A strong portfolio of motion graphics work
• A desire to learn new techniques and technology to advance your craft
• Superb visual and conceptual skills to solve problems and create novel solutions
• Excellent written and verbal communication skills
Qualifications
The education and qualifications of a Motion Graphics Designer might include the following:
• A Higher National Diploma or Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Graphics, Graphic Design, Communication Design, Illustration, Fine Arts, Art and Design, or a related field
• Two A Levels
• At least two GCSEs/High School Diploma 

Role & Responsibilities:
 • Create visually stunning video and content assets
• Collaborate with creative directors and other teams to best support larger media goals
• Take the initiative on projects to deliver new and innovative solutions
• Adhere to brief guidelines in ways that still push creative boundaries
• Create graphic templates for use by other team members and client teams

text:
Dear Employers, We understand that unpaid internships can be a great opportunity for both the employer and the intern. However, we want to ensure that the intern is receiving valuable experience and benefits from the internship, even if there is no financial compensation.
When posting an unpaid internship opportunity on our platform, please specify the non-financial benefits and compensations that the intern will receive. This could include;

- Hands-on experience in a specific field or industry
- Opportunities to network with professionals in the industry
- The chance to develop new skills and knowledge
- Access to training and development programs
- Potential paid interns/jobs
- Certification 
- A reference or recommendation letter upon completion of the internship

It is important to us that interns are not being taken advantage of or exploited through unpaid internships. If there are no non-financial benefits and compensations offered, we are sorry but WE CANNOT APPROVE SUCH JOBS.
We're updating our terms of service and policies regarding this issue and we'll announce soon.

Thank you for your understanding and commitment to providing valuable opportunities for interns.

 We are currently seeking an energetic and skilled system analyst. As an internship system analyst, you will be responsible for working with industry-standard stacks in software requirement analysis, software design documents tools, and UI/UX design.

Responsibilities:
- Work with the development team to gather and analyze software requirements
- Create software design documents using industry-standard tools
- Collaborate with UI/UX designers to ensure the software meets user needs and expectations
- present the document to the developers and test the product accordingly 

Qualifications:
- Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field
- Strong problem-solving skills
- Excellent communication and collaboration skills
- Familiarity with software development methodologies
- Experience with software requirement analysis, software design documents tools, and UI/UX design

Benefits:
- Opportunities for professional development and growth
- Exposure to cutting-edge technology and industry trends
- Collaborative work environment
- Opportunity to work on challenging and meaningful projects

If you are a self-starter who is passionate about technology and eager to learn, we encourage you to apply for this exciting opportunity. If you are not good at documentation and UI/UX design, don't apply at all!
