Job Title: Math and Science Tutor (Spanish-speaking) 

Company: iWork Technologies LLC 

Salary: Monthly 

Description:
 We are seeking qualified tutors fluent in Spanish to provide virtual after-school support for high school students in the US in Math and Science subjects. As a tutor, you will play a vital role in helping students understand challenging concepts, improve problem-solving skills, and enhance overall academic performance. 

Requirements:
 - Proficiency in both Spanish and English.
- Bachelor's degree in Math, Science, Education, or a related field is preferred(Not Mandatory.
- Strong understanding of high school-level Math and Science concepts.
- Previous tutoring or teaching experience is desirable.
- Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
- Patience, empathy, and a passion for helping students succeed.
- Reliable and strong internet connection. 
- Must be available for flexible after-school hours on different time zones for virtual tutoring sessions, typically scheduled on weekdays. 

Role & Responsibilities:
 - Develop and implement effective lesson plans tailored to the individual needs of students.
- Assist students in understanding and solving problems related to their Math and Science coursework.
- Provide guidance on study techniques, exam preparation, and time management.

"Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted for the next step in the application process."

-------------Closed/Hired-------------

Job Title: Career Counselor 

Company: iWork Technologies LLC 

Salary: Monthly 

Description:
 We are seeking a dedicated and experienced Career Counselor to join our team, with a focus on providing guidance to high school students. As a High School Career Counselor, you will play a crucial role in helping students navigate their career paths, make informed decisions, and plan for their future professional endeavors. 

Requirements:
 - Proven experience as a Career Counselor or in a similar role.
- Strong understanding of career development theories and counseling techniques.
- Excellent communication and active listening skills.
- Ability to empathize and understand diverse career needs.
- Knowledge of educational programs, vocational training, and employment trends. 
- Proficiency in English is required. 

Role & Responsibilities:
 - Conduct one-on-one career counseling sessions with high school students to assess their skills, interests, and career goals.
- Provide guidance on educational and training programs, as well as available career paths suitable for high school graduates.
- Assist students in developing personalized career plans and strategies tailored to their unique aspirations.
- Stay informed about current global job market trends, industry requirements, and educational opportunities relevant to high school graduates.
- Administer and interpret career assessments to help students gain self-awareness and identify suitable career options.
- Maintain accurate and confidential records of counseling sessions.

Notice : Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted for the next step in the application process.

text:
As a job owner, it is important to communicate with applicants and provide timely feedback. Failure to do so not only wastes the time and effort of the applicants but also damages the reputation of your company. 

It is understandable that some job owners may receive a large number of applications and may not be able to respond to each one individually, but at the very least, you should acknowledge receipt of the applications and provide an estimated timeline for when applicants can expect to hear back and finally once hired you should immediately close the job vacancy. 

If the job owner fails to respond to the applicants' applications within 5 consequitive working days, as per our terms of service and policies the applicants have full right to report to our platform and we take this issue very seriously.

text:
-------------Closed/Hired-------------

Job Title: Senior web developer 

Salary: Negotiable 

Description:
 We are seeking an experienced MERN (MongoDB, Express.js, React, Node.js) stack developer to perform comprehensive testing for our website on a one-time basis. This project involves assessing the functionality, performance, and security aspects of our web application.
Responsibilities:

1. Functional Testing:
   - Conduct thorough testing of website features to ensure they meet specified requirements.
   - Identify and document issues related to functionality, usability, and user interface.

2. Performance Testing:
   - Evaluate website performance, responsiveness, and loading times.
   - Identify potential bottlenecks and propose optimizations for improved user experience.

3. Security Testing:
   - Perform security assessments to identify vulnerabilities and potential threats.
   - Provide recommendations for enhancing website security and data protection.

4. Cross-Browser and Cross-Device Testing:
   - Test website compatibility across different browsers and devices.
   - Ensure a seamless user experience on various platforms.

5. Documentation:
   - Prepare detailed test plans and reports outlining the testing process, identified issues, and proposed solutions.
   - Document steps to reproduce bugs and communicate findings clearly.

Requirements:
- 3+ years of experience in web development
- Proven experience as a MERN stack developer with a focus on testing.
- Strong understanding of MongoDB, Express.js, React, and Node.js.
- Proficient in testing frameworks and tools.
- Experience in performance testing and optimization.
- Knowledge of web security best practices.
- Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills.
- Strong communication skills to collaborate with the development team.

Duration: One-time testing project with the possibility of future collaboration based on performance.

How to Apply:
Please fill out the google form below

text:
Job Title: Market Place Post Specialist 

Company: Addis Capital Communications 

Salary: Attractive, Based on the quantity, performance, and efficiency of each promotional post. 

Description:
 We are looking for an energetic marketplace post specialist to join our product marketing team. You will be responsible for posting our company's product on social marketplace applications and the day-to-day management of the company’s social marketplace account. Your passion for social marketplace as a communications tool will result in the adoption and implementation of social marketplace best practices across all social marketplace channels. 

Requirements:
 •Any diploma & above with a high level of discipline and Commitment 
•Able to work at home and the candidates must have their personal computer and Android phones(more than Android 6)
•Excellent written and verbal communication skills(English)
•Must have a basic understanding of social marketplace apps like FB marketplace, Afrotie, JiJi, and other related marketplace applications.
•Multi-tasking and time-management skills, with the ability to prioritize tasks.
•Candidates from regional states with high-level commitment will get priorities 

Role & Responsibilities:
 •Posting social media content according to the strategies and brand identities of  the company
•Editing consistent, meaningful content on all social media platforms, including writing and editing social media posts, improving customer engagement. 
•Managing a high volume of daily social media and social marketplace 
•Communicating with social media followers and potential customers including responding to queries promptly.
•Preparing weekly reports about the progress and flow of customers based on the marketplace accounts analytical tools.

Approved by

text:
-------------Closed/Hired-------------

Job Title: Experienced Android Developer 

Company: Africa Technology PLC 

Salary: Attractive and negotiable 

Description:
 We are seeking an experienced Android Developer to join our team. As an Android Developer, you will be responsible for designing, developing, and testing Android applications. You will collaborate with other developers, designers, and product managers to create innovative and user-friendly applications. Additionally, you will stay up-to-date with the latest Android development technologies, debug and fix bugs, optimize application performance and usability, and work with the QA team to test and release applications. Your contributions will also involve collaborating with other teams to enhance the overall user experience.

Responsibilities:
1. Design, develop, and test Android applications.
2. Collaborate with other developers, designers, and product managers to create innovative and user-friendly applications.
3. Stay up-to-date on the latest Android development technologies.
4. Debug and fix bugs in Android applications.
5. Optimize applications for performance and usability.
6. Work with the QA team to test and release applications.
7. Collaborate with other teams to improve the overall user experience.

Qualifications:
1. Strong understanding of the Android SDK and Android development tools.
2. Experience with Java/Kotlin, XML, and other Android-specific technologies.
3. Proficiency in object-oriented programming and design patterns.
4. Experience with unit testing and debugging.
5. Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills.
6. Strong written and verbal communication skills.
7. Ability to work independently and as part of a team.

Benefits:
1. Competitive salary and benefits package.
2. Opportunity to work on challenging and innovative projects.
3. Collaborative and supportive work environment.
4. Chance to make a real impact on the company and its users.

If you are a highly motivated and experienced Android Developer, we encourage you to apply! Please submit your resume and a cover letter outlining your relevant experience through telegram
. However, please note that only those selected for an interview will be contacted.

-------------Closed/Hired-------------

Job Title: Experienced IOS Developer 

Company: Africa Technology PLC 

Salary: Attractive and negotiable 

Description:
 Subject: Experienced iOS Developer Position - Apply Now!

Job Title: iOS Developer

Job Description:
We are looking for an experienced iOS Developer to join our team. In this role, you will be responsible for designing, developing, and testing iOS applications. You will work closely with other developers, designers, and product managers to create innovative and user-friendly applications.

Responsibilities:
- Translate requirements and designs into readable and efficient native iOS code.
- Develop and maintain high-quality iOS applications using Swift.
- Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure the successful implementation of features and functionalities.
- Conduct thorough testing and debugging of applications to ensure quality and optimize performance.
- Stay up-to-date with the latest iOS development trends and best practices.
- Proactively identify and address any technical issues or challenges that may arise.
- Provide technical guidance and support to junior developers as needed.

Qualifications:
- Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field.
- 3+ years of professional experience in iOS app development.
- Strong proficiency in Swift and familiarity with Objective-C.
- Experience working with iOS frameworks such as UIKit, Core Data, and Core Animation.
- Solid understanding of software development principles, including object-oriented programming.
- Experience with version control systems, especially Git.
- Strong problem-solving and debugging skills.
- Ability to work effectively in a collaborative team environment.
- Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.

Benefits:
- Competitive salary and comprehensive benefits package.
- Opportunity to work on challenging and innovative projects.
- Collaborative and supportive work environment.
- Chance to make a real impact on the company and its users.
- Continuous learning and professional development opportunities.

If you are a highly motivated and experienced iOS Developer looking for an exciting opportunity, we encourage you to apply! Please submit your resume and a cover letter outlining your relevant experience through telegram
. Make sure to mention "Experienced iOS Developer Application" in the subject line of your email.

-------------Closed/Hired-------------

Job Title: Senior Backend developer (PHP codeigniter) 

Company: Africa Technology PLC 

Salary: Attractive and negotiable 

Description:
 We are seeking a talented and experienced Senior PHP CodeIgniter Developer to join our team. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in PHP development, specifically with the CodeIgniter framework. As a Senior PHP CodeIgniter Developer, you will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining robust and scalable web applications. You will collaborate with cross-functional teams, including front-end developers, designers, and product managers, to deliver high-quality solutions. In addition, you will provide technical guidance and mentoring to junior developers and contribute to the continuous improvement of development processes.

Responsibilities:
1. Design, develop, and maintain web applications using PHP and the CodeIgniter framework.
2. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define project requirements and deliver high-quality solutions.
3. Write clean, efficient, and well-documented code.
4. Perform code reviews to ensure code quality and adherence to best practices.
5. Identify and troubleshoot software defects and technical issues.
6. Provide technical guidance and mentorship to junior developers.
7. Stay up-to-date with the latest PHP and CodeIgniter developments and trends.
8. Contribute to the continuous improvement of development processes and best practices.

Qualifications:
1. Bachelor's degree in computer science or a related field (or equivalent work experience).
2. 5+ years of experience in PHP development.
3. Strong proficiency in PHP and the CodeIgniter framework.
4. Experience with front-end technologies such as HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
5. Solid understanding of object-oriented programming and MVC architecture.
6. Familiarity with database technologies, particularly MySQL.
7. Experience with version control systems, such as Git.
8. Strong problem-solving and debugging skills.
9. Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
10. Ability to work independently and in a team environment.

Benefits:
1. Competitive salary and benefits package.
2. Opportunity to work on challenging and innovative projects.
3. Collaborative and supportive work environment.
4. Chance to make a real impact on the company and its products.
5. Continuous learning and professional development opportunities.

If you are a talented and experienced Senior PHP CodeIgniter Developer seeking a challenging and rewarding opportunity, we encourage you to apply! Please submit your resume and a cover letter outlining your relevant experience to telegram
. However, please note that only those selected for an interview will be contacted.

text:
Job Title: Software Sales Marketer 

Company: Elif Technologies PLC 

Salary: Salary and Attractive commission 

Description:
 As a Software Sales Marketer, your main goal is to increase software sales for our company. You will develop and implement comprehensive marketing campaigns encompassing various facets of the market to promote our software product/service and drive sales. 

Requirements:
 1-Develop and execute marketing strategies to reach potential clients and convert them into customers
2-Understand customer needs and concerns, ensuring our software solutions address them directly
3-Create engaging and innovative marketing content to strengthen the company's market presence
4-Build and maintain relationships with clients, both existing and prospective
5-Track, analyse, and report on marketing metrics to understand the success of marketing campaigns and identify areas for improvement
6-Work closely with the product development team to ensure products meet market requirements and deliver customer satisfaction
7-Stay current with industry trends and competitors to ensure the company's competitiveness in the market
Approved by

text:
Job Title: Digital Marketing Expert - Virtual Gaming Platform 

Salary: • Competitive salary and performances based bonuses
• Potential for owning shares in the company 

Description:
 We are seeking a creative and dynamic Digital Marketing Expert to join our team and drive the promotion and expansion of our virtual gaming platform. The ideal candidate will be responsible for developing and executing strategic digital marketing initiatives to enhance brand visibility, drive user acquisition, and engage our audience across various digital channels. 

Requirements:
 - Proven experience in digital marketing.
- In-depth knowledge of digital marketing strategies, including social media marketing, SEO/SEM, and content marketing.
- Strong analytical skills with the ability to interpret data and derive actionable insights to drive marketing strategies.
- Excellent communication and creative writing skills to craft engaging content and marketing materials.
- Passion for gaming and a deep understanding of the virtual gaming landscape and its audience. 

Role & Responsibilities:
 - Develop and implement digital marketing strategies to drive user acquisition and retention, with a focus on increasing player engagement and expanding our user base.
- Plan and execute digital campaigns across various platforms, including social media, search engines, and gaming forums to promote our virtual gaming platform.
- Analyze user behavior and engagement metrics to optimize marketing initiatives and enhance the overall gaming experience.
- Collaborate with cross-functional teams to create compelling and innovative marketing content, including videos, interactive ads, and promotional materials.
- Monitor industry trends, market competition, and player feedback to continuously improve our marketing efforts and stay ahead in the virtual gaming landscape.

Approved by

Job Title: Data Entry Job (Volunteer) 

Description:
 Are you a student looking for a part-time job that can help you acquire new skills? If yes, then this is the opportunity for you!

We are Fetan Education, a team of software developers who are creating an online platform for students to prepare for university entrance exams, freshman course, remedial courses and exit exams. We need your help to enter data into our system and make it more reliable and useful.

What you need:

- A PC and a wifi connection
- At least 3 hours per day to work on the data entry tasks

- your name and image will be displayed on our website so that you csn use it for applying scholarships, jobs and more.

-------------Closed/Hired-------------

Job Title: Translator 

Company: SAGE ETHIOPIA 

Description:
 SAGE ETHIOPIA community is on the lookout for talented and passionate Translators to join our dynamic team! 

Do you have:

A sharp eye for detail and a knack for accuracy?

A mastery of both English and Amharic (or other Ethiopian languages)?

A passion for clear and concise communication and writing skill?

Experience in technical or training manual translation?

If you're ready to:

text:
Job Title: Content Creator and graphics Designer 

Company: Pixel Import and Export 

Description:
 We're seeking an enthusiastic and creative individual to join our team as a Content Creator. The Content creator will play a crucial role in developing and executing the company's social media strategy, focusing primarily on Telegram, Instagram, TikTok and YouTube platforms.

We need someone who is familiar with Graphics Design and Video Editing Softwares

Responsibilities:

● Social Media Strategy: Collaborate with the marketing team to develop a comprehensive social media strategy that aligns with the brand's image and objectives.

● Content Creation: Generate engaging and visually appealing content for the company's Telegram, Instagram, and TikTok accounts, including posts, stories, videos, and other media formats.

● Market Research: Conduct thorough research on industry trends and competitors to ensure content remains relevant and engaging.

● Community Engagement: Interact with the online community by responding to comments, messages, and inquiries professionally and promptly.

● Social Media Analytics: Monitor and analyze social media metrics to track campaign effectiveness and identify areas for improvement.

● Stay Updated: Keep abreast of the latest social media trends, tools, and best practices to enhance the company's online presence continually.

● Cross-Functional Collaboration: Work with different teams to gather content and ensure consistency across various platforms.

● Community Management: Assist with content moderation and user-generated content curation.

Requirements:

● Social Media Proficiency: Familiarity with social media platforms such as Telegram, Instagram, and TikTok.

● Creativity: A creative mindset with the ability to generate innovative ideas for content creation.

● Design Skills: Basic knowledge of graphic design tools and photo/video editing software.

● Self-Motivation: The ability to work independently and collaboratively in a fast-paced environment.

● Organizational Skills: Strong organizational and time management skills, with the ability to multitask and prioritize effectively.

● Passion: A genuine interest in technology and the products/services offered by PiSpace Innovations.

●  Education Level: BA Degree in any field

● 6 Months - 1 Year Experience ⚠

Apply by sending your graphics portfolios and videos to
Approved by

text:
Job Title: Flutter Developer 

Company: Mofer Technologies 

Salary: 12,000 - 17,000 Birr 

Description:
 We are looking for a skilled Flutter + Firebase developer to join our team.  We are a Software Development agency providing creative software solutions to prominent companies and influencers. In addition, we have our own software products in partnership with prominent companies like banks and VC investors. Thus, we are looking for a potential candidate who embraces our vision and helps us excel while the candidate is exposed to potential opportunities to learn and grow in their professional life.

Benefits
-Opportunity to grow and build your portfolio by working on innovative global products 
-Flexibility in working hours
-Healthy work environment
-Attractive salary 

Requirements:
 -Proven Experience in developing cross-platform mobile applications using Flutter and Dart.
-Hands-on experience with popular Flutter state management solutions
-Proven experience with Firebase or Google Cloud Platform.
-Working knowledge of the general mobile landscape, architectures, trends, and emerging technologies
-Experience with Git, or other version control systems 
-Experience with third-party libraries and APIs.
-Excellent problem-solving skills.
-Ability to work independently and as part of a team.
-Ability to work in a fast-paced environment. 

Role & Responsibilities:
 -Design, test, and build mobile and web applications using Flutter.
-Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features.
-Identify and correct bottlenecks and fix bugs.
-Help maintain code quality, organization, and automation.

Approved by

text:
-------------Closed/Hired-------------

Job Title: Android developer 

Company: Africa Technology 

Salary: 15000-20000 

Description:
 We are seeking an experienced Android Developer to join our team. As an Android Developer, you will be responsible for designing, developing, and testing Android applications. You will collaborate with other developers, designers, and product managers to create innovative and user-friendly applications. Additionally, you will stay up-to-date with the latest Android development technologies, debug and fix bugs, optimize application performance and usability, and work with the QA team to test and release applications. Your contributions will also involve collaborating with other teams to enhance the overall user experience.

Responsibilities:
1. Design, develop, and test Android applications.
2. Collaborate with other developers, designers, and product managers to create innovative and user-friendly applications.
3. Stay up-to-date on the latest Android development technologies.
4. Debug and fix bugs in Android applications.
5. Optimize applications for performance and usability.
6. Work with the QA team to test and release applications.
7. Collaborate with other teams to improve the overall user experience.

Qualifications:
1. Strong understanding of the Android SDK and Android development tools.
2. Experience with Java/Kotlin, XML, and other Android-specific technologies.
3. Proficiency in object-oriented programming and design patterns.
4. Experience with unit testing and debugging.
5. Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills.
6. Strong written and verbal communication skills.
7. Ability to work independently and as part of a team.

Benefits:
1. Competitive salary and benefits package.
2. Opportunity to work on challenging and innovative projects.
3. Collaborative and supportive work environment.
4. Chance to make a real impact on the company and its users.

If you are a highly motivated and experienced Android Developer, we encourage you to apply! Please submit your resume and a cover letter outlining your relevant experience through telegram
. However, please note that only those selected for an interview will be contacted.

text:
Job Title: Zbrush Character Sculptor 

Company: Kuraz Technologies 

Salary: Paid internship 

Description:
 We're seeking an intern 3D Character Sculptor to join our team. You will be assigned to sculpt on wide range of  characters and creatures for 3d print project, 

Requirements:
 - Proficient in ZBrush or Blender with a strong character portfolio.
- Experience in posing characters, cloth, and weapon design.
- knowledge of Human anatomy for realistic character sculpting and expression.
- Familiarity with 3D print preparation, STL files. 

Role & Responsibilities:
 - Translate AI concept art into detailed 3D character sculpts.
- Design detailed base for the characters.
- Rig characters for dynamic posing and articulate cloth and weapon designs.
- Ensure technical aspects of 3D print preparation.
- Utilize ZBrush polypaint for rendering in Marmoset Toolbag 4.
- Optimizing highpoly meshes with out losing details.

Training:
Selected candidates will receive comprehensive training. You Must have your own working tools(Graphics tablet is required obviously) 

How to Apply:
Submit your portfolio to

Include character sculpts, rigged poses, and any 3D print related project ( Not necessary) 

We encourage you  to apply for the job even if you lack the required skills

*Deadline for Application: Jan 1,2024

Approved by

text:
Job Title: Marketing Manager 

Company: Pixel Import and Export 

Description:
 We're looking for a marketing manager. 

Responsibility

• Oversee marketing campaigns  and Implement strategy

• Promote a business, product, or service

• Ensure the company is communicating the right messaging to attract prospective customers and retain existing ones

• Coordinate and give training to the sales team to produce effective strategies

• Develop and implement comprehensive marketing strategies aligned with company goals

• Supervise market research and competitor analysis to identify trends and consumer preferences

• Manage advertising and promotional campaigns, including coordination with media outlets

• Oversee the design and production of marketing materials and collateral
Maintain and enhance brand identity through consistent messaging and branding guidelines

• Monitor and analyze marketing performance using key performance indicators (KPIs)

• Provide regular reports on marketing activities and outcomes to management,
Collaborate with internal departments to align marketing efforts with overall business objectives

• Build and maintain relationships with stakeholders, such as suppliers, partners, and customers

• Manage digital marketing initiatives, including social media, website contents

• Stay updated on industry trends and emerging marketing techniques

• Develop and manage the marketing budget, tracking expenses

• Identify opportunities for strategic partnerships and collaborations

• Lead and mentor a marketing team, providing guidance and support

• Ensure compliance with relevant laws, regulations, and ethical standards in marketing activities

Requirements :

• BA  in Marketing, Management or any other related field 

• Maximum of 2 years experience 

• Working experience in Import and export company is a plus 

• Excellent communication skills

• Ability to think creatively and innovatively

• Analytical skills to forecast and identify trends and challenges
Approved by

Job Title: English to Somali Christian Context Translator 

Salary: Negotiable 

Description:
 Hello, We are seeking a qualified translator/editor to participate in a Christian (Evangelical) translation/editing project from English into Somali. The ideal candidate should be familiar with Christian terminologies and have Somali as their native language.

If you are interested in this opportunity, please email us with details about your experience and educational background. Additionally, you should be willing to take a short test translation as part of the selection process. We are looking for a long-term collaboration.

Thank you for considering this project.

Best regards,
Approved by

Company: DXC 

Salary: per share 25 

Description:
 ANY ONE CAN JOIN We are seeking individuals to join our team as Social Media Content Promoters. As a promoter, your main responsibility will be to generate engagement for our videos by sharing them on popular social media platforms such as TikTok, Facebook, Telegram, and Instagram. This is an excellent opportunity to leverage your social media skills and creativity to earn money while having fun!

- Share our videos with your followers and engage with them to encourage likes, comments, and shares.
- Be creative and innovative in finding new ways to promote our videos and generate buzz on social media.

-------------Closed/Hired-------------

Job Title: Social Media Manager Intern 

Company: Change Addis 

Description:
 Who Are We Looking For?
We are excited to welcome university students and passionate individuals, especially women, to join us as Social Media Manager Interns! This is an opportunity to make a positive impact on the environment and be part of a friendly and dynamic team.

Responsibilities:

Develop and implement social media strategies to share Change Addis' mission, focusing on climate and environmental issues.
Create engaging content for various platforms, sharing insights and sparking conversations.
Monitor social media performance and learn how to use analytics tools.
Collaborate with teams to align social media efforts with Change Addis' climate action goals.
Stay updated on industry trends and bring your creative ideas to the table.


No Formal Qualifications Required - Just Passion and Enthusiasm!

text:
Job Title: Math and Science Tutor 

Company: iWork Technologies LLC 

Salary: Monthly 

Description:
 We are actively searching for 40 dedicated and qualified tutors fluent in English to join our team and provide virtual after-school support for high school students in the US, focusing on Math and Science subjects. As a tutor, you will play a crucial role in helping students grasp challenging concepts, enhance problem-solving skills, and improve overall academic performance. 

Requirements:
 - Proficiency in English.
- Bachelor's degree in Math, Science, Education, or a related field is preferred (Not Mandatory).
- Strong understanding of high school-level Math and Science concepts.
- Previous tutoring or teaching experience is desirable.
- Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
- Patience, empathy, and a passion for helping students succeed.
- Laptop or PC with reliable and strong internet connection.
- Must be available for flexible after-school hours on different time zones for virtual tutoring sessions, typically scheduled on weekdays.
- Proficiency in Spanish is a plus.

Additional Requirement:
- Candidates are requested to submit their resumes, highlighting any achievements or notable outcomes from their previous tutoring experiences.
- Please specify in your application whether you are applying for the Math or Science tutoring position.
Approved by

text:
Job Title: Graphic Designer - Internship 

Company: Mofer Technologies 

Description:
 We are seeking a highly motivated and creative Graphic Design Intern to join our team. We are a Software Development agency providing creative software solutions to prominent companies and influencers. As a Graphic Design Intern, you will work closely with our design team to create visually appealing graphics. In addition to graphic design skills, candidates with motion graphics and basic video editing skills will be given preference. 

Requirements:
 - A demonstrated experience in Graphic Design.
- Have experience in graphic design software such as Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign).
- Strong creative and conceptual thinking abilities.
- Ability to work collaboratively in a team environment.
- Familiarity with motion graphics and basic video editing tools is a plus (e.g., Adobe After Effects, CapCut, Premiere Pro).
- A portfolio showcasing graphic design work and, if available, motion graphics and video editing projects. 

Role & Responsibilities:
 - Create compelling and visually appealing graphic designs for various platforms, including social media, websites, and print materials.
- Collaborate to develop creative concepts and ideas.
- Utilize motion graphics and basic video editing skills to enhance visual content.
- Stay updated on industry trends and incorporate innovative design techniques.

Benefits:
- Gain hands-on experience in a healthy and collaborative work environment.
- Flexible working hours.
- Pocket money is offered.

How to Apply:
Please submit your resume, cover letter, and a link to your portfolio showcasing relevant work to
. Include "Graphic Design Intern Application" in the subject line. If you have any questions, contact us at
Approved by

messages.text:
-------------Closed/Hired-------------

Job Title: Intern Web desginer and  Developer 

Company: Mereja Technology 

Description:
 We are seeking a talented and passionate intern to join our team as a Figma Designer and Website Developer. This is a unique opportunity to gain hands-on experience in various areas of web development, design, and project management. As an intern, you will have the chance to work with cutting-edge technologies such as React, MySQL, Laravel, Node.js, SEO techniques, project management tool ClickUp, and CMS for website development.

Responsibilities:

1. Design and create visually appealing user interfaces using Figma, a collaborative design tool.
2. Collaborate with the development team to implement designs using React, ensuring seamless integration between the front-end and back-end components.
3. Assist in website development and maintenance using technologies such as MySQL, Laravel, and Node.js.
4. Optimize websites for search engines (SEO), ensuring maximum visibility and traffic.
5. Contribute to the selection and integration of CMS (Content Management System) solutions to maintain and update websites efficiently.
6. Work on various projects simultaneously, adhering to project timelines and delivering high-quality results.
7. Collaborate with project managers to understand project requirements, prioritize tasks, and provide regular status updates.
8. Utilize ClickUp, a project management tool, to track and manage project tasks, milestones, and deliverables effectively.
9. Stay up-to-date with the latest design trends, web development technologies, and industry best practices.

Requirements:

1. Strong visual design skills with proficiency in Figma, creating wireframes, and developing prototypes.
2. Basic understanding of front-end web development technologies such as React, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
3. Familiarity with back-end technologies including MySQL, Laravel, and Node.js, to effectively collaborate with developers.
4. Knowledge of SEO techniques and best practices for optimizing websites.
5. Experience with website development and CMS platforms (e.g., WordPress, Drupal, Joomla) is a plus.
6. Strong organizational skills, with the ability to handle multiple projects and prioritize tasks effectively.
7. Excellent communication and collaboration skills, as you will be working closely with the development team and project managers.
8. Detail-oriented with a keen eye for aesthetics and user experience.
9. Self-motivated individual with a willingness to learn and adapt to new technologies.
10. Any previous experience with ClickUp or similar project management tools is preferred but not required.

This internship is unpaid but we offers certificates and recommendation letter with a unique opportunity to gain practical experience in multiple areas of website development, design, and project management.  If you are passionate about web development, design, and project management,  This internship last for 2 month we would love to hear from you.

text:
-------------Closed/Hired-------------

Job Title: Paid Front End Developer Intern 

Description:
 We're looking for a paid front end developer intern

Requirements:
1. React.js and Next.js:
   - Develop responsive web applications using Next.js and React.js.
   - Create and maintain reusable React components.
   - Ensure seamless integration of designs and user interface elements.

2. SEO:
   - Implement SEO best practices to enhance visibility and accessibility.
   - Conduct keyword research and optimize content for search engines.
   - Stay updated on industry trends to continuously improve SEO strategies.

3. JavaScript and React Hooks:
   - Utilize JavaScript and React Hooks for enhanced user interactions.
   - Implement state management and data fetching using React Hooks.
   - Troubleshoot and optimize code for improved performance.

4. Git/GitHub:
   - Contribute to version control using Git and GitHub for efficient code management.
   - Collaborate with team members through pull requests and code reviews.
   - Maintain organized repositories with clear documentation.

Qualifications:

- Enthusiastic and eager to learn with a strong passion for front-end development.
- Solid understanding of Next.js, React.js, and their accompanying components.
- Knowledge of SEO best practices.
- Proficiency in JavaScript and modern web development tools.
- Familiarity with Git and GitHub for version control.
- Demonstrated ability to work in a collaborative team environment.

Additional Requirement:
- Has already built one project in Next.js.

How to Apply:
If you are an enthusiastic and motivated individual with a passion for front-end development, and you meet the qualifications above, we would love to hear from you! Please fill the form using the below link.

   - Create and maintain reusable React components.
   - Ensure seamless integration of designs and user interface elements.

2. SEO:
   - Implement SEO best practices to enhance visibility and accessibility.
   - Conduct keyword research and optimize content for search engines.
   - Stay updated on industry trends to continuously improve SEO strategies.

3. JavaScript and React Hooks:
   - Utilize JavaScript and React Hooks for enhanced user interactions.
   - Implement state management and data fetching using React Hooks.
   - Troubleshoot and optimize code for improved performance.

4. Git/GitHub:
   - Contribute to version control using Git and GitHub for efficient code management.
   - Collaborate with team members through pull requests and code reviews.
   - Maintain organized repositories with clear documentation.

Qualifications:

- Enthusiastic and eager to learn with a strong passion for front-end development.
- Solid understanding of Next.js, React.js, and their accompanying components.
- Knowledge of SEO best practices.
- Proficiency in JavaScript and modern web development tools.
- Familiarity with Git and GitHub for version control.
- Demonstrated ability to work in a collaborative team environment.

Additional Requirement:
- Has already built one project in Next.js.

How to Apply:
If you are an enthusiastic and motivated individual with a passion for front-end development, and you meet the qualifications above, we would love to hear from you! Please fill the form using the below link.

messages.text:
-------------Closed/Hired-------------

Job Title: Video Ad Copywriter 

Company: faf Studio, a digital creative startup 

Salary: Depends on the quality of the freelancer and the video engagement & view  from 100 - 1k per 1 ads. 

Description:
 We are seeking a creative and engaging freelance copywriter to join our team in developing fun and engaging scripts for short-form video ads. As a video copywriter, you will focus on crafting compelling scripts and copy for TikTok ads that resonate with Gen Z audiences. Your scripts will help promote our Services, product and represent our brand in an authentic yet memorable way on TikTok.

Responsibilities:

-Generate original script ideas leveraging trends and sounds popular on TikTok
-Write 15-60 second video ad scripts and accompanying copy
Craft dialogue, jokes and scenes that are concise yet capture 
-Consider target demographics and brand voice when developing all copy Iterate scripts based on testing and feedback
-Ensure scripts complement accompanying video elements

Qualifications:

-Portfolio demonstrating experience writing scripts for short videos/TikTok ads
-Deep understanding of TikTok trends, memes and what resonates on the platform
-Strong creative and storytelling abilities within tight time constraints
-Passion for viral Internet culture and Gen Z marketing
-Excellent verbal and written communication skills
-Please send portfolio link highlighting relevant short-form video copywriting samples. -Must be able to commit to regular project work. -This is a contract role with potential for ongoing engagement.

text:
-------------Closed/Hired-------------

Job Title: Mathematics and physics teacher 

Company: Entrance Tricks digital education 

Salary: ደመወዝ በወር በስምምነት 

Description:

ማስታወቂያ ለዩኒቨርሲቲ ተማሪዎች 

ᴇɴᴛʀᴀɴᴄᴇ ᴛʀɪᴄᴋs ለዩኒቨርሲቲ ተማሪዎች እየተማራችሁ የምትሰሩትን ስራ ይዞላችሁ መጥቷል ። ᴇɴᴛʀᴀɴᴄᴇ ᴛʀɪᴄᴋs በ online ከ 9- 12 ኛ and remedial ክፍል ያሉ ተማሪዎችን እንደሚያስተምር ይታወቃል ። እናም ለተማሪዎች የ maths እና physics አስተማሪ መቅጠር እንፈልጋለን ።መስፈርቶቹን እና የስራውን ሁኔታ ከዚህ በታች እንገልፃለን ።

🍎የስራ ሁኔታው ምን ይመስላል❓
Maths እና physics ለ entrance tricks ተማሪዎች (ማለትም ለአምስቱም ክላስ ለ 9,10,11,12 and remedial ) ተማሪዎች ሳምንት አንዴ ይሰጣል ። ከተቀጣሪውም የሚጠበቀው ሁለቱን ትምህርቶች በተያዘላቸው ፕሮግራም መፅሀፋቸውን ካነበበ እና ከተረዳ በኋላ በ video መልኩ ቀላል እና ግልጽ በሆነ መንገድ ለተማሪዎች ያስረዳል ። እንዲሁም worksheet ፣ እና ፈተናዎችን እያዘጋጀ ለተማሪዎች ያደርሳል ።

🍎ተቀጣሪው ምን ያክል ጊዜ ያጠፋል ❓

በሳምንት ሁለት ቀን ብቻ ስለሚያስተምር ( ለአንድ ክላስ maximum 1 ሰአት ቢወሰድበት ) በሳምንት ከ 12-15 ሰአት በዚህ ስራ ጊዜውን ሊያጠፋ ይችላል ።

🍎ከተቀጣሪው ምን ይጠበቃል (መስፈርት )❓

🚩 የ entrance exam ወስዶ maths እና physics የተሻለ የሚባል (ከ 70 % በላይ ) ውጤት ያመጣ ፤ወይም በአሁኑ ሰአት applied physics እየተማረ ያለ ወይም  physics አስተማሪ የሆነ ፤
🚩አማርኛ ቋንቋ አቀላጥፎ የሚናገር ፤
🚩የዩኒቨርሲቲ ተማሪ የሆነ ፤
🍏እነዚህን መስፈርት የምታሟሉ ተማሪዎች  ላይ grade 12 maths chapter 2 ን ከ 5 ደቂቃ ያልበለጠ sample video ከ grade 12 certificate ጋር አያይዛችሁ ላኩልን ።
= በስምምነት

text:
-------------Closed/Hired-------------

Job Title: Social Media Manager - Internship 

Company: Mofer Technologies 

Description:
 We are seeking a motivated and tech-savvy Social Media Manager Intern to join our team. We are a Software Development agency providing creative software solutions to prominent companies and influencers. As a Social Media Manager Intern with a technology background, you will play a crucial role in developing and implementing social media strategies that resonate with our audience. This internship provides a unique opportunity to apply your technological expertise to enhance our online presence and engagement. 

Requirements:
 - Passion for technology and a deep understanding of the latest trends in the industry.
- Strong written and verbal communication skills with the ability to convey technical concepts to a non-technical audience.
- Familiarity with social media platforms and their features.
-Creative mindset with the ability to generate engaging content.
- Ability to stay updated on emerging technology trends and incorporate them into social media strategies. 

Role & Responsibilities:
 - Develop and execute social media strategies with a focus on technology trends and innovations.
- Create and curate compelling content related to our products/services, industry news, and tech advancements for various social media platforms.
- Leverage your technical knowledge to engage with our audience on relevant technology discussions and trends.
- Analyze social media metrics and provide insights and recommendations for optimization.
- Stay updated on social media trends and industry best practices.


Benefits:
- Gain hands-on experience in social media management within a technology-focused environment.
- Exposure to a Healthy and collaborative work environment.
- Flexible working hours.
- Pocket money is offered.

How to apply:
Please submit your resume, cover letter, and any relevant social media handles or portfolios to
. Include "Social Media Manager Intern Application" in the subject line.

Job Title: physics and mathematics teacher 

Company: entrance tricks 

Salary: በስምምነት 

Description:
 የቅጥር ማስታወቂያ ለዩኒቨርሲቲ ተማሪዎች 

ᴇɴᴛʀᴀɴᴄᴇ ᴛʀɪᴄᴋs ለዩኒቨርሲቲ ተማሪዎች እየተማራችሁ የምትሰሩትን ስራ ይዞላችሁ መጥቷል ። ᴇɴᴛʀᴀɴᴄᴇ ᴛʀɪᴄᴋs በ online ከ 9- 12 ኛ and remedial ክፍል ያሉ ተማሪዎችን እንደሚያስተምር ይታወቃል ። እናም ለተማሪዎች የ maths እና physics አስተማሪ መቅጠር እንፈልጋለን ።መስፈርቶቹን እና የስራውን ሁኔታ ከዚህ በታች እንገልፃለን ።

🍎የስራ ሁኔታው ምን ይመስላል❓
Maths እና physics ለ entrance tricks ተማሪዎች (ማለትም ለአምስቱም ክላስ ለ 9,10,11,12 and remedial ) ተማሪዎች ሳምንት አንዴ ይሰጣል ። ከተቀጣሪውም የሚጠበቀው ሁለቱን ትምህርቶች በተያዘላቸው ፕሮግራም መፅሀፋቸውን ካነበበ እና ከተረዳ በኋላ በ video መልኩ ቀላል እና ግልጽ በሆነ መንገድ ለተማሪዎች ያስረዳል ። እንዲሁም worksheet ፣ እና ፈተናዎችን እያዘጋጀ ለተማሪዎች ያደርሳል ።

🍎ተቀጣሪው ምን ያክል ጊዜ ያጠፋል ❓

በሳምንት ሁለት ቀን ብቻ ስለሚያስተምር ( ለአንድ ክላስ maximum 1 ሰአት ቢወሰድበት ) በሳምንት ከ 12-15 ሰአት በዚህ ስራ ጊዜውን ሊያጠፋ ይችላል ።

🍎ከተቀጣሪው ምን ይጠበቃል (መስፈርት )❓

🚩 የ entrance exam ወስዶ maths እና physics የተሻለ የሚባል (ከ 70 % በላይ ) ውጤት ያመጣ ፤ወይም በአሁኑ ሰአት applied physics እየተማረ ያለ ወይም  physics አስተማሪ የሆነ ፤
🚩አማርኛ ቋንቋ አቀላጥፎ የሚናገር ፤
🚩የዩኒቨርሲቲ ተማሪ የሆነ ፤
🍏እነዚህን መስፈርት የምታሟሉ ተማሪዎች  ላይ grade 12 maths chapter 2 ን ከ 5 ደቂቃ ያልበለጠ sample video ከ grade 12 certificate ጋር አያይዛችሁ ላኩልን ።

-------------Closed/Hired-------------

Job Title: Graphic designer 

Salary: Negotiation 

Description:
 We are seeking a talented Graphic Designer to join our dynamic team and contribute to our company's visual identity. As a Graphic Designer specializing in marketing materials, you will be responsible for creating engaging and visually appealing content, including gifs, banners, and videos. 

Requirements:
 Graphic Designer Pricing Package:

We value the expertise and creativity of our Graphic Designers, and we offer compensation for their contributions to our marketing materials. Our pricing package is structured as follows:

1. GIFs:
   - Compensation: 200 ETB per GIF

2. Banners:
   - Simple Banners: 400 ETB per banner
   - Moderate Difficulty Banners: 700 ETB per banner
   - Complex Banners: 1000 ETB per banner

3. Short Form Content (Videos):
   - Simple Videos: 1000 ETB per video
   - Moderate Difficulty Videos: 3000 ETB per video
   - Complex Videos: 5000 ETB per video

Note:
- The complexity of banners and videos will be determined based on the project requirements and difficulty level.
- Graphic Designers will be compensated according to the agreed-upon rates for each specific task.

messages.text:
-------------Closed/Hired-------------

Job Title: Gaming software developer 

Salary: 4,500 ETB Per Game developed 

Description:
 We are seeking a skilled Gaming Software Developer with a strong background in creating games. The ideal candidate should have ample time for the project and possess expertise in working with software dedicated to game development. Experience in crafting engaging and innovative gaming experiences within the industry is highly desirable. 

Requirements:
 - Proven experience as a Gaming Software Developer.
- Proficiency in relevant programming languages and game development tools.
- Ability to create visually appealing and immersive gaming experiences.
- Time commitment to meet project deadlines.
- Excellent problem-solving and debugging skills.
Compensation:
- The compensation for this role is 4,500 Ethiopian Birr per game developed. 

Role & Responsibilities:
 1. Develop and implement high-quality games, ensuring they meet project specifications and industry standards.
2. Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including designers and artists, to bring creative concepts to life in the form of engaging gaming experiences.
3. Stay updated on industry trends, emerging technologies, and player preferences to enhance game development strategies.
4. Debug, optimize, and troubleshoot game-related issues, ensuring a seamless and enjoyable player experience.
5. Execute all phases of the game development lifecycle, from concept and design to testing and deployment.
 and deliver high-quality products within the deadline 
6. Maintain documentation for game development processes, ensuring knowledge transfer and team efficiency.

messages.text:
-------------Closed/Hired-------------

Job Title: Builder AI - UI/UX designer 

Company: Afroel Technologies 

Salary: Negotiation 

Description:
 We are looking for UI/UX designer who has proven experience with tools like .builder.ai , adope products , figma and video editing. Please don't apply if you are not efficient development. 

You will be responsible for designing and delivering user interfaces and user experiences that meet the needs of our clients and customers. You will work closely with our product development team to create intuitive and visually appealing designs that enhance the usability of our products. 

Requirements:
 - Bachelor's degree in graphic design, human-computer interaction, or related field
- Proven experience as a UI/UX Designer with a strong portfolio of design projects
- Proficiency in design tools such as Sketch, Adobe Creative Suite, Figma, etc.
- Knowledge of HTML/CSS, JavaScript, and other front-end technologies
- Strong communication and collaboration skills
- Ability to work independently and manage multiple projects simultaneously 

Role & Responsibilities:
 - Design and deliver user-centered interfaces and experiences for web and mobile applications
- Create wireframes, prototypes, and visual designs that effectively communicate design concepts and ideas
- Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure that designs meet business requirements and user needs
- Conduct user research and usability testing to inform design decisions
- Stay up-to-date with industry trends and best practices in UI/UX design

If you are passionate about creating beautiful and intuitive user interfaces and experiences, we would love to hear from you. Please submit your resume and portfolio for consideration.

messages.text:
-------------Closed/Hired-------------

Job Title: DevOps Engineer with AWS Expertise (Focus on Security and Performance): 

Salary: Monthly 

Description:
 We are looking for a skilled AWS DevOps Engineer with a proven track record in cloud services and infrastructure management. 

Requirements:
 -  Proven experience with AWS cloud services and infrastructure management.
-  Strong background in DevOps methodologies and tools such as Jenkins, Docker, Kubernetes, etc.
-  In-depth understanding of cloud-based infrastructure security principles and practices.
-  Proficiency in performance tuning and monitoring in cloud environments.
-  Familiarity with cybersecurity threats, risk management, and mitigation methods.
-  Strong problem-solving skills and adaptability in a fast-paced environment.
-  Excellent communication and collaboration skills.
-  AWS Certifications (like AWS Certified DevOps Engineer) are highly desirable. 

Role & Responsibilities:
 -  Implement, manage, and improve continuous delivery systems and methodologies on AWS.
-  Develop and maintain tools for automation of operational processes in an AWS environment.
-  Ensure optimal security and performance of applications hosted on AWS, using services like EC2, S3, RDS, Lambda, and CloudFormation.
-  Collaborate closely with software engineering teams to integrate security and performance considerations into the development process.
-  Monitor and tune performance metrics, implementing optimizations to enhance application responsiveness and efficiency.
-  Conduct regular security audits, vulnerability assessments, and compliance monitoring specific to AWS cloud environments.
-  Develop, implement, and maintain AWS cloud security strategies, policies, and procedures.
-  Troubleshoot and resolve a variety of issues in varying environments, including development, testing, and production.

messages.text:
-------------Closed/Hired-------------

Job Title: JavaScript Developer with a Focus on Automated Testing 

Salary: Monthly 

Description:
 We are looking for an experienced JavaScript Test Automation Engineer to join our dynamic team. 

Requirements:
 -  Strong expertise in JavaScript and experience with frameworks such as React or Angular.
-  Extensive experience in writing automated tests using Cypress and Postman.
-  Familiarity with CI/CD processes and tools.
-  Good understanding of RESTful APIs, web services, and web application architecture.
-  Excellent analytical, problem-solving, and debugging skills.
-  Ability to work collaboratively in a team environment and communicate effectively.
-  Passion for maintaining high standards of code quality and thoughtful application design. 

Role & Responsibilities:
 -  Develop and maintain web applications using JavaScript and relevant frameworks (React, Angular, etc.).
-  Design and implement automated testing scripts and frameworks, primarily using Cypress and Postman.
-  Collaborate with the development team to define and implement effective testing strategies, ensuring high-quality code.
-  Analyze automated test results, diagnose issues, and track software defects.
-  Integrate automated tests within the continuous integration and deployment (CI/CD) pipeline.
-  Stay abreast of new tools, technologies, and testing strategies in the JavaScript ecosystem.
-  Document and maintain detailed test cases and testing processes.

 -  Develop and maintain web applications using JavaScript and relevant frameworks (React, Angular, etc.).
-  Design and implement automated testing scripts and frameworks, primarily using Cypress and Postman.
-  Collaborate with the development team to define and implement effective testing strategies, ensuring high-quality code.
-  Analyze automated test results, diagnose issues, and track software defects.
-  Integrate automated tests within the continuous integration and deployment (CI/CD) pipeline.
-  Stay abreast of new tools, technologies, and testing strategies in the JavaScript ecosystem.
-  Document and maintain detailed test cases and testing processes.

Job Title: Senior Flutter Developer 

Company: Alpha Tech 

Salary: 25,000 ETB 

Description:
 We are currently in search of a proficient Flutter and GraphQL developer to undertake freelance tasks related to the integration of our mobile application. The successful candidate will be responsible for seamlessly merging our existing GraphQL server with the mobile app, utilizing the Flutter framework. If you possess a fervor for mobile development and possess a comprehensive understanding of React and GraphQL, we invite you to explore this opportunity with us! 

Requirements:
 - have a good knowledge on Flutter GraphQl API
- At least 2 years of experience in Flutter development with in-depth knowledge.
- Experience with Git and version control systems.
- Strong familiarity with Node.js and other Backend technologies.
- Good understanding of RESTful and GraphQL APIs.
- Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail.

Job Title: Content writer for newsletter and blog for a US based startup 

Company: Evoli 

Salary: 50 dollars 

Description:
 Evoli is a US based startup on a mission to revolutionize student life by integrating technology into every aspect of their daily routines. Our platform offers a unified solution for managing academic schedules, budgeting, and much more, all powered by AI. As we expand, we're looking for passionate interns to join our team in two distinct roles: Social Media & Graphics Design Intern and Content Writing Intern for Blog and Newsletter.

This internship is a unique opportunity to contribute to a growing startup, with a chance to transition into a full-time position as our Outreach and Communications Lead. Interns will receive a small stipend at the end of a 2-month period.
Please only submit through the form below.
There will be a 50 dollar stipend compensation at the end of your internship.

text:
Job Title: Motivated social media marketer and promoter 

Company: Qemer Software Technology PLC 

Description:
 Qemer Software Technology is a leading software development company that's dedicated to creating exceptional digital solutions and providing an outstanding customer experience. If you're driven by creativity, have a passion for social media, and are ready to make an impact, we want you on board!
Are you a social media enthusiast with a knack for engaging storytelling? We're seeking a skilled Social Media Marketer and Promoter to join our team. As a key member of our marketing department, you will spearhead our social media presence, engage with our audience, and create compelling content that introduces our innovative solutions to a global audience.
 
Responsibilities:
- Engage with our audience on social media to foster a dynamic and interactive community.
- Collaborate with the marketing team to conceptualize and execute innovative campaigns that drive engagement and conversion through live video formats.
- Spearhead live video sessions across various social media platforms, representing our brand and engaging with our audience effectively.
- Create a vibrant and interactive atmosphere during live sessions, ensuring a compelling and engaging online presence.
 
Qualifications:
- Proven expertise in social media interactions and a strong understanding of online audience engagement.
- Comfortable and confident in front of the camera, able to conduct live video sessions independently and engage with diverse audiences effectively.
- Exceptional verbal communication skills, adept at captivating and retaining the audience's attention.
- Familiarity with social media platforms and their live video functionalities.
- Having basic software knowledge is a plus
- A self-motivated individual with a creative mindset, capable of working effectively both independently and as part of a team.
How to apply:
Interested candidates can send their resumes and cover letters to
or telegram
Approved by

text:
-------------Closed/Hired-------------

Job Title: Front End Developer (Intern) 

Description:
 We are seeking an enthusiastic and motivated individual to join our team as a Front-End Developer (Intern). This internship offers the opportunity to gain hands-on experience in developing responsive web applications, implementing SEO best practices, and utilizing modern front-end technologies such as React.js and Next.js. 

Requirements:
 1.  Strong passion for front-end development and eagerness to learn.
2.  Solid understanding of Next.js, React.js, and their accompanying components.
3.  Knowledge of SEO best practices and willingness to stay updated on industry trends.
4.  Proficiency in JavaScript and modern web development tools.
5.  Familiarity with Git and GitHub for version control.
6.  Demonstrated ability to work effectively in a collaborative team environment.
7.  Prior experience building at least one project in Next.js is preferred. 

Role & Responsibilities:
 1.  Develop responsive web applications using Next.js and React.js.
2.  Create and maintain reusable React components to ensure code efficiency.
3.  Integrate designs seamlessly with user interface elements for optimal user experience.
4.  Implement SEO best practices to enhance website visibility and accessibility.
5.  Conduct keyword research and optimize content for improved search engine rankings.
6.  Utilize JavaScript and React Hooks for enhanced user interactions and state management.
7.  Troubleshoot and optimize code for improved performance and scalability.
8.  Contribute to version control using Git and GitHub for efficient code management.
9.  Collaborate with team members through pull requests and code reviews.
10.  Maintain organized repositories with clear documentation for future reference.

Compensations ad Benefits:
1.  Transport Allowance: Interns will be eligible to receive a transport allowance to help offset the costs associated with commuting to the internship location.
2.  Portfolio Building: Interns can add the projects they work on during the internship to their portfolio, showcasing their skills and experience to potential employers.
3.  Professional Mentorship: Interns will receive guidance and mentorship from experienced developers, helping them to grow as front-end developers.
4.  Letter of Recommendation: Interns who perform well during the internship may receive a letter of recommendation.

How to Apply: If you are an enthusiastic and motivated individual with a passion for front-end development, and you meet the qualifications above, we would love to hear from you! Please fill the form using the link below.

text:
-------------Closed/Hired-------------

Job Title: Economics teacher for grade 9-12 

Company: Entrance Tricks 

Salary: 2,000ETB (Monthly) 

Description:

ማስታወቂያ ለዩኒቨርሲቲ ተማሪዎች 

ᴇɴᴛʀᴀɴᴄᴇ ᴛʀɪᴄᴋs ለዩኒቨርሲቲ ተማሪዎች እየተማራችሁ የምትሰሩትን ስራ ይዞላችሁ መጥቷል ። ᴇɴᴛʀᴀɴᴄᴇ ᴛʀɪᴄᴋs በ online ከ 9- 12 ኛ and remedial ክፍል ያሉ ተማሪዎችን እንደሚያስተምር ይታወቃል ። እናም ለተማሪዎች የ economics አስተማሪ መቅጠር እንፈልጋለን ።መስፈርቶቹን እና የስራውን ሁኔታ ከዚህ በታች እንገልፃለን ።

🍎የስራ ሁኔታው ምን ይመስላል❓
Economics new curriculum book ለ entrance tricks ተማሪዎች (ማለትም ለአ 4ቱም ክላስ ለ 9,10,11,12  ) ተማሪዎች በሳምንት አንዴ ይሰጣል ። ከተቀጣሪውም የሚጠበቀው አራቱንም ክላሶች በተያዘላቸው ፕሮግራም መፅሀፋቸውን ካነበበ እና ከተረዳ በኋላ በ video መልኩ ቀላል እና ግልጽ በሆነ መንገድ ለተማሪዎች ያስረዳል ። እንዲሁም worksheet ፣ እና ፈተናዎችን እያዘጋጀ ለተማሪዎች ያደርሳል ።

🍎ተቀጣሪው ምን ያክል ጊዜ ያጠፋል ❓

በሳምንት 5  ቀን ብቻ ስለሚያስተምር ( ለአንድ ክላስ maximum 1 ሰአት ቢወሰድበት ) በሳምንት ከ 7-8 ሰአት በዚህ ስራ ጊዜውን ሊያጠፋ ይችላል ።

🍎ከተቀጣሪው ምን ይጠበቃል (መስፈርት )❓

🚩 የ entrance exam ወስዶ  የተሻለ የሚባል (ከ 70 % በላይ ) ውጤት ያመጣ ፤ወይም transcript ከ 80 በላይ ያመጣ  ፤
🚩አማርኛ ቋንቋ አቀላጥፎ የሚናገር ፤
🚩የዩኒቨርሲቲ ተማሪ የሆነ ፤
🍏እነዚህን መስፈርት የምታሟሉ ተማሪዎች  ላይ grade 12 economics chapter 2 new curriculum ን ከ 5 ደቂቃ ያልበለጠ sample video ከ grade 12 certificate and transcripte ጋር አያይዛችሁ ላኩልን ።

monthly salary = 2000ETB

Description:

ማስታወቂያ ለዩኒቨርሲቲ ተማሪዎች 

ᴇɴᴛʀᴀɴᴄᴇ ᴛʀɪᴄᴋs ለዩኒቨርሲቲ ተማሪዎች እየተማራችሁ የምትሰሩትን ስራ ይዞላችሁ መጥቷል ። ᴇɴᴛʀᴀɴᴄᴇ ᴛʀɪᴄᴋs በ online ከ 9- 12 ኛ and remedial ክፍል ያሉ ተማሪዎችን እንደሚያስተምር ይታወቃል ። እናም ለተማሪዎች የ economics አስተማሪ መቅጠር እንፈልጋለን ።መስፈርቶቹን እና የስራውን ሁኔታ ከዚህ በታች እንገልፃለን ።

🍎የስራ ሁኔታው ምን ይመስላል❓
Economics new curriculum book ለ entrance tricks ተማሪዎች (ማለትም ለአ 4ቱም ክላስ ለ 9,10,11,12  ) ተማሪዎች በሳምንት አንዴ ይሰጣል ። ከተቀጣሪውም የሚጠበቀው አራቱንም ክላሶች በተያዘላቸው ፕሮግራም መፅሀፋቸውን ካነበበ እና ከተረዳ በኋላ በ video መልኩ ቀላል እና ግልጽ በሆነ መንገድ ለተማሪዎች ያስረዳል ። እንዲሁም worksheet ፣ እና ፈተናዎችን እያዘጋጀ ለተማሪዎች ያደርሳል ።

🍎ተቀጣሪው ምን ያክል ጊዜ ያጠፋል ❓

በሳምንት 5  ቀን ብቻ ስለሚያስተምር ( ለአንድ ክላስ maximum 1 ሰአት ቢወሰድበት ) በሳምንት ከ 7-8 ሰአት በዚህ ስራ ጊዜውን ሊያጠፋ ይችላል ።

🍎ከተቀጣሪው ምን ይጠበቃል (መስፈርት )❓

🚩 የ entrance exam ወስዶ  የተሻለ የሚባል (ከ 70 % በላይ ) ውጤት ያመጣ ፤ወይም transcript ከ 80 በላይ ያመጣ  ፤
🚩አማርኛ ቋንቋ አቀላጥፎ የሚናገር ፤
🚩የዩኒቨርሲቲ ተማሪ የሆነ ፤
🍏እነዚህን መስፈርት የምታሟሉ ተማሪዎች  ላይ grade 12 economics chapter 2 new curriculum ን ከ 5 ደቂቃ ያልበለጠ sample video ከ grade 12 certificate and transcripte ጋር አያይዛችሁ ላኩልን ።

monthly salary = 2000ETB

Job Title: Online Sale and promotion 

Company: Yeab online market 

Salary: Base on commission 

Description:
 We are looking for sales persons who can promote and sell our services online. 

Requirements:
 • informing customers the benefits of the services we provide       
• Increasing sales by promoting the services.
• Taking and following up orders
•develop and maintain sales and promotional materials. 

Role & Responsibilities:
 Additional qualifications  
• Must have an internet access and able to spend a few minutes of your day online to hit the target sales
• Exceptional ability in meeting sales targets. 
• Experience in record keeping  sales and contracts and update upon requests
• Excellent communication and interpersonal skills. 
• Self-motivated and driven for to scale up the sales.
• Having an existing multiple social media accounts is a plus. 
Contact -
Approved by

🍏እነዚህን መስፈርት የምታሟሉ ተማሪዎች  ላይ grade 12 geography chapter 2 new curriculum ን ከ 5 ደቂቃ ያልበለጠ sample video ከ grade 12 certificate and transcripte ጋር አያይዛችሁ ላኩልን ።

monthly salary = 2000ETB

-------------Closed/Hired-------------

Job Title: geography teacher for grade 9-12 and remedial students 

Company: ENTRANCE TRICKS 

Description:
 የቅጥር ማስታወቂያ ለዩኒቨርሲቲ ተማሪዎች 

ᴇɴᴛʀᴀɴᴄᴇ ᴛʀɪᴄᴋs ለዩኒቨርሲቲ ተማሪዎች እየተማራችሁ የምትሰሩትን ስራ ይዞላችሁ መጥቷል ። ᴇɴᴛʀᴀɴᴄᴇ ᴛʀɪᴄᴋs በ online ከ 9- 12 ኛ and remedial ክፍል ያሉ ተማሪዎችን እንደሚያስተምር ይታወቃል ። እናም ለተማሪዎች የ geography አስተማሪ መቅጠር እንፈልጋለን ።መስፈርቶቹን እና የስራውን ሁኔታ ከዚህ በታች እንገልፃለን ።

🍎የስራ ሁኔታው ምን ይመስላል❓
geography new curriculum book ለ entrance tricks ተማሪዎች (ማለትም ለአ 5ቱም ክላስ ለ 9,10,11,12 and remedial  ) ተማሪዎች በሳምንት አንዴ ይሰጣል ። ከተቀጣሪውም የሚጠበቀው 5ቱንም ክላሶች በተያዘላቸው ፕሮግራም መፅሀፋቸውን ካነበበ እና ከተረዳ በኋላ በ video መልኩ ቀላል እና ግልጽ በሆነ መንገድ ለተማሪዎች ያስረዳል ። እንዲሁም worksheet ፣ እና ፈተናዎችን እያዘጋጀ ለተማሪዎች ያደርሳል ።

🍎ተቀጣሪው ምን ያክል ጊዜ ያጠፋል ❓

በሳምንት 5  ቀን ብቻ ስለሚያስተምር ( ለአንድ ክላስ maximum 1 ሰአት ቢወሰድበት ) በሳምንት ከ 7-8 ሰአት በዚህ ስራ ጊዜውን ሊያጠፋ ይችላል ።

🍎ከተቀጣሪው ምን ይጠበቃል (መስፈርት )❓

🚩 የ entrance exam ወስዶ  የተሻለ የሚባል (ከ 70 % በላይ ) ውጤት ያመጣ ፤ወይም transcript ከ 80 በላይ ያመጣ  ፤
🚩አማርኛ ቋንቋ አቀላጥፎ የሚናገር ፤
🚩የዩኒቨርሲቲ ተማሪ የሆነ ፤
🍏እነዚህን መስፈርት የምታሟሉ ተማሪዎች  ላይ grade 12 geography chapter 2 new curriculum ን ከ 5 ደቂቃ ያልበለጠ sample video ከ grade 12 certificate and transcripte ጋር አያይዛችሁ ላኩልን ።

monthly salary = 2000ETB

messages.text:
-------------Closed/Hired-------------

Job Title: Internship Django developer 

Company: Afroel Technologies 

Description:
 We are looking for  disciplined python django framework internship developer who wants to work on existing projects. The applicant needs to have experience in server rendering development and VPS server management as well. He is supposed to work existing projects that has been building for a long time. He need to have skills advanced django framework specific to django channels and django tenants.

Responsibilities:
- Collaborate with the development team to design, develop, and maintain web applications using Django framework
- Write clean, efficient, and well-documented code
- Participate in code reviews and provide constructive feedback
- Assist in troubleshooting and debugging issues
- Stay up-to-date with the latest technologies and best practices in web development

Requirements:
- Proficiency in Python and experience with Django framework
- Familiarity with front-end technologies such as HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
- Understanding of database management systems, particularly PostgreSQL
- Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail
- Ability to work independently and as part of a team
- Excellent communication and interpersonal skills

Potential Benefits:
- Hands-on experience working on real-world projects
- Mentorship and guidance from experienced developers
- Opportunity to learn and grow within a startup environment
- Networking opportunities with industry professionals
- Possibility of a full-time position upon successful completion of the internship

If you are passionate about web development and eager to learn, we would love to hear from you. Please submit your resume and a cover letter explaining why you are interested in this internship opportunity. We look forward to welcoming you to our team!

text:
Job Title: Online job 

Company: Ethio market 

Salary: Commission 

Description:
 ከፊታችን Valentine day እየመጣ ነው feb 14 ፍቅረኝማቾች ስጦታ የሚሰጣጡበት ቀን እኝም ይሂን በማሰብ ብዙ እቃዎች አስገብተናል 
- ሰአት
- ሽቶ
- ቦርሳ
-መነጽር 
- gift package 
ሊላም ብዙ እቃዎች አስገብተናል። እንዳያመልጦ ከኝ ጋር በመስራት ትርፋማ ይሁኑ።

-እድሜም ሆነ እውቀት የማይገድበው 
-ባሉበት ቦታ ሆነው በተመቸ ሰአት ሊሰራ የሚችል
- ያለምንም መነሻ ካፒታል ኢንተርኔት እና ስልኮን ብቻ በመጠቀም የሚሰሩት ትልቅ የ ስራ እድል  ይዘን መጥተናል። 
-ከእርሶ የሚጠበቀው ኢንተርኔት እና  ስልኮን በመጠቀም ምርቶቻችንን ያስተዋውቁ ከሚሸጡት እያንዳንድ እቃ ጠቀም ያለ ኮሚሽን ያግኙ።
- ከኝጋ መስራት የምትፈልጉ በ

inbox ላይ 
አድርጉን።
እንዲሁም ለበለጠ መረጃ በ ስልክ መስመራችን

ላይ ይደውሉልን። 
       
Approved by
Share:

Description:
 የቅጥር ማስታወቂያ ለዩኒቨርሲቲ ተማሪዎች 

ᴇɴᴛʀᴀɴᴄᴇ ᴛʀɪᴄᴋs ለዩኒቨርሲቲ ተማሪዎች እየተማራችሁ የምትሰሩትን ስራ ይዞላችሁ መጥቷል ። ᴇɴᴛʀᴀɴᴄᴇ ᴛʀɪᴄᴋs በ online ከ 9- 12 ኛ and remedial ክፍል ያሉ ተማሪዎችን እንደሚያስተምር ይታወቃል ። እናም ለተማሪዎች የ geography and biology አስተማሪወች መቅጠር እንፈልጋለን ።መስፈርቶቹን እና የስራውን ሁኔታ ከዚህ በታች እንገልፃለን ።

🍎የስራ ሁኔታው ምን ይመስላል❓
geography and biology new curriculum book ለ entrance tricks ተማሪዎች (ማለትም ለአ 5ቱም ክላስ ለ 9,10,11,12 and remedial  ) ተማሪዎች በሳምንት አንዴ ይሰጣል ። ከተቀጣሪውም የሚጠበቀው 5ቱንም ክላሶች በተያዘላቸው ፕሮግራም መፅሀፋቸውን ካነበበ እና ከተረዳ በኋላ በ video መልኩ ቀላል እና ግልጽ በሆነ መንገድ ለተማሪዎች ያስረዳል ። እንዲሁም worksheet ፣ እና ፈተናዎችን እያዘጋጀ ለተማሪዎች ያደርሳል ።

🍎ተቀጣሪው ምን ያክል ጊዜ ያጠፋል ❓

በሳምንት 5  ቀን ብቻ ስለሚያስተምር ( ለአንድ ክላስ maximum 1 ሰአት ቢወሰድበት ) በሳምንት ከ 7-8 ሰአት በዚህ ስራ ጊዜውን ሊያጠፋ ይችላል ።

🍎ከተቀጣሪው ምን ይጠበቃል (መስፈርት )❓

🚩 የ entrance exam ወስዶ  የተሻለ የሚባል (ከ 70 % በላይ ) ውጤት ያመጣ ፤ወይም transcript ከ 80 በላይ ያመጣ  ፤
🚩አማርኛ ቋንቋ አቀላጥፎ የሚናገር ፤
🚩የዩኒቨርሲቲ ተማሪ የሆነ ፤
🍏እነዚህን መስፈርት የምታሟሉ ተማሪዎች  ላይ grade 12 geography (for social) or biology (natural) chapter 2 new curriculum ን ከ 5 ደቂቃ ያልበለጠ sample video ከ grade 12 certificate and transcript ጋር አያይዛችሁ ላኩልን ።

text:
Job Title: Canvas LMS Expert - Ubuntu Server Installation 

Company: Creavers 

Salary: Negotiation 

Description:
 Are you a skilled Canvas LMS expert with a knack for seamless server installations? We're seeking a talented individual to join our team and assist in the installation of Canvas LMS on Ubuntu servers. As we strive to enhance our e-learning platform, your expertise will be instrumental in ensuring a smooth and efficient deployment process. 

Requirements:
 Proven experience in installing and configuring Canvas LMS on Ubuntu servers.
Proficiency in Linux server administration, particularly with Ubuntu.
Strong understanding of LMS systems and their functionalities.
Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
Ability to work independently and collaboratively in a fast-paced environment.
Effective communication skills and the ability to convey technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders. 

Role & Responsibilities:
 Install and configure Canvas LMS on Ubuntu servers, ensuring optimal performance and reliability.
Collaborate with the IT team to troubleshoot any installation issues and implement solutions effectively.
Customize Canvas LMS settings and features to meet specific organizational requirements.
Provide guidance and support to team members on Canvas LMS usage and administration.
Stay updated with the latest Canvas LMS developments and best practices to enhance platform functionality.

Approved by

Job Title: Junior Animation creator 

Company: afrowise 

Salary: Negotiable (monthly) 

Description:
 We are a leading online course providing company looking for a talented and creative Junior Animation Creator to join our team. The ideal candidate will be responsible for creating engaging and informative animations based on the content provided to them. 

Requirements:
 - A strong portfolio showcasing your animation skills and creativity
- Proficiency in animation software such as Adobe After Effects, Toon Boom, or similar programs
- Excellent communication and teamwork skills
- Ability to work independently and manage multiple projects simultaneously
- A passion for learning and a desire to create engaging educational content

- Collaborate with the content team to understand the course material and develop animations that enhance the learning experience

- Stay up-to-date on industry trends and best practices in animation design

Please contact

text:
Job Title: Odoo ERP Developer Intern 

Company: afroel Technologies 

Description:
 We are currently seeking a highly motivated and skilled Odoo ERP Developer Intern to join our team. The ideal candidate should have a proven track record in Odoo ERP development, VPS server management, and proficiency in Python and Django framework.

Responsibilities:
- Assist in the design, development, and implementation of Odoo ERP solutions
- Manage VPS servers and ensure their smooth operation
- Collaborate with team members to troubleshoot and resolve technical issues
- Develop custom modules and features for Odoo ERP system
- Perform quality assurance testing and debugging

Requirements:
- Proven experience in Odoo ERP development
- Strong knowledge of VPS server management
- Proficiency in Python and Django framework
- Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail
- Ability to work independently and as part of a team
- Strong communication and interpersonal skills

This internship program offers a valuable opportunity to gain hands-on experience in Odoo ERP development and server management. If you meet the requirements and are eager to learn and grow in a dynamic environment, we encourage you to apply only if you have proven skills in the listed requirements.
Approved by

Company: vancher It solution plc 

Salary: 30000ETB 

Description:
 We are seeking a talented and experienced Full Stack Developer who specializes in React and Flutter to join our dynamic development team. As a Full Stack Developer, you will be responsible for developing and maintaining web and mobile applications using cutting-edge technologies. If you are passionate about building innovative and user-friendly software solutions, we want to hear from you!

 Proven experience as a Full Stack Developer, with expertise in React and Flutter.
Strong proficiency in JavaScript, HTML, CSS, and related web technologies.
Knowledge of version control systems (e.g., Git) and agile development methodologies.

text:
Job Title: Content creator and social media manager 

Company: Etege design 

Salary: Negotiation 

Description:
 Are you passionate about leveraging the power of the digital landscape to drive impactful marketing campaigns? We're seeking a talented and dynamic Digital Marketing Specialist to join our team! 

Requirements:
 1. Strategy Development: Devise comprehensive digital marketing strategies aligned with business goals.

2. Campaign Management: Plan, execute, and optimize digital campaigns across various channels (SEO, SEM, social media, email, etc.).

3. Content Creation: Help and guide in Developing engaging and relevant content for digital platforms to attract and retain target audiences

4. Analytics and Reporting: Monitor and analyze performance metrics, providing insights and recommendations for ongoing improvements.

5. SEO Optimization: Implement SEO strategies to enhance online visibility and rankings.

6. Social Media Management: Curate and manage content across social media platforms, fostering community engagement.

7. Email Marketing: Design and execute effective email campaigns, targeting specific audience segments.


Qualifications:

- Proven experience in digital marketing, with a focus on strategy and execution. (Interior design and furniture company) preferable 
- In-depth knowledge of SEO, SEM, social media, and other digital marketing channels.
- Strong analytical skills and proficiency in digital marketing analytics tools.
- Creative mindset with excellent communication and copywriting skills.
- Ability to stay updated on industry trends and incorporate innovative strategies.

Send your CV through info.etegedesign@gmail
Or

Role & Responsibilities:
 Daily social media management

Approved by

-------------Closed/Hired-------------

Job Title: WordPress Developer - Commission Distribution System 

Company: Nova Light Digital 

Salary: Negotiation 

Description:
 Analyze existing website infrastructure and payment gateway setup.
Research and evaluate available plugins and integrations suitable for the commission distribution system.

Develop a comprehensive technical plan for implementing the chosen solution, considering:

Automatic calculation of commission percentages (2% for merchants, 0.66667% for customers, 0.33333% for site owner) based on each sale.

Seamless integration with the website's order and payment processes.
Integration with existing user roles (customer, merchant, site owner) and creation of a new role for managing withdrawals.

Development of a secure and user-friendly withdrawal system for merchants and customers.

Integration with relevant accounting software (if applicable).

Implement the chosen solution through custom coding, plugin customizations, or API integrations.

Ensure compatibility with the current WordPress version, theme, and plugins.

Perform rigorous testing to ensure accuracy and functionality of the system.
Provide ongoing maintenance and support for the implemented solution.

Document the development process and system functionality clearly.

Qualifications:

Strong experience in WordPress development, including custom plugin development and theme customization.
Proficient in PHP, JavaScript, and HTML/CSS.

Familiarity with WooCommerce and eCommerce development principles.
Experience with payment gateway integrations, preferably Stripe Connect.
Excellent understanding of security best practices for WordPress development.
Ability to work independently and as part of a team.
Excellent communication and problem-solving skills.

Salary: Negotiation 

Description:
 Analyze existing website infrastructure and payment gateway setup.
Research and evaluate available plugins and integrations suitable for the commission distribution system.

Develop a comprehensive technical plan for implementing the chosen solution, considering:

Automatic calculation of commission percentages (2% for merchants, 0.66667% for customers, 0.33333% for site owner) based on each sale.

Seamless integration with the website's order and payment processes.
Integration with existing user roles (customer, merchant, site owner) and creation of a new role for managing withdrawals.

Development of a secure and user-friendly withdrawal system for merchants and customers.

Integration with relevant accounting software (if applicable).

Implement the chosen solution through custom coding, plugin customizations, or API integrations.

Ensure compatibility with the current WordPress version, theme, and plugins.

Perform rigorous testing to ensure accuracy and functionality of the system.
Provide ongoing maintenance and support for the implemented solution.

Document the development process and system functionality clearly.

Qualifications:

Strong experience in WordPress development, including custom plugin development and theme customization.
Proficient in PHP, JavaScript, and HTML/CSS.

Familiarity with WooCommerce and eCommerce development principles.
Experience with payment gateway integrations, preferably Stripe Connect.
Excellent understanding of security best practices for WordPress development.
Ability to work independently and as part of a team.
Excellent communication and problem-solving skills.
