Description:
 ስራው በ Voice over , stock videos , Ai ..የሚዘጋጁ የ YouTube video ማዘጋጀት ነው ። 

የሚላኩለትን video ሀሳቦች መተርጎም እና ማዘጋጀት ,እንዲሁም አዳዲስ contents መስራት ።

ከዚ በፊት you tube ሰርቶ የሚያውቅ ወይም የምታውቅ ። ስራዎችን ማሳየት መቻል ።

በጣም ጥሩ የ editing ክህሎት መኖር አለበት 

ጥሩ የሚባል የ voice over sounds and equipments ያስፈልጋል።

Job Title: Django developer 

Company: Labs 

Salary: 3,000 ETB 

Description:
 Hello, We are currently seeking a skilled freelancer to integrate VideoSDK into our Django project.

VideoSDK

UI 100% done, only backend

Key Responsibilities:
1.  Integrate VideoSDK functionalities into our existing Django project.
2.  Ensure seamless communication between the Django backend and VideoSDK.
3.  Implement necessary frontend components to utilize VideoSDK features.

Requirements:
1.  Proficiency in Django web development.
2.  Strong understanding of RESTful APIs.
3.  Experience with integrating third-party SDKs into web applications.
4.  Familiarity with frontend technologies such as HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

If you're interested in this project, please respond with your relevant experience and estimated timeline/cost for completing the integration. Additionally, feel free to ask any questions you may have regarding the project details.

PM to me for more informations.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Thank you for your cooperation

messages.text:
-------------Closed/Hired-------------

Job Title: Software engineer 

Salary: Monthly 

Description:
 Position Overview:
We are looking for a versatile Software Engineer with a strong background in full stack development, mobile app development, and system administration. The ideal candidate will play a key role in designing, developing, and maintaining software solutions that drive our business forward.

Responsibilities:

- Design, develop, and maintain full stack software applications.
- Develop and maintain mobile applications for iOS and Android platforms.
- Manage server infrastructure and system administration tasks.
- Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features.
- Ensure the performance, quality, and responsiveness of applications.
- Troubleshoot, debug, and optimise code for maximum performance.

Qualifications:

- Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field.
- Proven experience as a Full Stack Software Engineer with expertise in front-end and back-end technologies.
- Solid experience in mobile app development for iOS and Android using frameworks such as React Native and Flutter.
- Proficiency in server management and system administration tasks.
- Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
- Excellent communication and teamwork skills.

Requirements:

- 2+ years of professional experience in software development.
- Proficiency in programming languages such as JavaScript, Python, dart.
- Experience with modern web frameworks ( Django, Laravel,  Express, Node).
- Knowledge of database systems (e.g., MySQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB).
- Familiarity with cloud services (e.g., AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud).

text:
-------------Closed/Hired-------------

Job Title: Job Title: የኦንላይን(Online) ላይ ትምህርት ኮርሶች ዝርዝርና ይዘቶች አዘጋጅ 

Salary: በስምምነት 

Description:
 የኦንላይን(Online) ላይ ትምህርት ኮርሶች ዝርዝርና ይዘቶች አዘጋጅ
የስራ ዝርዝር መግለጫ----
ግሩም የፈጠራ ችሎታና ተሰጥዎ ያለው የኦንላይን(Online) ላይ ትምህርት ኮርሶች ዝርዝርና ይዘቶች አዘጋጅ እንፈልጋለን፡፡ ለዚህ አመልካች፤ በኢንተርኔት ላይ ለምናካሂደው ትምህርት የሚሆኑ ቀልብ ሳቢና አጥጋቢ ይዘት(Content) ያላቸው መማሪያዎች ማዘጋጀት የስራ ድርሻና ሃላፊነት ይሆናል፡፡ ስለዚህም፤ ከፍተኛ የጥራት ደረጃ ያለው የኮርስ ይዘት በማዘጋጀት የተማሪዎችን ፍላጎቶች የማሟላትና ከኛም የትምህርት አላማ ጋር ተስማሚ የሆነ ሂደት የመዘርጋት ሚና መጫዎት መቻል ይኖርበታል፡፡

1.  የኮርስ ይዘቶች ማዘጋጀት(Content Creation)- ለተለያዩ ኮርሶችና የትምህርት አይነቶች የሚሆኑ፤ ቀልብ ሳቢና አሳታፊ መማሪያወችን፤ እንዲሁም ቪዮዎችን፣ ጥያቄዎችን፣ገለጻዎችንና ዳሰሳዎችን ማዘጋጀት ይሆናል፡፡
2.  የኮርስ ዲዛይን ዝግጅትን በተመለከተ(Course Design)- ከድርጅቱ የትምህርት አላማዎች ጋር ተስማሚ የሆኑና በቅጡ የተዋቀሩ ሁለንተናዊ ኮርሶች ለማዘጋጀት እንዲቻል፤ የሚፈለጉትን የትምህርት አይነቶችና የትምህርት አሰጣጥ ስልቶች አዘጋጅ ከሆኑ ባለሙያዎች ጋር ተባብሮ መስራት፡፡
3.  የምርምርና የትንታኔ ስራ(Research and Analysis)- የሚዘጋጁትን (የተዘጋጁትን) የኮርስ ይዘቶች የተገቢነትና የትክክለኛነት ደረጃ ለመጠበቅና ለማረጋገጥ የሚያስችሉ የምርምሮችና የትንታኔ ስራዎች ማካሄድ፡፡ 
4.  የመልቲ-ሚዲያ አቅርቦት ስራዎች(Multimedia Production)- ቪዲዮዎቸ፣ በተቀረጹ ድምጾችና በእይታዊ ምስሎች አማካይነት የሚተላለፉ ይዘቶችን የማዘጋጀት ስራንና ሂደት መምራት፡፡ 
5.  የጥራት ዋስትናን የሚመለከቱ ስራዎች(Quality Assurance)- የኮርሶችን ግልጽና ወጥ መሆን፤ እንዲሁም ከተቀየሱት የትምህርት አሰጣጥ መርሆዎች ጋር ተስማሚ የመሆንና ያለመሆን ሁኔታ መገምገም፣ ማስተካከል፣ ማረም፡፡ 
6.  ከሌሎች ጋር ተባባሪ ስለመሆን(Collaboration)- በጥራት ደረጃቸው በጣም ከፍ ያሉ የኢንተርኔት ላይ የትምህርት አቅርቦቶች ስኬታማነት እንዲረጋገጥ፤ ከሌሎች ከሚመለከታቸው አካላት፣ ዲዛይነሮች፣ አሰልጣኞችና መምህራን ጋር በትብብር መስራት፡፡
7.  ራስን ከጊዜው ስለማደሳደግና ስለማሻሻል(Stay Updated)- የማናቸውም ትምህርት የመስጫ  ስልቶችና መገልገያዎች፤ የጥራት ደረጃና  ውጤታማነት እየተሻሻለ እንዲሄድ፤ ከተለያዩ ሚዲያዎች ላይ ጊዜው ወይም ዘመኑ የሚያመጣቸውን አዳዲስ አቀራረቦችና አተገባበሮች ማየት መከታተልና በተግባር ማዋል፡፡ 
መስፈርቶች
1.  ለኢንተርኔት ወይንም የኦንላይን(Online) መድረኮች የሚሆኑ ኮርሶችን በማበልጸግና  ይዘቶችን በማዘጋጀት ረገድ በማስረጃ የተረጋገጠ ልምድ ያለው  
2.  ስለትምህርት አሰጣጥ የዲዛይን መርሆዎች፤ ንድፈ ሃሳቦችና ስለማስተማር ጉዳዮች  ጥልቅ እውቀት ያለው
3.  እንደ ቪዲዮ ኤዲቲንግ፣ የኤሌክትሮኒቸስ ድርሳናት ዝግጅትና የግራፊክ ዲዛይኖች ያሉ የመልቲ ሚዲያ አቅርቦት ሶፈወትዌሮችን በሚመለከት እውቀት ያለው ወይም ችሎታ ያለው ቢሆን ይመረጣል፡፡
4.  በጽሁፍም ሆነ በነገሮች ላይ ግሩም ክህሎት ያለውና ውስብስብ ጽንሰ ሃሳቦችን አጠር አድርጎ በጣም ግልጽ በሆነ መልክ ማቅረብ የሚችል
5.  ጠንካራ የድርጅታዊና የፕሮጀክት ስራ አመራር ችሎታ፤ እንዲሁም የተለያዩ ተጓዳኝ ስራዎችንም መስራትና ቀነ ገደቦችን የማክበር ችሎታና ፈቃደኝነት ያለው 
6.  ውጤታማ የሆነ የትምህርት ልምድ ለሌሎች ለማጎናጸፍ፤ ከፍተኛ ፍቅርንና ፍላጎትን ከፈጠራ ችሎታ ጋር አስተባብሮ በያዘ የአእምሮ ሁኔታና ዝንባሌ ውስጥ ያለ 
7.  በ‹ኤዱኬሽን› የትምህርት  ዘርፍ የመጀመሪ ዲግሪ ያለው ቢሆን ይመረጣል ካልሆነ በተመሳሳይ የስራ ልምድ ያለው፡፡ 
የኦንላይን ላይ ትምህርቶችና ኮርሶችን በማዘጋጀት ረገድ፤ ተነሳሽነት፤ እንዲሁም የመሻሻልና ነገሮችን የማሻሻል ፍቅርና ፍላጎት ያለው መሆን መቻል አለበት፡፡ ከፍተኛ ጥራት ያለው የኦንላይን(Online) ላይ እውቀት ማዘጋጀትና ተማሪዎችን ለማጎልበት አስተዋጽኦ ማድረግ የሚችል፡፡ 
ስለራስዎ የሚገልጽ አጭር ማጠቃለያ፣ እንዲሁም የስራና የትምህርት ደረጃ ዝርዝር፤ እንዴት  ከላይ ለተጠየቀው ስራ ብቁ እንደሆኑ፤ እንዲሁም ልምድዎ ምን እንደሆነ ባጭሩ  የሚገልጽ በፅሁፍ እዚሁ ቴሌግራም አካውንት ላይ ይላኩት(ያቅርቡ)፡፡
በቋሚነት/Fulltime መስራት ሚችል ሰው ቢሆን ተመራጭ ይሆናል

አይነት - ዲጂታል ማርኬቲንግ ግራፊክስ ዲዛይንና የመሳሰሉትን ያካትታል

ስልክ፡- 0914 949494 ወይም 0908 222223

-------------Closed/Hired-------------

Job Title: Job Title: የኦንላይን(Online) ላይ ትምህርት ኮርሶች ዝርዝርና ይዘቶች አዘጋጅ 

Salary: በስምምነት 

Description:
 የኦንላይን(Online) ላይ ትምህርት ኮርሶች ዝርዝርና ይዘቶች አዘጋጅ
የስራ ዝርዝር መግለጫ----
ግሩም የፈጠራ ችሎታና ተሰጥዎ ያለው የኦንላይን(Online) ላይ ትምህርት ኮርሶች ዝርዝርና ይዘቶች አዘጋጅ እንፈልጋለን፡፡ ለዚህ አመልካች፤ በኢንተርኔት ላይ ለምናካሂደው ትምህርት የሚሆኑ ቀልብ ሳቢና አጥጋቢ ይዘት(Content) ያላቸው መማሪያዎች ማዘጋጀት የስራ ድርሻና ሃላፊነት ይሆናል፡፡ ስለዚህም፤ ከፍተኛ የጥራት ደረጃ ያለው የኮርስ ይዘት በማዘጋጀት የተማሪዎችን ፍላጎቶች የማሟላትና ከኛም የትምህርት አላማ ጋር ተስማሚ የሆነ ሂደት የመዘርጋት ሚና መጫዎት መቻል ይኖርበታል፡፡

1.  የኮርስ ይዘቶች ማዘጋጀት(Content Creation)- ለተለያዩ ኮርሶችና የትምህርት አይነቶች የሚሆኑ፤ ቀልብ ሳቢና አሳታፊ መማሪያወችን፤ እንዲሁም ቪዮዎችን፣ ጥያቄዎችን፣ገለጻዎችንና ዳሰሳዎችን ማዘጋጀት ይሆናል፡፡
2.  የኮርስ ዲዛይን ዝግጅትን በተመለከተ(Course Design)- ከድርጅቱ የትምህርት አላማዎች ጋር ተስማሚ የሆኑና በቅጡ የተዋቀሩ ሁለንተናዊ ኮርሶች ለማዘጋጀት እንዲቻል፤ የሚፈለጉትን የትምህርት አይነቶችና የትምህርት አሰጣጥ ስልቶች አዘጋጅ ከሆኑ ባለሙያዎች ጋር ተባብሮ መስራት፡፡
3.  የምርምርና የትንታኔ ስራ(Research and Analysis)- የሚዘጋጁትን (የተዘጋጁትን) የኮርስ ይዘቶች የተገቢነትና የትክክለኛነት ደረጃ ለመጠበቅና ለማረጋገጥ የሚያስችሉ የምርምሮችና የትንታኔ ስራዎች ማካሄድ፡፡ 
4.  የመልቲ-ሚዲያ አቅርቦት ስራዎች(Multimedia Production)- ቪዲዮዎቸ፣ በተቀረጹ ድምጾችና በእይታዊ ምስሎች አማካይነት የሚተላለፉ ይዘቶችን የማዘጋጀት ስራንና ሂደት መምራት፡፡ 
5.  የጥራት ዋስትናን የሚመለከቱ ስራዎች(Quality Assurance)- የኮርሶችን ግልጽና ወጥ መሆን፤ እንዲሁም ከተቀየሱት የትምህርት አሰጣጥ መርሆዎች ጋር ተስማሚ የመሆንና ያለመሆን ሁኔታ መገምገም፣ ማስተካከል፣ ማረም፡፡ 
6.  ከሌሎች ጋር ተባባሪ ስለመሆን(Collaboration)- በጥራት ደረጃቸው በጣም ከፍ ያሉ የኢንተርኔት ላይ የትምህርት አቅርቦቶች ስኬታማነት እንዲረጋገጥ፤ ከሌሎች ከሚመለከታቸው አካላት፣ ዲዛይነሮች፣ አሰልጣኞችና መምህራን ጋር በትብብር መስራት፡፡
7.  ራስን ከጊዜው ስለማደሳደግና ስለማሻሻል(Stay Updated)- የማናቸውም ትምህርት የመስጫ  ስልቶችና መገልገያዎች፤ የጥራት ደረጃና  ውጤታማነት እየተሻሻለ እንዲሄድ፤ ከተለያዩ ሚዲያዎች ላይ ጊዜው ወይም ዘመኑ የሚያመጣቸውን አዳዲስ አቀራረቦችና አተገባበሮች ማየት መከታተልና በተግባር ማዋል፡፡ 
መስፈርቶች
1.  ለኢንተርኔት ወይንም የኦንላይን(Online) መድረኮች የሚሆኑ ኮርሶችን በማበልጸግና  ይዘቶችን በማዘጋጀት ረገድ በማስረጃ የተረጋገጠ ልምድ ያለው  
2.  ስለትምህርት አሰጣጥ የዲዛይን መርሆዎች፤ ንድፈ ሃሳቦችና ስለማስተማር ጉዳዮች  ጥልቅ እውቀት ያለው
3.  እንደ ቪዲዮ ኤዲቲንግ፣ የኤሌክትሮኒቸስ ድርሳናት ዝግጅትና የግራፊክ ዲዛይኖች ያሉ የመልቲ ሚዲያ አቅርቦት ሶፈወትዌሮችን በሚመለከት እውቀት ያለው ወይም ችሎታ ያለው ቢሆን ይመረጣል፡፡
4.  በጽሁፍም ሆነ በነገሮች ላይ ግሩም ክህሎት ያለውና ውስብስብ ጽንሰ ሃሳቦችን አጠር አድርጎ በጣም ግልጽ በሆነ መልክ ማቅረብ የሚችል
5.  ጠንካራ የድርጅታዊና የፕሮጀክት ስራ አመራር ችሎታ፤ እንዲሁም የተለያዩ ተጓዳኝ ስራዎችንም መስራትና ቀነ ገደቦችን የማክበር ችሎታና ፈቃደኝነት ያለው 
6.  ውጤታማ የሆነ የትምህርት ልምድ ለሌሎች ለማጎናጸፍ፤ ከፍተኛ ፍቅርንና ፍላጎትን ከፈጠራ ችሎታ ጋር አስተባብሮ በያዘ የአእምሮ ሁኔታና ዝንባሌ ውስጥ ያለ 
7.  በ‹ኤዱኬሽን› የትምህርት  ዘርፍ የመጀመሪ ዲግሪ ያለው ቢሆን ይመረጣል ካልሆነ በተመሳሳይ የስራ ልምድ ያለው፡፡ 
የኦንላይን ላይ ትምህርቶችና ኮርሶችን በማዘጋጀት ረገድ፤ ተነሳሽነት፤ እንዲሁም የመሻሻልና ነገሮችን የማሻሻል ፍቅርና ፍላጎት ያለው መሆን መቻል አለበት፡፡ ከፍተኛ ጥራት ያለው የኦንላይን(Online) ላይ እውቀት ማዘጋጀትና ተማሪዎችን ለማጎልበት አስተዋጽኦ ማድረግ የሚችል፡፡ 
ስለራስዎ የሚገልጽ አጭር ማጠቃለያ፣ እንዲሁም የስራና የትምህርት ደረጃ ዝርዝር፤ እንዴት  ከላይ ለተጠየቀው ስራ ብቁ እንደሆኑ፤ እንዲሁም ልምድዎ ምን እንደሆነ ባጭሩ  የሚገልጽ በፅሁፍ እዚሁ ቴሌግራም አካውንት ላይ ይላኩት(ያቅርቡ)፡፡
በቋሚነት/Fulltime መስራት ሚችል ሰው ቢሆን ተመራጭ ይሆናል

አይነት - ዲጂታል ማርኬቲንግ ግራፊክስ ዲዛይንና የመሳሰሉትን ያካትታል

-------------Closed/Hired-------------

Job Title: IT Supervisor/ ዋና አስተዳዳሪ 

Salary: በስምምነት 

Description:
 የስራ መደቡ፡- IT Supervisor/ ዋና አስተዳዳሪ
መስፈርቶች፡- 
ድርጅታችን የሚሰራው በዲጂታል ማርኬቲንግ/ሶሻል ሚዲያ ማርኬቲንግ እና ማማከር ነው፡፡ 
Online መተግበሪያን በማጎልበት እና ድርጅታዊ ስልጠናዎችን ጨምሮ ሰፊ አገልግሎት የሚሰጥ ሲሆን በ LMS ፕላትፎረም ትምህርቶችን ኮርሶችን ይሰጣል፡፡ ስለዚህ በዚህ ላይ በቂ እውቀት ያለው ድርጅታችን ወደ ስኬት ለመምራት ከፍተኛ ተነሳሽነት ያለው እና ልምድ ያለው አጠቃላይ ተቆጣጣሪ/የዋና አስተዳዳሪ እየፈለግን ነው። 
ሱፐር ቡስት አፕ የኢትዮጵያን ተቋማት፣ ቢዝነሶች፣ ግለሰቦች፣ ትምህርት ቤቶችን በዲጂታል መንገድ ለማብቃት እና በዲጂታል መንገድ እንዲያድጉ ለመርዳት የተቋቋመ የቴክኖሎጂ ኩባንያ ነው። 

የመጀመሪያ ዲግሪ - economic, marketing, Management, business Administration and other related field  
  የድርጅቱን አጠቃላይ እንቅስቃሴ ያቅዳል፣ ያደራጃል፣ ይመራል፣ ይቆጣጠራል።
  ድርጅቱ ትርፋማ እንዲሆን የሚያስችሉ ፖሊሲዎችንና ስትራቴጂዎችን ነድፎ ይሰራል።
  የድርጅቱን የአጭርና የረዥም ጊዜ አላማ ከግብ ለማድረስ የድርጅቱ የሰው ሃይልና የሰው ሃይል በማቀድ፣ በማደራጀት፣ በመምራትና በመቆጣጠር ይሰራል።
  LMS ፕላትፎርም የሚሆኑ ፕሮዳክሽን ስራ እንዲሰራ ያደርጋል 
  አዳዲስ ተቀጣሪዎች ምልመላ፣ ስልጠናና ቅጥር ማከናወን፡፡
  እያንዳንዱ ስራ እና ንዑስ የስራ ሂደት በተገቢው ሁኔታ እየሄደ እንደሆነና የታለመለትን ግብ ሊያሳካ ስለመቻሉ ክትትል ማድረግ... 
  ሁሉንም የስራ ሂደቶች መከታተልና ሪፖርት ማዘጋጀት፡፡
  የእያንዳንዱን የስራተኞች ስራ ክንውን መከተታተል ፡፡ 
  የድርጅቱን የፋይናንስ ፣ የማርኬቲንግ እያንዳንዱን እንዲሰራ ማድረግ፡፡ 
  ከፋይናንስ እና አካውንቲንግ ጋር በተያያዘ ያለውን ስራ በእራስም ሆነ ከሚመለከተው ባለሙያ ጋር ሆኖ የየወቅቱን እንዲሰራ ማድረግ፡፡
  በጀት መመደብና ወጪ መቀነስ
  ፖሊሲ ማርቀቅና እና አተገባበሩንም መተለም
  የሰራተኞችን የስራ አቅምና ባህል እንዲጎለብት መርዳት 
  ሁሉም የፋይናንስ እንቅስቃሴዎች በታለመላቸው መልኩ እየሄዱ መሆኑን ለማረጋገጥ ክትትል ማድረግ
  የድርጅቱን ግብርና ቀረጥ መሰል ክፍያዎች በጊዜው መክፈል ወይም እንዲከፈል ማድረግ
  የፋይናንስ ሪፖርቶችን ጊዜውን ጠብቀው ማውጣት

ከዚህ በላይ የተዘረዘሩትን መስፈርቶች የምታሟሉ አመልካቾች የስራ ልምድዎን እና ማንኛውም ተዛማጅ ደጋፊ ሰነዶችን በቴሌግራም

ላይ ይህ ማስታወቂያ ከወጣበት ጊዜ ጀምሮ 10 ተከታታይ የስራ ቀናት ውስጥ መመዝገብ ትችላላችሁ።
ስልክ ቁጥር

-------------Closed/Hired-------------

Job Title: IT Supervisor/ ዋና አስተዳዳሪ 

Salary: በስምምነት 

Description:
 የስራ መደቡ፡- IT Supervisor/ ዋና አስተዳዳሪ
መስፈርቶች፡- 
ድርጅታችን የሚሰራው በዲጂታል ማርኬቲንግ/ሶሻል ሚዲያ ማርኬቲንግ እና ማማከር ነው፡፡ 
Online መተግበሪያን በማጎልበት እና ድርጅታዊ ስልጠናዎችን ጨምሮ ሰፊ አገልግሎት የሚሰጥ ሲሆን በ LMS ፕላትፎረም ትምህርቶችን ኮርሶችን ይሰጣል፡፡ ስለዚህ በዚህ ላይ በቂ እውቀት ያለው ድርጅታችን ወደ ስኬት ለመምራት ከፍተኛ ተነሳሽነት ያለው እና ልምድ ያለው አጠቃላይ ተቆጣጣሪ/የዋና አስተዳዳሪ እየፈለግን ነው። 
ሱፐር ቡስት አፕ የኢትዮጵያን ተቋማት፣ ቢዝነሶች፣ ግለሰቦች፣ ትምህርት ቤቶችን በዲጂታል መንገድ ለማብቃት እና በዲጂታል መንገድ እንዲያድጉ ለመርዳት የተቋቋመ የቴክኖሎጂ ኩባንያ ነው። 

የመጀመሪያ ዲግሪ - economic, marketing, Management, business Administration and other related field  
  የድርጅቱን አጠቃላይ እንቅስቃሴ ያቅዳል፣ ያደራጃል፣ ይመራል፣ ይቆጣጠራል።
  ድርጅቱ ትርፋማ እንዲሆን የሚያስችሉ ፖሊሲዎችንና ስትራቴጂዎችን ነድፎ ይሰራል።
  የድርጅቱን የአጭርና የረዥም ጊዜ አላማ ከግብ ለማድረስ የድርጅቱ የሰው ሃይልና የሰው ሃይል በማቀድ፣ በማደራጀት፣ በመምራትና በመቆጣጠር ይሰራል።
  LMS ፕላትፎርም የሚሆኑ ፕሮዳክሽን ስራ እንዲሰራ ያደርጋል 
  አዳዲስ ተቀጣሪዎች ምልመላ፣ ስልጠናና ቅጥር ማከናወን፡፡
  እያንዳንዱ ስራ እና ንዑስ የስራ ሂደት በተገቢው ሁኔታ እየሄደ እንደሆነና የታለመለትን ግብ ሊያሳካ ስለመቻሉ ክትትል ማድረግ... 
  ሁሉንም የስራ ሂደቶች መከታተልና ሪፖርት ማዘጋጀት፡፡
  የእያንዳንዱን የስራተኞች ስራ ክንውን መከተታተል ፡፡ 
  የድርጅቱን የፋይናንስ ፣ የማርኬቲንግ እያንዳንዱን እንዲሰራ ማድረግ፡፡ 
  ከፋይናንስ እና አካውንቲንግ ጋር በተያያዘ ያለውን ስራ በእራስም ሆነ ከሚመለከተው ባለሙያ ጋር ሆኖ የየወቅቱን እንዲሰራ ማድረግ፡፡
  በጀት መመደብና ወጪ መቀነስ
  ፖሊሲ ማርቀቅና እና አተገባበሩንም መተለም
  የሰራተኞችን የስራ አቅምና ባህል እንዲጎለብት መርዳት 
  ሁሉም የፋይናንስ እንቅስቃሴዎች በታለመላቸው መልኩ እየሄዱ መሆኑን ለማረጋገጥ ክትትል ማድረግ
  የድርጅቱን ግብርና ቀረጥ መሰል ክፍያዎች በጊዜው መክፈል ወይም እንዲከፈል ማድረግ
  የፋይናንስ ሪፖርቶችን ጊዜውን ጠብቀው ማውጣት

ከዚህ በላይ የተዘረዘሩትን መስፈርቶች የምታሟሉ አመልካቾች የስራ ልምድዎን እና ማንኛውም ተዛማጅ ደጋፊ ሰነዶችን በቴሌግራም

ላይ ይህ ማስታወቂያ ከወጣበት ጊዜ ጀምሮ 10 ተከታታይ የስራ ቀናት ውስጥ መመዝገብ ትችላላችሁ።
ስልክ ቁጥር

Job Title: Script writer and tiktok host 

Salary: በስምምነት 

Description:
 ስክሪፕት ራይተርና የተፃፈውን በተደራጀና በተቀላጠፈ መልኩ ማቅረብ ምትችል ሴት እንፈልጋለን 

Requirements:
 -ከዚህ በፊት በስራው ልምድ ያላት ቢሆን ይመረጣል
-የተዘጋጀውን ኮንቴንት በጥሩ መልኩ ማቅረብ ምትችል
-የ ዩንቨርስቲ ተማሪ ብትሆን ተመራጭ ነው
-Creative Mindset ያላትና ሁሌ አዳዲስ ስራዎችን ለመስራት የተነሳሳች መሆን አለባት
-አማርኛ ና እንጊልዘኛ ቋንቋ አቀላጥፋ መናገር ምትችል መሆን አለባት
- ሴት አመልካቾች እና ከላይ የተጠቀሱትን ምታሟሉ ማመልከት ትችላላችሁ 

Role & Responsibilities:
 - script writing and organizing 
- presenting the written content or script in attractive way

messages.text:
-------------Closed/Hired-------------

Job Title: Paid Sales Intern 

Salary: Intern + Commission 

Description:
 Are you passionate about sales and looking to kickstart your career in a dynamic and fast-paced environment? We are seeking a Sales Intern to join our team and gain hands-on experience in both outdoor and indoor sales activities. As a Sales Intern, you will have the opportunity to receive comprehensive training to develop your sales skills and knowledge. In addition, you will earn commission benefits based on your performance and contributions to the team.

Key Responsibilities:
- Assist with generating leads and identifying potential customers through outdoor marketing activities.
- Engage with customers both in-person (outdoor) and online (indoor) to introduce our products/services and promote sales.
- Learn and implement effective sales techniques to convert leads into customers.
- Collaborate with the sales team to achieve sales targets and objectives.
- Provide excellent customer service to ensure customer satisfaction and loyalty.
- Participate in sales training sessions and workshops to enhance your sales capabilities.

Qualifications:
- Currently pursuing a degree in Business, Marketing, or related field.
- Strong communication and interpersonal skills.
- Ability to work independently and as part of a team.
- A self-starter with a positive attitude and eagerness to learn.
- Basic knowledge of sales principles and techniques is a plus.

Benefits:
- Comprehensive training program to develop your sales skills.
- Competitive commission structure based on sales performance.
- Valuable hands-on experience in both outdoor and indoor sales environments.
- Opportunity to work closely with experienced professionals in the sales industry.
- Possibility of transitioning into a full-time role based on performance and business needs.

If you are enthusiastic about sales, eager to learn, and ready to take on new challenges, we want to hear from you! Join us as a Sales Intern and start your journey towards a successful career in sales. Apply now and unleash your sales potential with us!

messages.text:
-------------Closed/Hired-------------

Job Title: Biology teacher for grade 9-12 and remedial students 

Company: ENTRANCE TRICKS PRIVATE SCHOOL 

Salary: Negotiation 

Description:
 የቅጥር ማስታወቂያ ለዩኒቨርሲቲ ተማሪዎች 

ᴇɴᴛʀᴀɴᴄᴇ ᴛʀɪᴄᴋs ለዩኒቨርሲቲ ተማሪዎች እየተማራችሁ የምትሰሩትን ስራ ይዞላችሁ መጥቷል ። ᴇɴᴛʀᴀɴᴄᴇ ᴛʀɪᴄᴋs በ online ከ 9- 12 ኛ and remedial ክፍል ያሉ ተማሪዎችን እንደሚያስተምር ይታወቃል ። እናም ለተማሪዎች የ geography and economics አስተማሪወች መቅጠር እንፈልጋለን ።መስፈርቶቹን እና የስራውን ሁኔታ ከዚህ በታች እንገልፃለን ።

🍎የስራ ሁኔታው ምን ይመስላል❓
BIOLOGY ለ entrance tricks ተማሪዎች (ማለትም ለአ 5ቱም ክላስ ለ 9,10,11,12 and remedial  ) ተማሪዎች በሳምንት አንዴ ይሰጣል ። ከተቀጣሪውም የሚጠበቀው 5ቱንም ክላሶች በተያዘላቸው ፕሮግራም መፅሀፋቸውን ካነበበ እና ከተረዳ በኋላ በ video መልኩ ቀላል እና ግልጽ በሆነ መንገድ ለተማሪዎች ያስረዳል ። እንዲሁም worksheet ፣ እና ፈተናዎችን እያዘጋጀ ለተማሪዎች ያደርሳል ።

🍎ተቀጣሪው ምን ያክል ጊዜ ያጠፋል ❓

በሳምንት 5  ቀን ብቻ ስለሚያስተምር ( ለአንድ ክላስ maximum 1 ሰአት ቢወሰድበት ) በሳምንት ከ 7-8 ሰአት በዚህ ስራ ጊዜውን ሊያጠፋ ይችላል ።

🍎ከተቀጣሪው ምን ይጠበቃል (መስፈርት )❓

🚩 የ entrance exam ወስዶ  biology የተሻለ የሚባል (ከ 70 % በላይ ) ውጤት ያመጣ ፤ወይም transcript ከ 80 በላይ ያመጣ  ፤
🚩አማርኛ ቋንቋ አቀላጥፎ የሚናገር ፤
🚩የዩኒቨርሲቲ ተማሪ የሆነ ፤
🚩laptop ያለው

🍏እነዚህን መስፈርት የምታሟሉ ተማሪዎች  ላይ grade 12 biology chapter 2 new curriculum ን ከ 5 ደቂቃ ያልበለጠ sample video ከ grade 12 certificate and transcript ጋር አያይዛችሁ  ላኩልን ።

🚩አማርኛ ቋንቋ አቀላጥፎ የሚናገር ፤
🚩የዩኒቨርሲቲ ተማሪ የሆነ ፤
🚩laptop ያለው

🍏እነዚህን መስፈርት የምታሟሉ ተማሪዎች  ላይ grade 12 biology chapter 2 new curriculum ን ከ 5 ደቂቃ ያልበለጠ sample video ከ grade 12 certificate and transcript ጋር አያይዛችሁ  ላኩልን ።

messages.text:
-------------Closed/Hired-------------

Job Title: Frontend Web Developer 

Company: Netsebrak Tech 

Salary: 25,000 

Description:
 We are seeking a few passionate and skilled developers to join us on our journey to revolutionize the industry. Join our dynamic startup team as a Frontend Developer and play a pivotal role in shaping the user experience of our cutting-edge products. As a frontend developer, you will collaborate closely with our cross-functional team to translate design concepts into functional, responsive, and visually stunning web applications. This role offers an exciting opportunity to work in a fast-paced, innovative environment where your creativity and technical prowess will contribute directly to the success and growth of our company. 

Requirements:
 - Proficiency in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, with a strong understanding of web standards and best practices.
- Demonstrated experience with frontend frameworks such as React, Vue.js, or Angular.
- Experience in building responsive and mobile-first web applications using CSS frameworks like Tailwind CSS and Bootstrap.
- Familiarity with version control systems such as Git for collaborative development.
- Strong problem-solving skills and the ability to troubleshoot and debug complex issues in frontend development.
- Understanding of cross-browser compatibility issues and methods to address them.
- Experience with UI/UX design principles and the ability to collaborate with designers to implement intuitive user interfaces.
- Strong communication skills and the ability to work effectively in a collaborative, fast-paced startup environment. 

Role & Responsibilities:
 - Maintain and update existing web applications, ensuring consistent performance and user experience across different browsers and devices.
- Integrate backend services and APIs to enable seamless data exchange and functionality.
- Troubleshoot and debug frontend issues, implementing effective solutions to ensure smooth user experience.
- Collaborate with designers to ensure the implementation of UI/UX design principles and deliver intuitive user interfaces.
- Stay updated with the latest industry trends and technologies in web development, continuously improving skills and knowledge.
- Communicate effectively with team members and stakeholders, providing updates on project progress and contributing to a collaborative work environment.
- Collaborate with cross-functional teams to translate design concepts into functional, responsive, and visually stunning web applications.

text:
Job Title: IT Supervisor/ ዋና አስተዳዳሪ 

Description:
 ድርጅታችን የሚሰራው በዲጂታል ማርኬቲንግ/ሶሻል ሚዲያ ማርኬቲንግ እና ማማከር ነው፡፡ 
Online መተግበሪያን በማጎልበት እና ድርጅታዊ ስልጠናዎችን ጨምሮ ሰፊ አገልግሎት የሚሰጥ ሲሆን በ LMS ፕላትፎረም ትምህርቶችን ኮርሶችን ይሰጣል፡፡ ስለዚህ በዚህ ላይ በቂ እውቀት ያለው ድርጅታችን ወደ ስኬት ለመምራት ከፍተኛ ተነሳሽነት ያለው እና ልምድ ያለው አጠቃላይ ተቆጣጣሪ/የዋና አስተዳዳሪ እየፈለግን ነው። 
ሱፐር ቡስት አፕ የኢትዮጵያን ተቋማት፣ ቢዝነሶች፣ ግለሰቦች፣ ትምህርት ቤቶችን በዲጂታል መንገድ ለማብቃት እና በዲጂታል መንገድ እንዲያድጉ ለመርዳት የተቋቋመ የቴክኖሎጂ ኩባንያ ነው። 

የመጀመሪያ ዲግሪ - economic, marketing, Management, business Administration and other related field  
  የድርጅቱን አጠቃላይ እንቅስቃሴ ያቅዳል፣ ያደራጃል፣ ይመራል፣ ይቆጣጠራል።
  ድርጅቱ ትርፋማ እንዲሆን የሚያስችሉ ፖሊሲዎችንና ስትራቴጂዎችን ነድፎ ይሰራል።
  የድርጅቱን የአጭርና የረዥም ጊዜ አላማ ከግብ ለማድረስ የድርጅቱ የሰው ሃይልና የሰው ሃይል በማቀድ፣ በማደራጀት፣ በመምራትና በመቆጣጠር ይሰራል።
  LMS ፕላትፎርም የሚሆኑ ፕሮዳክሽን ስራ እንዲሰራ ያደርጋል 
  አዳዲስ ተቀጣሪዎች ምልመላ፣ ስልጠናና ቅጥር ማከናወን፡፡
  እያንዳንዱ ስራ እና ንዑስ የስራ ሂደት በተገቢው ሁኔታ እየሄደ እንደሆነና የታለመለትን ግብ ሊያሳካ ስለመቻሉ ክትትል ማድረግ... 
  ሁሉንም የስራ ሂደቶች መከታተልና ሪፖርት ማዘጋጀት፡፡
  የእያንዳንዱን የስራተኞች ስራ ክንውን መከተታተል ፡፡ 
  የድርጅቱን የፋይናንስ ፣ የማርኬቲንግ እያንዳንዱን እንዲሰራ ማድረግ፡፡ 
  ከፋይናንስ እና አካውንቲንግ ጋር በተያያዘ ያለውን ስራ በእራስም ሆነ ከሚመለከተው ባለሙያ ጋር ሆኖ የየወቅቱን እንዲሰራ ማድረግ፡፡
  በጀት መመደብና ወጪ መቀነስ
  ፖሊሲ ማርቀቅና እና አተገባበሩንም መተለም
  የሰራተኞችን የስራ አቅምና ባህል እንዲጎለብት መርዳት 
  ሁሉም የፋይናንስ እንቅስቃሴዎች በታለመላቸው መልኩ እየሄዱ መሆኑን ለማረጋገጥ ክትትል ማድረግ
  የድርጅቱን ግብርና ቀረጥ መሰል ክፍያዎች በጊዜው መክፈል ወይም እንዲከፈል ማድረግ
  የፋይናንስ ሪፖርቶችን ጊዜውን ጠብቀው ማውጣት

ከዚህ በላይ የተዘረዘሩትን መስፈርቶች የምታሟሉ አመልካቾች የስራ ልምድዎን እና ማንኛውም ተዛማጅ ደጋፊ ሰነዶችን በቴሌግራም

ላይ ይህ ማስታወቂያ ከወጣበት ጊዜ ጀምሮ 10 ተከታታይ የስራ ቀናት ውስጥ መመዝገብ ትችላላችሁ።
ስልክ ቁጥር

ወይም 0914 949494 

Role & Responsibilities:
 supervisor

Approved by
Share:

text_entities.text:
Job Title: IT Supervisor/ ዋና አስተዳዳሪ 

Description:
 ድርጅታችን የሚሰራው በዲጂታል ማርኬቲንግ/ሶሻል ሚዲያ ማርኬቲንግ እና ማማከር ነው፡፡ 
Online መተግበሪያን በማጎልበት እና ድርጅታዊ ስልጠናዎችን ጨምሮ ሰፊ አገልግሎት የሚሰጥ ሲሆን በ LMS ፕላትፎረም ትምህርቶችን ኮርሶችን ይሰጣል፡፡ ስለዚህ በዚህ ላይ በቂ እውቀት ያለው ድርጅታችን ወደ ስኬት ለመምራት ከፍተኛ ተነሳሽነት ያለው እና ልምድ ያለው አጠቃላይ ተቆጣጣሪ/የዋና አስተዳዳሪ እየፈለግን ነው። 
ሱፐር ቡስት አፕ የኢትዮጵያን ተቋማት፣ ቢዝነሶች፣ ግለሰቦች፣ ትምህርት ቤቶችን በዲጂታል መንገድ ለማብቃት እና በዲጂታል መንገድ እንዲያድጉ ለመርዳት የተቋቋመ የቴክኖሎጂ ኩባንያ ነው። 

የመጀመሪያ ዲግሪ - economic, marketing, Management, business Administration and other related field  
  የድርጅቱን አጠቃላይ እንቅስቃሴ ያቅዳል፣ ያደራጃል፣ ይመራል፣ ይቆጣጠራል።
  ድርጅቱ ትርፋማ እንዲሆን የሚያስችሉ ፖሊሲዎችንና ስትራቴጂዎችን ነድፎ ይሰራል።
  የድርጅቱን የአጭርና የረዥም ጊዜ አላማ ከግብ ለማድረስ የድርጅቱ የሰው ሃይልና የሰው ሃይል በማቀድ፣ በማደራጀት፣ በመምራትና በመቆጣጠር ይሰራል።
  LMS ፕላትፎርም የሚሆኑ ፕሮዳክሽን ስራ እንዲሰራ ያደርጋል 
  አዳዲስ ተቀጣሪዎች ምልመላ፣ ስልጠናና ቅጥር ማከናወን፡፡
  እያንዳንዱ ስራ እና ንዑስ የስራ ሂደት በተገቢው ሁኔታ እየሄደ እንደሆነና የታለመለትን ግብ ሊያሳካ ስለመቻሉ ክትትል ማድረግ... 
  ሁሉንም የስራ ሂደቶች መከታተልና ሪፖርት ማዘጋጀት፡፡
  የእያንዳንዱን የስራተኞች ስራ ክንውን መከተታተል ፡፡ 
  የድርጅቱን የፋይናንስ ፣ የማርኬቲንግ እያንዳንዱን እንዲሰራ ማድረግ፡፡ 
  ከፋይናንስ እና አካውንቲንግ ጋር በተያያዘ ያለውን ስራ በእራስም ሆነ ከሚመለከተው ባለሙያ ጋር ሆኖ የየወቅቱን እንዲሰራ ማድረግ፡፡
  በጀት መመደብና ወጪ መቀነስ
  ፖሊሲ ማርቀቅና እና አተገባበሩንም መተለም
  የሰራተኞችን የስራ አቅምና ባህል እንዲጎለብት መርዳት 
  ሁሉም የፋይናንስ እንቅስቃሴዎች በታለመላቸው መልኩ እየሄዱ መሆኑን ለማረጋገጥ ክትትል ማድረግ
  የድርጅቱን ግብርና ቀረጥ መሰል ክፍያዎች በጊዜው መክፈል ወይም እንዲከፈል ማድረግ
  የፋይናንስ ሪፖርቶችን ጊዜውን ጠብቀው ማውጣት

ከዚህ በላይ የተዘረዘሩትን መስፈርቶች የምታሟሉ አመልካቾች የስራ ልምድዎን እና ማንኛውም ተዛማጅ ደጋፊ ሰነዶችን በቴሌግራም

ላይ ይህ ማስታወቂያ ከወጣበት ጊዜ ጀምሮ 10 ተከታታይ የስራ ቀናት ውስጥ መመዝገብ ትችላላችሁ።
ስልክ ቁጥር

Job Title: Create a 30-Second Promotional Video for IT Learning Company 

Company: LAB 

Salary: 5000 

Description:
 We need a talented freelancer to produce a captivating 30-second promotional video for Macrosoft, a leading IT learning company. The video will highlight our innovative IT learning solution, offered entirely free for teachers. This solution provides easy access and management, serving as a comprehensive one-stop platform for all IT learning needs.

Requirements:

    Duration: The video should not exceed 30 seconds.
    Content:
    a. Introduce Macrosoft as a premier IT learning company.
    b. Highlight the innovative IT learning solution offered for free to teachers.
    c. Emphasize the ease of access and management of the platform.
    d. Mention that in exchange for the free solution, we seek cooperation from teachers to promote our platform within their schools and encourage student enrollment in our online courses.
    e. Convey that Macrosoft provides a great platform for innovative learning experiences.
    Tone: The video should be energetic, engaging, and professional.
    Visuals: Utilize dynamic visuals, animations, and graphics to enhance the message and capture viewers' attention.
    Voiceover: A clear and confident voiceover is required to narrate the script.
    Music: Background music that complements the tone of the video is essential.
    Delivery: The final video should be delivered in a high-quality format suitable for online promotion.

Additional Information:

    Feel free to infuse creativity and originality into the video to make it stand out.
    Ensure the video aligns with Macrosoft's branding and messaging.
    Provide drafts or storyboards for review and feedback before finalizing the video.

We look forward to receiving proposals from talented freelancers who can bring our vision to life through a compelling promotional video.

»»»  REPLY WITH YOUR  PREVIOUS JOB IN VIDEO DEVELOPMENT

Description:

The ideal candidate will have expertise in Microsoft SQL Server or Oracle Database, along with a proven track record of implementing efficient database solutions. As a Database Developer, you will collaborate closely with our development team to ensure optimal database performance and reliability.

 Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or related field.

Job Title: YouTube video editor 

Description:
 We need a video editor for YouTube Automation channel which is in Amharic language.

The videos are easy to edit, simple stock footages but a fast paced video that keep the audience engaged. 

The editor might also need to download stock footages to match the message that's being said on the video. 

The editor will be editing 12 minutes (mostly 8 minute ) videos. With unique editing styles 

The candidate must have a fast internet connection. Reliability is essential. 

The candidate must have knowledge about YouTube's copyright and fair use policy.

If you fit the description, apply for the job. 

But DON'T FORGET!! to attach your previous works (YouTube videos) it's a must and price per 10 min video!! make it reasonable b/c u got 1 chance,

Affirmative action for pro video editors..
Approved by

text:
Job Title: Content Creator (Node.js Developer) 

Salary: Negotiable 

Description:
 As a Content Creator specializing in Node.js, you will play a pivotal role in crafting engaging and comprehensive course material for our advanced Node.js curriculum. Your responsibilities will encompass various aspects of content creation, including slide preparation, exercise development, curriculum refinement, and video recording. 

Requirements:
 - Proficiency in Node.js development, with a strong understanding of its core concepts, ecosystem, and best practices.

- Prior experience creating educational content, preferably in the form of online courses or instructional materials. (Optional)

- Excellent communication skills, with the ability to convey complex technical concepts in a clear and concise manner.

- Self-motivated and detail-oriented, with a passion for continuous learning and professional development.

- Experience with video recording/editing tools and techniques is a plus. 

Role & Responsibilities:
 - Develop comprehensive slides and course materials for our advanced Node.js course, ensuring clarity, coherence, and relevance to the target audience.

- Design and create engaging exercises, examples, and coding challenges to reinforce key concepts and facilitate hands-on learning experiences.

- Collaborate with the curriculum development team to shape the structure and content of the Node.js course, incorporating industry best practices and emerging trends.

- Record instructional videos (without audio) demonstrating coding practices, problem-solving techniques, and real-world applications of Node.js concepts.

- Ensure the quality and accuracy of course content by conducting thorough reviews and iterations based on feedback from stakeholders and subject matter experts.

- Stay abreast of the latest developments in Node.js and related technologies, integrating relevant updates and enhancements into the course material.

- Provide guidance and support to students enrolled in the Node.js course, addressing inquiries, clarifying concepts, and fostering a supportive learning environment.

Preference will be given to candidates who have completed the leveling up as  node.js developer course on udemy or possess equivalent knowledge and experience.

Joining our team as a Content Creator offers you an exciting opportunity to contribute to the education and professional development of aspiring Node.js developers worldwide. If you're passionate about Node.js and committed to creating high-quality educational content, we'd love to hear from you.

To apply, please submit a short cover letter and your resume, along with a portfolio or samples of your previous work demonstrating your expertise in Node.js and content creation.

Approved by

Job Title: Web Scraper 

Description:
 We're looking for a skilled Web Scraper to extract data from job portal websites using Python, Beautiful Soup, or other preferred methods. Your role will involve meticulous data extraction while ensuring adherence to ethical standards. 

Role & Responsibilities:
 As a Web Scraper, you'll be responsible for efficiently gathering data from job portals. You'll utilize Python and web scraping libraries to navigate websites and extract relevant information accurately. Collaboration with the team to optimize scraping processes and documentation of procedures will be essential. Upon successful completion, compensation in the form of pocket money and/or a certificate will be provided. The expected duration for completion is 1 to 2 days.

Permanent job will be offered for those who performs well.

- Ability to work independently and as part of a team.

Job Title: Community Manager 

Company: MereqTech IT Solutions PLC 

Salary: 5000 

Description:
 We're seeking a dynamic Community Manager to join us, fluent in both Amharic and English. You'll engage with our diverse online community across social media platforms. If you're creative, communicative, and love building connections, we want you! 

Requirements:
 - Fluency in both written and spoken Amharic and English is essential.
- Strong interpersonal skills with the ability to build and maintain relationships online.
- Excellent communication skills, both written and verbal, with a creative flair for content creation.
- Familiarity with social media management tools and platforms.
- Ability to work independently and collaboratively in a fast-paced environment.
- Passion for engaging with diverse communities and driving meaningful interactions. 

Role & Responsibilities:
 - Monitor and respond to messages, comments, and inquiries across our social media platforms in both Amharic and English.
- Cultivate a positive and engaging online community by actively participating in group discussions, addressing concerns, and fostering dialogue.
- Plan and execute live Q&A sessions, virtual events, and other interactive activities to connect with our audience.
- Create engaging content to spark conversation and drive community engagement.
- Collaborate with the marketing team to develop strategies for community growth and retention.
- Analyze community feedback and insights to identify trends, opportunities, and areas for improvement.

text:
Job Title: Video Editor and Graphic Designer (1 Role) 

Salary: Negotiable 

Description:
 As a Video Editor and Graphic Designer, you will be responsible for editing educational videos and creating compelling visuals for social media advertisements. Your creative expertise will help us engage our audience effectively and communicate complex concepts in an engaging and visually appealing manner. 

Requirements:
 - Proficiency in Adobe Premiere Pro and Adobe Photoshop, with a strong portfolio showcasing your video editing and graphic design skills.

- Demonstrated experience in editing educational videos and creating visual content for social media advertisements.

- Creative flair and a keen eye for design, with the ability to translate complex ideas into visually compelling graphics and animations.

- Strong communication skills and the ability to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams.

- Programming experience is a plus. 

Role & Responsibilities:
 Responsibilities:
- Edit and enhance educational videos, ensuring high-quality production standards and effective communication of key concepts.

- Collaborate with content creators and subject matter experts to understand the educational objectives and visual requirements of each video.

- Create eye-catching visuals, including graphics, illustrations, and animations, to accompany social media advertisements and promotional materials maintaining brand consistency and maximizing audience engagement.

- Assist in other design-related tasks as needed, such as website graphics, email templates, and print materials.

Joining our team as a Video Editor and Graphic Designer offers you an exciting opportunity to make a meaningful impact on the educational experience of our students and contribute to the growth of our platform. If you're passionate about visual storytelling and creative design, we'd love to hear from you.

To apply, please submit your resume, along with a link to your portfolio showcasing your video editing and graphic design work.

Approved by

text:
Job Title: Intern Content Creator (Digital Marketing) 

Company: MereqTech IT Solutions PLC 

Salary: 1500 

Description:
 We craft compelling digital marketing campaigns that resonate with our client's target audience. We are currently seeking a talented and enthusiastic Intern Content Creator to join our team and contribute to our exciting projects. 

Requirements:
 - Proficiency in both written and spoken English and Amharic is mandatory.
- Strong writing skills with a keen eye for detail and creativity.
- Basic Knowledge of digital marketing principles and practices. (Familiarity with social media)
- Ability to work independently and as part of a team in a fast-paced environment.
- Excellent time management and organizational skills.
- Familiarity with content management systems and basic graphic design tools is a plus.
- Passion for creativity and innovation in marketing. 

Role & Responsibilities:
 - Create engaging and original content for various digital marketing channels including social media, blogs, websites, and advertisements.
- Collaborate with the marketing team to develop content strategies that align with client objectives and target audience preferences.
- Research industry trends and competitors to generate fresh ideas for content creation.
- Write clear, concise, and persuasive copy that effectively communicates key messages and brand values.
- Edit and proofread content to ensure accuracy, consistency, and adherence to brand guidelines.
- Stay up-to-date with emerging technologies and digital marketing trends to continuously enhance content quality and relevance.
- Assist with other marketing tasks and projects as needed.

Approved by

messages.text:
-------------Closed/Hired-------------

Job Title: Intern Front End Developer 

Company: MereqTech IT Solutions PLC 

Description:
 As an Intern Front End Developer, you will be part of our dynamic development team, collaborating on various projects to create engaging and user-friendly web interfaces. This internship offers hands-on experience in front-end development, where you'll work closely with designers and back-end developers to bring concepts to life. 

Requirements:
 1. Pursuing or recently completed a degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or related field.
2. Strong understanding of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
3. Familiarity with front-end frameworks such as React, Angular, or Vue.js is a plus.
4. Basic understanding of version control systems, such as Git.
5. Good problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
6. Ability to work collaboratively in a team environment.
7. Excellent communication skills.
8. A passion for learning and a desire to grow as a front-end developer. 

Role & Responsibilities:
 1. Collaborate with designers and back-end developers to implement user-friendly interfaces.
2. Write clean, efficient, and maintainable code using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
3. Assist in the optimization of web pages for maximum speed and scalability.
4. Ensure cross-browser and cross-platform compatibility.
5. Contribute ideas and suggestions for improving user experience.
6. Stay updated on emerging front-end technologies and trends.

text:
Job Title: Web Developer (NextJS & MERN) 

Salary: 5000 

Description:
 We want a Web Developer specializing in Next.js and the MERN stack to join our team and become a key player in our mission to create outstanding websites. 

Requirements:
 - Proficiency in Next.js and React.js for frontend development.
- Strong expertise in the MERN stack for backend development.
- Experience building RESTful APIs and integrating third-party services.
- Solid understanding of web fundamentals, including HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
- Familiarity with version control systems such as Git.
- Ability to work effectively in a collaborative team environment.
- Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
- Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field (preferred but not required). 

Role & Responsibilities:
 - Develop responsive and visually appealing frontend interfaces using Next.js and React.js.
- Design and implement scalable backend solutions using MongoDB, Express.js, and Node.js.
- Collaborate with designers, product managers, and other stakeholders to translate requirements into technical specifications.
- Write clean, efficient, and maintainable code while adhering to best practices and coding standards.
- Conduct thorough testing and debugging to ensure the reliability and performance of web applications.
- Stay updated on industry trends and emerging technologies to continuously improve our development processes and methodologies.

Approved by

messages.text:
-------------Closed/Hired-------------

Job Title: VOIP App Developer 

Salary: Based On Agreement 

Description:
 We are seeking an experienced developer to create a user-friendly VoIP app and an accompanying robust VoIP framework. This solution will allow callers to make internet-based VoIP calls to recipients using local network connections while ensuring cost efficiency for the caller. The project requirements include:
1, VoIP Framework Development: Create a scalable and adaptable VoIP framework that facilitates internet-based VoIP calls from the caller to recipients connected via local network infrastructure. This framework should serve as the backend infrastructure for the app.

2, User-Friendly VoIP App: Develop a user-friendly mobile application for Android and iOS platforms that enables callers to initiate VoIP calls via the internet using standard VoIP protocols. The app should ensure a smooth user experience.

3, SIP Integration or Other Cost-Efficient Mechanisms: Integrate the VoIP app and framework with SIP or other cost-efficient mechanisms to ensure that the cost of calls for the caller is minimized.

4, Call Quality and Reliability: Ensure high-quality audio transmission and reliable calls within the framework and the app.

5, Security Measures: Implement strong security measures in both the app and framework to safeguard the privacy and integrity of voice calls.

6, Testing and Optimization: Thoroughly test and optimize both the VoIP app and framework for exceptional performance and user experience. This is crucial, especially in scenarios where the caller and recipient are on different network types.


If you have experience in developing user-friendly VoIP apps and robust VoIP frameworks with SIP integration or other mechanisms that prioritize cost efficiency for the caller, please bid on this project. Include your relevant experience, sample works, and an estimated timeline for app and framework development.

We are excited to collaborate with a skilled professional who can help us create a user-friendly app and a powerful VoIP framework for cost-efficient internet-to-local network calls. 

Requirements:
 Must have experience on VoIP app development 

Role & Responsibilities:
 App Developer

text:
Job Title: Be Our TikTok Micro-Influencer! Creatively Captivate and Earn 

Company: Naka Brand Digital Marketing 

Description:
 Do you have a passion for creating engaging content and a thriving TikTok audience? Do you love staying ahead of trends and inspiring others? If so, we want YOU to join our team!

We're seeking a creative and outgoing individual to become our brand ambassador on TikTok. As a micro-influencer, you'll play a key role in promoting our products to a highly targeted audience and fostering a vibrant online community.

About the Role:

Develop and post creative, engaging TikTok videos that showcase our products and resonate with your audience.
Stay up-to-date on the latest TikTok trends and challenges, incorporating them into your content strategy.
Foster a positive and interactive online community by responding to comments and messages from your followers.
Participate in brand discussions and provide feedback on potential campaigns.
Adhere to brand guidelines and maintain a professional online presence.
What We Offer:

Competitive commission structure: Earn a commission on every product sold through your unique referral link.
Certificate of Recognition: Upon successful completion of your contract, receive a certificate acknowledging your contribution to our brand.
The chance to make a real impact: Help us reach new audiences and build brand awareness.
Flexible work schedule: Create content on your own time and be your own boss!
Qualifications:

Active TikTok account with a minimum of 10,000 engaged followers (high follower engagement is more important than total follower count).
A strong understanding of your target audience and the ability to create content that resonates with them.
Excellent creativity and storytelling skills.
Experience with video editing and caption writing is a plus.
A passion for our brand and the products we offer.
Ready to take your creativity to the next level and get rewarded for it? Apply now!
Approved by

Job Title: Backend developer 

Salary: 6,500 etb 

Description:
 We are seeking a skilled Backend Developer to join our dynamic team. The primary focus of this role will be to integrate server-side APIs by collaborating with our current developers and ensuring seamless integration of their code and databases to the server side of our website.
Deadline: 2 weeks
Since the project has developers working on the project already. Your part will be simply adding codes to the server side. 

Requirements:
 Strong proficiency in server-side languages such as Python, Node.js, or Ruby on Rails.
Experience with database management systems (e.g., MySQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB).
Familiarity with RESTful APIs and API integration techniques.
Excellent problem-solving and communication skills.
Ability to work effectively both independently and as part of a team.
Prior experience collaborating with frontend developers and other backend developers is a plus. 

Role & Responsibilities:
 Collaborate with the existing development team to integrate server-side APIs.
Work closely with the other current  developers to ensure smooth integration between server and client-side applications.
Develop efficient, reusable, and reliable code.
Troubleshoot and debug issues as they arise.
Participate in code reviews to maintain code quality and ensure best practices are followed.

text:
Job Title: Native Afaan Oromo Speakers are needed for Audio Collection Project 

Company: Private 

Salary: Negotiable 

Description:
 Native Afaan Oromo speakers who can meet the following requirements are needed for a large audio collection project. Please indicate your dialect from the options listed while applying for this job: Borena-Arsi-Guji Oromo, Eastern Oromo, Orma, West Central Oromo. 

Requirements:
 Language Proficiency: The individual should be a native speaker or proficient in the target language/dialect/variant. They should be able to speak clearly and accurately.
  
Follow Instructions: They should be able to understand and follow the recording instructions provided. This might include specific phrases to say, particular tones or emotions to express, or a certain speed at which to speak.
 
Technical Skills: Basic knowledge of how to use recording equipment or software is necessary. They should be able to handle the technical aspects of recording, such as setting the correct volume levels and ensuring there's minimal background noise.

Reliable Equipment: They need to have access to a good quality microphone and a quiet environment to ensure the audio recordings are clear and free from background noise. 

Time Commitment: They should be able to commit the necessary time to complete the required recordings.  
Good understanding of English as instruction will be in English.

Please complete this google form and submit it to get considered for this exciting project:

Role & Responsibilities:
 Recording high quality audios to be used for training AI models

Approved by

Job Title: JavaFX and Spring Boot Developer 

Company: Private 

Salary: Negotiable 

Description:
 We are seeking a talented and experienced JavaFX and Spring Boot Developer to join our development team. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in Java development, with a focus on JavaFX and Spring Boot frameworks. You will play a key role in designing, developing, and maintaining software applications that meet our clients' needs and exceed their expectations. 

Requirements:
 •Strong proficiency in Java programming language.
•Experience with JavaFX for building desktop applications.
•Experience with Spring Boot for developing backend services and APIs.
•Knowledge of software design patterns and principles. 

Role & Responsibilities:
 •Designing and developing user interfaces using JavaFX.
•Developing backend services and APIs using Spring Boot.
•Writing clean, maintainable, and efficient code.
•Troubleshooting, debugging, and fixing issues in existing software applications.

text:
Job Title: Intern Content Writer / Digital Marketer 

Company: MereqTech IT Solutions PLC 

Salary: 1500 Birr 

Description:
 We craft compelling digital marketing campaigns that resonate with our client's target audience. We are currently seeking a talented and enthusiastic Intern Content Writer / Digital Marketer to join our team and contribute to our exciting projects. 

Requirements:
 - Proficiency in both written and spoken English and Amharic is mandatory.
- Strong writing skills with a keen eye for detail and creativity.
- Basic Knowledge of digital marketing principles and practices. (Familiarity with social media)
- Ability to work independently and as part of a team in a fast-paced environment.
- Excellent time management and organizational skills.
- Familiarity with content management systems and basic graphic design tools is a plus.
- Passion for creativity and innovation in marketing. 

Role & Responsibilities:
 - Create engaging and original content for various digital marketing channels including social media, blogs, websites, and advertisements.
- Collaborate with the marketing team to develop content strategies that align with client objectives and target audience preferences.
- Research industry trends and competitors to generate fresh ideas for content creation.
- Write clear, concise, and persuasive copy that effectively communicates key messages and brand values.
- Edit and proofread content to ensure accuracy, consistency, and adherence to brand guidelines.
- Stay up-to-date with emerging technologies and digital marketing trends to continuously enhance content quality and relevance.
- Assist with other marketing tasks and projects as needed.

Approved by

text:
Job Title: አሻሻጭ ( Reseller ) 

Company: WAL-Market 

Salary: ኮሚሽን 

Description:
 የ ሴልስ እና ሪሴሊንግ ልምድ ላላቸው እንዲሁም ለስራው አዲስ ለሆኑ አመልካቾች ቦታ አለን። 
ለስራው አዲስ ለሆኑ አመልካቾች በቴሌግራም ቻናላችን ላይ online ስልጠናዎች ፣ አቅጣጫዎች ፣ እና የተለያዩ አሳይመንቶችን በመስጠት በነፃ እናሰለጥናለን።

የስራው ባህርይ

->  በማንኛውም እድሜ ላይ ያለ ሠው ስልክ እና ኢንተርኔት መጠቀም ከቻለ ሊሠራው ይችላል ።
->  በ አንድ እቃ ከ 200 እስከ 600 ብር ኮሚሽን ይገኛል።
-> ተማሪዎችም ሆነ በስራ ላይ ያሉ ሠዎች መደበኛ ስራቸው ሳይተጓጐል ሊሠሩት ይችላሉ ።
-> ስራ መግቢያ እና መውጪያ ሠአት የለውም ( በማንኛውም ሠአት ሊሠራ ይችላል ) ።

ቅድሚያ መስፈርት

አመልካች ስልክ አሊያም ኮምፒውተር ያለው እና ኢንተርኔት አጠቃቀም የሚችል መሆን አለበት ።

ለማመልከት እንዲሁም ለተጨማሪ መረጃ በ

ላይ ያናግሩን።
Approved by
Share:

አመልካች ስልክ አሊያም ኮምፒውተር ያለው እና ኢንተርኔት አጠቃቀም የሚችል መሆን አለበት ።

ለማመልከት እንዲሁም ለተጨማሪ መረጃ በ

-------------Closed/Hired-------------

Job Title: Flutter developer 

Company: Private 

Salary: Negotiation 

Description:
 ● Design, develop, and implement high-performing, scalable mobile applications using Flutter.
● Craft beautiful and intuitive user interfaces (UIs) that deliver an exceptional user experience (UX) across all platforms (Android & iOS).
● Collaborate closely with designers, product managers, and other engineers to translate project requirements into actionable development tasks.
● Write clean, maintainable, and well-documented code that adheres to best practices.
● Integrate with various APIs and third-party services to extend app functionality.
● Conduct thorough testing to ensure a bug-free and optimized app experience.
● Stay up-to-date with the latest advancements in Flutter and Dart programming.
• A keen eye for design and the ability to translate UI/UX mockups into functional code.

text:
Job Title: Somali Language Voiceover Aritist 

Company: Bright PLC 

Description:
 Main role and responsibilities:

1. Voice-over Recording: Deliver high-quality voice recordings.
2. Script Interpretation: Understand and interpret scripts to convey the intended message effectively.
3. Vocal Performance: Demonstrate versatility in tone, style, and delivery to suit different projects and target audiences.
4. Communication: Maintain clear and prompt communication to understand their requirements and provide updates on project progress.
5. Brand Representation: Ensure the voice-over aligns with the brand identity and messaging.
6. Timely Delivery: Meet deadlines consistently and manage time effectively.
8. Continuous Improvement: Stay updated on industry trends, techniques, and technology to enhance skills and deliver exceptional voice-over performances.


Required skills:

1. Clear Pronunciation: Ability to articulate words clearly and accurately in Somali language.
2. Versatility: Capability to adapt tone, pitch, and style according to the project requirements.
3. Emotional Range: Skill in conveying various emotions convincingly, from excitement to solemnity.
4. Breath Control: Capacity to control breathing for sustained speaking without interruptions.
5. Timing and Pacing: Proficiency in maintaining appropriate speed and rhythm throughout the narration.
6. Mic Technique: Understanding how to position and use microphones effectively for optimal sound quality.
7. Script Interpretation: Capability to understand and interpret scripts to deliver the intended message effectively.
8. Acting Skills: Ability to bring characters and narratives to life through voice acting techniques.
9. Technical Knowledge: Basic understanding of audio recording and editing software for self-recording or studio work.
10. Professionalism: Reliability, punctuality, and ability to take direction from clients or directors effectively.


Preferred qualifications: 

1. Clear, articulate pronunciation
2. Versatility in tone and delivery styles 
3. Experience in various types of voice-over work (e.g., commercials, narration, audiobooks)
4. Ability to take direction and adapt to feedback
5. Professionalism and reliability in meeting deadlines
6. High-quality recording equipment and a quiet recording environment
7. Knowledge of audio editing software for post-production tasks, though not always required
8. A diverse vocal range to suit different project requirements
9. Previous experience working with clients or agencies in the voice-over industry
10. Sample showcasing a variety of voice-over samples demonstrating skills and range.

Perks and benefits:
1. Working remotely from anywhere
2. Constant feedback on improving the work
Approved by

text:
Job Title: senior video editor 

Company: purpose black Ethiopia 

Salary: negotiation 

Description:
 Video Editor is responsible for turning raw footage shot by a film crew and director 
into a cohesive video or film. Here are the key duties and responsibilities of a Video 
Editor 

Requirements:
 BS degree in film studies, cinematography graphics design 
and video editing 

Role & Responsibilities:
 1. Manipulating and Editing Film Pieces:
o Edit film pieces in a way that is invisible to the audience.
o Review shooting scripts and raw material to create a shot decision list.
o Trim footage segments and put together the sequence of the film.
2. Assembling Recorded Footage:
o Assemble recorded footage into a finished project that matches the director’s vision.
o Input music, dialogues, graphics, and effects.
o Ensure logical sequencing and smooth running.

Approved by

Job Title: social media manger and content creator 

Company: purpose black ethiopia 

Description:
 As a Social Media Manager, you’ll play a pivotal role in shaping our brand’s online 
presence. Your expertise will directly impact how effectively we communicate our brand 
value across various social media platforms. Here’s what you’ll be doing 

Role & Responsibilities:
 Planning and Developing Campaigns:
o Strategize and create compelling social media campaigns.
o Craft engaging content, including videos, photos, info graphics, and text posts.
2. Content Management:
o Post content across our social media accounts.
o Monitor and engage with customers on different channels.
o Stay updated on the latest social media trends.
3. Campaign Analysis:
o Evaluate the performance of ongoing campaigns.
o Use data to optimize strategies and improve results.
4. Brand Consistency:
o Collaborate with other teams (marketing, sales, and customer service) to maintain brand 
consistency.

Approved by

text:
Job Title: Research Assistant for AI-Powered Educational Analysis 

Salary: Negotiable 

Description:
 We are seeking a dedicated Research Assistant to support an AI research project focused on educational assessment analysis. The primary task will be the systematic collection of exam papers from both natural and social sciences. 

Role & Responsibilities:
 -Collect all natural science and social science Grade 12 Ethiopian University Entrance Examination (EUEE) papers in digital format, spanning from the years 2000 to 2015 E.C (Ethiopian Calendar).
-Gather Grade 9& 10 Matric exam papers (discontinued) covering all subjects, from 2005 to 2010 E.C., also in digital format

Additional Information:
-This role is crucial for building a comprehensive dataset to train and refine AI models in educational assessment.

-Position availability: First come, first served basis.

Approved by

text:
Job Title: Marketing Manager & Sales Executive 

Company: Bazeto Visual effects P.L.C. 

Salary: Fixed Base Salary with Profit-Based Bonus 

Description:
 BazetoFX is a leading visual effects studio in Ethiopia specializing in FX simulation for film, cinematic, and commercial projects with a diverse portfolio and a client base spanning both local and international markets.

We are seeking dynamic and driven professionals to join our team in the roles of Marketing Manager and/or Sales Executive. As key members of our team, this will play pivotal roles in expanding our reach, attracting new clients, and solidifying our presence in the industry. 

Role & Responsibilities:
 - Develop and execute marketing strategies.
- Identify and pursue new business opportunities.
- Build and maintain strong relationships with clients.

Qualifications:
- Proven marketing and/or sales experience, preferably in entertainment industry.
- Excellent communication skills, both written and verbal.
- Work independently and collaboratively in a fast-paced environment.

If you feel like this suits you well and like to join BazetoFX, feel free to send your resume and cover letter to
or send direct message to

Looking forward to hearing from you!

Approved by

text:
Job Title: Sales and marketer 

Company: Viral studios 

Salary: Commission 

Description:
 We're a cutting-edge marketing agency specializing in exploding businesses onto TikTok!  We help clients with captivating scripts, high-quality video editing, and strategic upload for maximum impact.  Now, we need YOU to join our team as a TikTok Business Acquisition Specialist! 

Role & Responsibilities:
 • Be our sales superstar, contacting businesses and convincing them why TikTok promotion is the key to their success.
• Close deals and build relationships with clients, securing agreements for our services.
• Conduct phone calls and meetings (physical or virtual) to present our offerings.
• Stay up-to-date on TikTok trends and marketing strategies.

Qualifications:
• Proven sales experience (a minimum of 1 year is preferred).
• Excellent communication and interpersonal skills - you can build rapport with anyone!
• Confident and persuasive - you can convince businesses that TikTok is the answer to their marketing prayers.
• Strong understanding of social media marketing is a plus.
• Enthusiasm and passion for TikTok - bonus points for being a TikTok whiz!
Salary & Benefits:
• Earn an 10% commission on every closed deal!
• Be part of a dynamic and innovative team.

Ready to take your career to the next level?
Send your resume and a cover letter explaining why YOU are the perfect TikTok Business Acquisition Specialist for our team

Approved by

text:
Job Title: MIL Trainee 

Company: MERSA Media Institute 

Salary: Unpaid Training Opportunity 

Description:
 Are you tired of misinformation and disinformation spreading like wildfire online? Do you want to be a force for truth and integrity in the digital realm?

Join us in our mission to empower youth to combat misinformation and promote media and information literacy! We're embarking on an exciting journey across four regions, hosting engaging workshops aimed at equipping you with the tools and knowledge to become Information Integrity Ambassadors.

As an Ambassador, you'll receive:

-6 months of personalized mentorship in media and information literacy, podcasting, social media management, and graphics design.
-6 months of unlimited internet access to fuel your learning and creativity.
-Ongoing collaboration and support from our team throughout and beyond the mentorship period.
-A prestigious certificate recognizing your dedication and contribution to the cause. 

Requirements:
 -Must be a university student at Jimma, Hawassa, Arbaminch and Addis Ababa

-Must be active on at least 3 social media platforms i.e. one of them must be Facebook

-Follow MERSA media institute's social media account  

-Must be a university student at Jimma, Hawassa, Arbaminch and Addis Ababa

-Must be active on at least 3 social media platforms i.e. one of them must be Facebook

Don't miss this opportunity to make a real difference in the fight against misinformation! Apply now to join our network of passionate ambassadors and become a beacon of truth in the digital landscape. 

Role & Responsibilities:
 APPLY HERE:
Approved by

-------------Closed/Hired-------------

Job Title: Full stack Developer 

Company: Horan Software 

Salary: 30000ETB 

Description:
 We are currently seeking a highly skilled and experienced Full Stack Developer to join our team. The ideal candidate should have a strong proficiency in React Native, React, TypeScript, Redux, and Sage as state management. A minimum of 2 years of relevant experience, with a proven track record of working on real-world projects, is preferred. 

Requirements:
 At least 2 years of experience as a Full Stack Developer.
Proficiency in React Native, React, TypeScript, Redux, and Sage.
Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
Ability to work independently and as part of a team.
Excellent communication and collaboration skills. 

Role & Responsibilities:
 Develop and maintain high-quality applications using React Native, React, TypeScript, Redux, and Sage.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to design and implement new features.
Troubleshoot and debug issues, ensuring optimal performance and user experience.
Stay up-to-date with industry trends and best practices to continuously improve development processes.

Additional Information:

This position needs to be filled as soon as possible.
Candidates will be required to complete a small test task to demonstrate their proficiency.
Please provide a portfolio showcasing your previous work.
If you meet the above qualifications and are passionate about working on cutting-edge projects, we would love to hear from you. Please submit your resume, portfolio.

Job Title: Sales promotion/remote 

Company: Private Client 

Salary: Based on commission 

Description:
 We are looking for sales persons who can promote and sell our services online. 

Requirements:

text:
Job Title: Videographer 

Company: Bright PLC/Bright Tutorial Center 

Description:
 Job Position:  Urgent commercial video videographer for a day

Role and Responsibilities:
As a Videographer, you will be responsible for capturing high-quality footage for our upcoming commercial video. Your duties will include:

1. Collaborating with the creative team to understand the vision and requirements of the commercial.
2. Planning and executing shots that align with the overall concept and message of the video.
3. Operating video equipment such as cameras, lenses, and lighting to achieve desired results.
4. Ensuring all footage meets quality standards and is suitable for editing.
5. Managing and organizing raw footage effectively.
6. Maintaining and troubleshooting equipment as needed.

Required Skills:
1. Proficiency in operating professional video cameras and related equipment.
2. Strong understanding of composition, framing, and lighting techniques.
3. Ability to work collaboratively in a fast-paced environment.
4. Excellent attention to detail and organizational skills.

Preferred Qualifications:
1. Previous experience as a videographer, preferably in commercial or advertising settings.
2. Portfolio demonstrating previous work, showcasing creativity and technical proficiency.
3. Familiarity with industry-standard video formats and codecs.
4. Knowledge of video editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro or Final Cut Pro is a plus.

Perks and Benefits:
● Opportunities for professional development and growth.
● Access to company events and networking opportunities.
● Creative and collaborative work environment.

When you apply 
1. Send your full name and addresses how you can be contacted 
2. Previous work samples

Note : send your application specifically only on telegram
Approved by

text:
Job Title: Graphics and content creator 

Company: Pixel Import and Export 

Salary: Negotiation 

Description:
 We're seeking an enthusiastic and creative to join our team as a Content Creator. The Content creator will play a crucial role in developing and executing the company's social media strategy, focusing primarily on Telegram, Instagram, and TikTok and YouTube platforms.

We need someone who is familiar with Graphics Design and Video Editing Softwares 

Requirements:
 • Social Media Proficiency: Familiarity with social media platforms such as Telegram, Instagram, and TikTok.

• Creativity: A creative mindset with the ability to generate innovative ideas for content creation.

• Design Skills: Basic knowledge of graphic design tools and photo/video editing software.

• Self-Motivation: The ability to work independently and collaboratively in a fast-paced environment.

• Organizational Skills: Strong organizational and time management skills, with the ability to multitask and prioritize effectively.

• Passion: A genuine interest in technology and the products/services offered by PiSpace Innovations.

• Education Level: degree in any field 

Role & Responsibilities:
 • Social Media Strategy: Collaborate with the marketing team to develop a comprehensive social media strategy that aligns with the brand's image and objectives.

• Content Creation: Generate engaging and visually appealing content for the company's Telegram, Instagram, and TikTok accounts, including posts, stories, videos, and other media formats.

• Market Research: Conduct thorough research on industry trends and competitors to ensure content remains relevant and engaging.

• Community Engagement: Interact with the online community by responding to comments, messages, and inquiries professionally and promptly.
 
• Social Media Analytics: Monitor and analyze social media metrics to track campaign effectiveness and identify areas for improvement.

• Stay Updated: Keep informed of the latest social media trends, tools, and best practices to enhance the company's online presence continually.

• Cross-Functional Collaboration: Work with different teams to gather content and ensure consistency across various platforms.

Approved by

Job Title: YouTube Video Editor 

Company: Private client (Mikre Aimro) 

Salary: 150 ETB/12 minutes video 

Description:
 We need a video editor for our Educational, Self improvement and Motivational YouTube Automation channel which is in Amharic language.

The videos are easy to edit, simple stock footage but a fast paced video with subtitles that keeps the audience engaged. 
We will provide the voice over with its subtitle. 

It's more preferable if the editor is more interested in inspirational and personal development contents. 
The editor might also need to use free stock footage that matches the message that's being said on the video. 

The editor will edit 10 - 15 minutes (mostly 12 minutes) videos With unique and most engaging editing styles that show his creativity and skill. 

The candidate must have a fast internet connection. 
Reliability is key and we don't accept any unrealistic excuses for not delivering the work on time or not being punctual.

The candidate must have knowledge about YouTube's copyright and fair use policy.
Work quantity: 7 videos per week 

Please apply only if you agree on the given description. 

NOTE:
- DON'T FORGET to attach your previous works (YouTube videos) or be ready to edit 2 minutes sample video by using the voice over and subtitle we send you. 
Use the opportunity properly, your today's small effort will pay you more. 
As much as possible consider the norm and value of our community in your video.
To be more computetive feel free to check out our channel and come up with a better engaging video editing style.

Priority for pro video editors! 
Contact:

text:
Dear valued community, At Maroset, we take pride in our commitment to ensuring that only genuine and trustworthy job listings are approved.

Our team of dedicated admins works tirelessly to verify the authenticity of each job posting by requesting evidence from the employers such as business addresses, social media presence, IDs, passports, Driver's license, websites, Emails and other relevant information. This process allows us to filter out any fraudulent or misleading job listings, ensuring that you have access to only the best remote job opportunities.

text.text: While we strive to approve every job posting that meets our criteria, we rejects dozen job listings daily that do not provide sufficient evidence of their legitimacy. We understand that this may be frustrating for some employers, but we believe that this is an essential step in maintaining the integrity of our platform. We request our valued Employers to cooperate our commitment towards verifying the legitimacy of job vacancies on

Job Title: English to Amharic Translation 

Company: Private client 

Description:
 We are seeking experienced translators with a minimum of 2 years of experience.

About the documents to be translated:
We have conducted Fuzzy Matching on the documents, and we will provide you with the calculated results. 

We require 5 translators for this project. The total word count is approximately 100k, but due to the Fuzzy Matching calculation, it is around 68k. Please note that we will only pay for non-matching words.

Payment Terms: Payment will be made within 30 days after verifying the task. Translators found using Google Translation will be instantly disqualified.

Rate: 0.40ETB per non-matching word.

Please apply as soon as possible.

Thank you.

text:
Job Title: Expert Motion Graphics Designer 

Company: Bright PLC 

Description:
 We are seeking a highly skilled and creative Expert Motion Graphics Designer to join our dynamic team. As a Motion Graphics Designer, you will be responsible for conceptualizing and creating engaging visual content that effectively communicates our brand message to our audience. 

Responsibilities:
- Conceptualize, design, and animate motion graphics 
- Collaborate with the marketing and creative teams to develop innovative ideas and concepts for visual content.
- Utilize industry-standard software and tools such as Adobe After Effects, Adobe Premiere Pro, and Cinema 4D to create high-quality motion graphics.

Requirements:
- Proven experience as a Motion Graphics Designer or similar role with an impressive portfolio showcasing your work.
- Proficiency in Adobe Creative Suite, particularly After Effects, Premiere Pro, and Illustrator.
- Strong understanding of design principles, typography, and visual storytelling.
- Excellent communication and collaboration skills, with the ability to work effectively in a team environment. And attention to details.

If you fulfill the requirements above apply specifically on telegram
Approved by

Job Title: Graphics designer, content creator and video editor 

Company: Swan Designs (Startup) 

Salary: 7000 

Description:
 We are seeking a seasoned Graphics Designer and Video Editor to join our dynamic team.

Strong conceptualization, graphics design, typography, and page layout skills for projects spanning print, interactive, and broadcast media.

Impressive portfolio showcasing creative prowess and execution excellence across various mediums, with motion graphics proficiency as a bonus.

Exceptional communication skills, adept at collaborating with cross-functional teams.

Ability to manage multiple projects independently in a fast-paced setting.

Contribute to logo design ideation, refinement, and the establishment of brand guidelines and design principles across diverse projects, collaborating closely with the art director and design team.

Develop visual concepts and designs in line with brand identities, meeting client requirements.

Produce designs for digital and print media within specified content calendars and deadlines.

Craft infographic designs and videos tailored for various social media platforms. 

Requirements:
 Proficiency in Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator, Canva) or equivalent software.
Ability to sketch 
Great communication
Approved by
